29a2(mdo sde): gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog te/ khyu mchog gi gnasu dam 'cha' zhing / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gang gis kyang 'jig rten du chos dang
29a3(mdo sde): 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub so do byang chub se de'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rang gi las las gyur pa/ las kyis rnam par smin pa las rton pa yin
29a4(mdo sde): te/ de las kyi rnam par smin pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / de ltar byung ba'i las dang las yang dag par blangs pa rnams kyis
29a5(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gnas dang rgyus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs gnyis pa ste/ stobs de thob pas de bzhin
29a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ khyu mchog gi gnasu dam 'cha' zhing / dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gang gis kyang 'jig
29a7(mdo sde): rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po
29a8(mdo sde): la brtags nas chos ston te/ de dag shes nas dbang po rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug cing / dbang po rnams ji lta ba dang sngon tid dbang po'i rim po mkhyen pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang
29b1(mdo sde): chub thob pa na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gis dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyis rim pa yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ bu me de bzhin gshegs pas gang sems can
29b2(mdo sde): gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub
29b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi khams la 'jug ste/ zhugs nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ci lta ba dang / khams ci lta ba de bzhin du gnaso// de khams la
29b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
29b5(mdo sde): stobs bzhi pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyi mos pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes/ 
29b6(mdo sde): kun tu tshol te/ de ltar mos pa la mi smod do// de mos pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob po na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs yang dag
29b7(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spong pa na 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / 
29b8(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po thams cad du ye shes gtong ngo // de kun tu 'gro ba mkhyen pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pos byang chub thob pa na kun 'gro ba'i lam
30a1(mdo sde): yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ 
30a2(mdo sde): na/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin lhur len pa yin te/ sems nges par rtog cing / nyon mongs pa dang bral te dul zhing cang shes so// de cang shes kyi stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na// sems can
30a3(mdo sde): gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag gis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa thams
30a4(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bdun pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
30a5(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gson te/ bag yod pa yin/ sngon dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa yin no// de sngon rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i
30a6(mdo sde): rtsa ba tshud mi gzin pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjesu dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yang
30a7(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spang ba spyod pa no// sems can gang
30a8(mdo sde): yang ba 'gong bar mi byed la/ ma brlabs pa la dbang mi za zhing / sems can la snang bar gyur pa yin no// de snang ba'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ lho'i mgo gi shes pa yang dag brji
30b1(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang gi zag pa 'phel/ 
30b2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir yang gnas pa ma yin gyi/ zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to// zod pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa zag pa med pa'i lam gyis sems can rnams la lam nye
30b3(mdo sde): bar ston to// de mos pa zag pa med pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ zag pa thams cad zad pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin
30b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa'o// bu mo de dag ni de bzhin rogashegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ byang chub sems dpas de dag rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i de
30b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// bu mo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab/ tu dbye ba 'di dag thos nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
30b6(mdo sde): bcu po 'di dag yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ ji nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'jug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la bu me rin chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
30b7(mdo sde): gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad po 'di dag dge ba gang dag dang ji ltar ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
30b8(mdo sde): 'dres pa bcwa brgyad rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdud pa spong ba ni/ gzhan gyis shes par mi bya'o// snyam
31a1(mdo sde): nas/ slob dpon nam yang chos kyi dpe mkhyud mi byed de/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong zhing chos mnyam pa nyid du mthong
31a2(mdo sde): ba yin/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba yin te/ byang chub thob pa na seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs te/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas pa la/ chos 'di lta bu
31a3(mdo sde): zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes/ 'dir nga la dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su 'am rung ste/ 'jig rten chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar 'gyur
31a4(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan ma yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // mtshan ma de yang de dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ bde ba brnyes/ mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa yin te/ 'khor gyi
31a5(mdo sde): nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing // khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gang gis kyang 'jig rten du/ 
31a6(mdo sde): chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor ba 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang po'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
31a7(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bar du gcod pa la bar du gcod pa'i cho su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te de bar du gcod pa'i chos la mi ston to// mi 'jug go// mi spyod do// gzhan dag la yang
31a8(mdo sde): mi 'tshang ngo do// mi ston to// bar du gcod pa'i chos shes nas spong ngo // de byang chub thob pa na/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs te/ gangangs bar du gcod pa'i cho su gsungs pa de dag lo sten pa la ni/ bar du ga
31b1(mdo sde): pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas med de/ 'dir nga la gang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems/ 
31b2(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi'i chad par dkar po'i chos la mos pa yin te/ rnam par byang ba'i lam du zhugs shing / sems can thams cad la rnam par dag pa'i chos ston te/ yon
31b3(mdo sde): tan gyi chos nyid mngon sum du gyur pa yin no// yan lag gi tshogs gang dag gis rnam pa byang ba/ rnam par dag pa'i lam gnon par 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi tshogs de dag la bdag kyang
31b4(mdo sde): spyod sems can gzhan la yang ston to// de byang chub thob pa dan/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs te// gang ngas rnam par byang / ba/ rnam par dag pa'i cho su gsungs pa de dag la sten pa la ni
31b5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa ma yin no// zhes bya ba'i gnos mang ngo // 'dirangal su'ang rung rgol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin te/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o// bu mo
31b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag gis shes shing mthong gi/ gzhan gyis mi shes mi mthong ngo zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal du nam yang mi ltung ste/ 
31b7(mdo sde): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon pa'i nga rgyal med cing / sdig pa 'byed pa d+mo sbyangs pa yin no// de chos kyi sbyin pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na seng ge'i sgra sgregs te nga zag pa zad do zhes
31b8(mdo sde): dam bcas pa la/ zag pa 'di lta bu zhig yongasu ma zad do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas med de 'dir nga la su yang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin to// 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o// 
32a1(mdo sde): bu ma gzhan yang byang chub sems dang bya chub med pa'i spyad baspyad pa na// rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lam sbyor ba'i sems can rnams la/ lam mtshon par byed de lam/ 
32a2(mdo sde): gyi gam yo nas/ mtho dman gyis mnyam par byed // zam pa dang rdo stegs kyang 'dogs so// mtshan me mun pa mun nag gi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me yang
32a3(mdo sde): 'bul lo// sems can ltung ba'i 'gyod pa la gnas pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i 'gyod pa sel to// kun nas ldang ba med pa byed do// gzhan gyi 'gyod pa mi skyed do// gzhan gyi ltung ba byung
32a4(mdo sde): ba gleng bar mi byed do// chos la dogs pa skyes pa'i sems can rnams la ngogs thams cingad gcad pa'i phyir chos ston te// the tsom dang yid gnyis dang / nem nur med kyi
32a5(mdo sde): byed do// chos kyi snang ba sgrub bo// shes rab kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par spyad do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos smra ba thams cad la chos bstan par
32a6(mdo sde): gsol ba 'debs te// chos yang dag par 'dzin cing rgyu med par legs so zhes bya ba brjod do// sems can gang la mi 'phya'o// thing srang mi byed do// chos la shed mi 'byed pa dang / sdang ba
32a7(mdo sde): dang / mgo myos pa dang / rmongs par mi byed do// skye bo'i nges pa'i tshig la dbang za bar mi byed do// tshig thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung du mos so// yi ge gsog dang / yi ge stong pa nyid kyis
32a8(mdo sde): tshig tu brjod pa thams cad la skyon du lta ba ma yin no// 'khrul pa'i skabs tshol ba ma yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ste/ 
32b1(mdo sde): dris pa thams cad lung bstan pa ston pa dag la de la de med cing / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bskams pa'i phyir/ sgra skad thams cad du 'jug pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas// rtag tu
32b2(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul pa med pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa yin te/ thams cad du phyung par lung ston pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
32b3(mdo sde): 'dres pa dang po'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub se de'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ tshig gi skyon thams cad spangs pa yin te/ bden pa smra/ chos smra/ don smra/ 'dul ba smra zhing
32b4(mdo sde): mu tser mi smra/ byung rgyal du mi smra ste/ 'phags pa ma yin/ rapa'i gtam thams cad spangs nas/ 'phags pa'i mi sgra thob cing / dge sbyong gi bya ba rtsod pa med pa la zhugs
32b5(mdo sde): te/ chos gang nyan cing yongasu tshol ba dang / gzhan la yangaston pa de dag thams cad bdag dang / gzhan dag zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pas yongasu tshol
32b6(mdo sde): lo// rtsod pa med lhur len pa med pa'i phyir de su dang yang mi 'thab mi rtsod do// dgrar mi tshol lo// dgra med pa'i chos la mos pa yin no// brjod du med pa'i chos rnams la 'jug/ de
32b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa la mngon par dad do// sa ni gzhan yang chos nyid 'di yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug go// de chos yang dag pa blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang
32b8(mdo sde): chu thob pa na/ ca tse med pa zhes bya ba ste/ de la de med pa yin no// de yig 'bru gcig kyang mi rjod cing mi smral/ sgra skad thams cad dang / nges pa'i tshig gis bstan pa dag la yang
33a1(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub pa nyid du legs par bshad pas/ 'khor tshim par byed do// rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / sgra
33a2(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / spu'i khung bu thams cad nas
33a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung ste/ mtha' na sgra gcig gis kyang 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshi mo par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'byung / 
33a4(mdo sde): zhing / sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi brlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dpar mi rtog cing btang snyoms te/ lhun gyis grub pa 'di na
33a5(mdo sde): bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyong pa na/ 'di
33a6(mdo sde): lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rje su dran
33a7(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su dran pa drug po dang mi 'bral ba yin no// sems can gzhan yang rjesu dran pa 'di dag yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug go/ de chos yang dag par grangs pa 'di dang ldan pas
33a8(mdo sde): byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chos kyi
33b1(mdo sde): sgron ma'i gzungs la mkhas pas// rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyel ba med pa'i chos can yin no// gal te sems can thams cad kyis bskal par bsams te snga phyi med/ 
33b2(mdo sde): par the tsom dri batha dad pa de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su dris kyang / de 'di bshad do// 'di bstan to snyam du mi sems mi rtog la/ rtag tu ma rmongs shing dran pa'i dbang pos/ skad cig
33b3(mdo sde): tha cig yud tsam gcig la legs par bshad pas/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan
33b4(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dan/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par pha rol gyi sems srung ba yin te/ gzhan gyi sems 'khrul par mi byed/ sems gdung
33b5(mdo sde): bar mo byed/ sems la dmigs par mi byed/ dge bo'i rtsa ba'i bar du gcod par mi byed/ chos la dmig sa par mi byed cing / chos thams cad sgyu mo lta bur mes kyi
33b6(mdo sde): g.yo bo med/ rlom sems med cing sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yin/ chos mnyam pa nyid du mthong ste/ chos kyi dbyings 'brel pa med cing ro gcig pa la zhugs pa yin no/ 
33b7(mdo sde): de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa yin te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam pa
33b8(mdo sde): nyid rnam par spros pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / kun nas 'khyil pa sgo'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ mnyam par gzhag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis/ de
34a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa 'di ni/ khram de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnas su dres pa bzhi pa'o// du ma gnan/ 
34a2(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyin ci lag gi 'du shes med pa yin te/ sems phyin ci lag med/ lta bu byin ci log med/ mad pa la ste 'dogs pa
34a3(mdo sde): phyin ci log med pa yin/ bodag tu 'du shes pa mo yin/ sems can du 'du shes pa me yin/ srog du 'du shes pa mo yin/ gas par 'du shes pa ma yin/ gang zag du 'du shes pam
34a4(mdo sde): yon/ shed las skyed par 'du shes pa ma yin/ shed bura'adu shes pa ma yin/ chad par 'du shes pa ma yi// / rtag par 'du shes pa ma yin// 'byung ba 'i du shes pa
34a5(mdo sde): ma yin/ 'jig por 'du shes pa ma yin/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na mthe ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa
34a6(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis su 'du shes pa ma
34a7(mdo sde): yin la/ 'du shes la chags shing zhen pa'i sems can rnams la 'du shes phyin ci log spong bar ston kyang che ba dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba ma yin/ mthar lta ba thams cad
34a8(mdo sde): rnam par spangs te/ dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa yin/ chos mnyam pa nyid mthong ba yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
34b1(mdo sde): latha da pa 'du shes med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bskams pa dang / mi rang pa'i bam tog gi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
34b2(mdo sde): pa mtshan ma med pa'i gnas la gnas kyang / mtshan ma thams cad la 'du shes kyis 'dzin pa dang / rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po mo ldog ste/ sems can/ 
34b3(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i dus la yang rung cing / chos ston pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems
34b4(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag par rgyun tu btang snyoms pa yin te/ 'khor ba na spyod pa'i nyan mongs shing / sdug bsngal ba'i chos thams cad la de btung
34b5(mdo sde): snyoms pas bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi chos la rjesu chags pa yang med/ sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba'i gnas kyi chos thams cad la 'khong khro ba
34b6(mdo sde): yang med de/ de rje su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral bas don thams cad rnyed cing 'byor kyang / khengs par mi 'gyur/ don thams cad yong su nyams kyang gdung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'du byed
34b7(mdo sde): thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog cing bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes mos te/ btang snyoms pa yin no// sems can gzhan yang gtang snyoms kyi
34b8(mdo sde): chos nyid de lta bu yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug/ de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms
35a1(mdo sde): med pa zhes bya ste/ de la btang snyoms med pa yin no// gnyis la chags pa las rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin tu 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa
35a2(mdo sde): 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa zhes bya ba/ de la btang snyoms de med pa yin no// gnyis la chags pa las
35a3(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam pa
35a4(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mim yin pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsti stang du byas te/ mchod
35a5(mdo sde): cing ri mor byas kyang rje su chags pa med/ bdud dang gzhan mu stegs can dang / phaste rgol ba dang / 'tshe ba can gyi sems can thams cad kyis dkrugs shing / gnod par byas
35a6(mdo sde): kyang khong khro ba med la/ sems mtshungs shing mnyam pa yin to// phan 'dogs pa dang / gnong par byas pa las dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang / chu dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang / me dang
35a7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'i sems dang / rlung dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis khengs par mi 'gyur/ gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing mi 'khrugs te/ na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis mnyam pa nyid du sbyar
35a8(mdo sde): zhing sems can thams cad la btang snyoms par gnas pa yin no// de chos nges par sems pa'i btang snyoms 'di dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po mi ldog ste/ sems
35b1(mdo sde): can 'dul ba'i dus la yang rub cing ci rigs par chos ston pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod pa 'ang ni/ bu med bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang
35b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'dun pa drag pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs tshol ba la 'dun pa rlabs po che dang / 'dun pa chen po dang / 'dun
35b3(mdo sde): pa zab mos dge ba'i rtsa bo sna tshogs bskyed par 'dun to// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spong bar 'dun to// theg pa chen po las phyir mi ldog par 'dun to// sems can
35b4(mdo sde): thams cad la snying rje chen po btang ba yid la byed pas mi 'dor par 'dun to// rang gis rtog cing sgrub kyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub par
35b5(mdo sde): 'dun te/ bdud dam/ gzhan mu stegs can dmigs pa can lta ba la mngon par zhen pa thams cad dang / sems/ can thams cad kyis de 'dun pa de las 'dun pa dang dpral
35b6(mdo sde): bar mi nus so// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dun pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// 'dun pa'i ting nge
35b7(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzungs la mkhas pas dbang sgyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi nang nas/ gang bstan par bya ba de ston to// gang
35b8(mdo sde): du skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis dus gang dang / nyi tshed gang dang / yul gzhan gang dang / sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud gang dang / gang la snod ci lta ba bzhin du ci rigs par chos ston kyang
36a1(mdo sde): mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub
36a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ rtag tu brtson pa mi 'dor/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub cing / sbyar
36a3(mdo sde): bas ngoms mi myong / byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtson pa la rtul cing bla ma dang / dge ba'i shas gnyen dang / chos smra ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gan du
36a4(mdo sde): 'gro la yongs su 'dri ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las dang / bskal pa tshad med par 'khor ba yongasu gzung bar bya ba dang / sems can tshad med pa
36a5(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang ba dang sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med
36a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
36a7(mdo sde): chos tshad med pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/ des brtson 'grus de tshad med par byas pa yin no// chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin
36a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa la brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba ste/ de la de med pa yin no// brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas/ sems
36b1(mdo sde): can tshad med pa gzud cing / gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa/ khyu mchog tu gyur pa/ tshad med pa
36b2(mdo sde): ston kyang de'i rdzu 'phrul de/ chags pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ thogs pa med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ste/ mngon par phyogs kyang / mngon par 'du byed pa med cing
36b3(mdo sde): thams cad du rgyu ba na mkha'as klas pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
36b4(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dran pa phun dasum tshogs shing dran pa dang / shes bzhin mchog dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i dran pa de brjed pa med pa yin/ 
36b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgoms pa'i/ rnal 'byor la brtson pa yin no// de nang gi lus la lus
36b6(mdo sde): kyi rje su lta zhing gnas te/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam pa yid la byed cing sbyor// phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas
36b7(mdo sde): te/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ga med dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par yid le byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi tsher po rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta zhing gnas te/ stong pa'i rnam par yid
36b8(mdo sde): la byed cing sbyor ro// de bzhin du byi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba rnams la/ tshor ba'i rje su lta zhing gnas te/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi sems la sems kyi
37a1(mdo sde): rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ 
37a2(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lto zhing gnas te/ sgom pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos
37a3(mdo sde): rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// lus la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgoms te// mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
37a4(mdo sde): dang bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang // de bzhin gshegs pacwo yongasu bsgrub/ raba'i phyir/ lus kyi las legs par sbyor ba'i rgyun kyang mi
37a5(mdo sde): gcod do// tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ sgom ste/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing skyeyang / ngan song thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams
37a6(mdo sde): la lta bas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir/ sems can de dag la snying rje chen po'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do// sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/ 
37a7(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed la theg pa chen po'i tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do// chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa
37a8(mdo sde): bar gzhag pa sgom ste/ smon pa med po'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyang mngon sum du mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yang 'tsham pa yin te/ chos/ 
37b1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dpung med pa la yang dag par 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dran pa nyams pa med pa zhes/ 
37b2(mdo sde): ba ste/ de la de med pa yin no// slong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi
37b3(mdo sde): mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / dbang po dang khams dang / mos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / nyon mongs pa spyod pa bag
37b4(mdo sde): chags dang / bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi rnamapar smin pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / tshe dang 'chi
37b5(mdo sde): 'pho dang / skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bskal pa dang / zhing du sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
37b6(mdo sde): pa lung bston pa gcig nas gcig tu bergyud pa dang / pha ma dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa la dran pa'i dbang po thogs pa med cing
37b7(mdo sde): rmongs pa med pa yin te/ thams cad du phyed par lung ston pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
37b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par shes rab spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyi 'od dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dang / shes rab kyis dpyod pa dang / shes rab kyi
38a1(mdo sde): dbang po dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / rab pa'i shes rab dang / nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang / mi thul ba'i shes rab dang / zil gyis mi non pa'i shes
38a2(mdo sde): rab dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba'i shes rab dang / yangs shing rgya che la sems snyoms pa'i shes rab dang / bdag tshul bzhin yid la byed kyi
38a3(mdo sde): gzhan gyis ma bstan pa'i shes rab dang / thos pa bstsags pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba mos pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin to// de chos
38a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa des phyi nang gi dngos po gang yang yongasu mi gtong ba med do// de bla ma la rim gro bya ba mi byed pa gang yang med do// de sdug bsngal gyi phung po mi bzod pa gang yang med do// de bde
38a5(mdo sde): ba'i yo byad mi 'dor ba gang yang med do// de chos 'dod pa/ des tshig bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcig nyan pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig
38a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rin po ches yongasu bkang ba la ni ma yin no// chos kyi tshig gcig la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob pa la ni ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam nyan pa
38a7(mdo sde): la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thob pa la ni ma yin no// tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig gzhan dag la sten par byed pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ gang ga'i klung
38a8(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa la ni ma yin no// gzhan la byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa la ni shin tu dga' ba yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
38b1(mdo sde): srid gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed thob pa la ni ma yin no// gzhan dag la pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam rab tu ston pa la dga' ba yin te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa gang gan
38b2(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dag thob la ni ma yin no// de lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu zhugs pos bsti stang du byed cing chos nyan to// bsti stang du byed cing gzhan dag la ston to// de de ltar mngon par brtson
38b3(mdo sde): bas/ tshogs chung ngur lha thams cad kyis yongasu bzung ba yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no// de las yongasu bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pas 'jig rten pa dang / 
38b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos thams cad bdag nyid la mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no// shes rab kyi sna bu'i sgra zad mi shes pas snang ba yin no// de chos snang ba'i
38b5(mdo sde): sgo 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshe/ gas pa la shes rab nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
38b6(mdo sde): spyod pa shes pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa dang / khan ma tho ba med pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das
38b7(mdo sde): ba dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs pa bstan pa shes pa dang / zhing
38b8(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul phra rab thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i bskal pa bstan pa shes pa dag la/ de'i shes rab de thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med pa yin no// de'i shes rab de sngon gyi mtha' dang
39a1(mdo sde): phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med de/ thams cad du thogs pa med do// phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa
39a2(mdo sde): rnams la bstan kyang thug pa med do// dpyod pa'i 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra gcig las/ chos
39a3(mdo sde): kyi sgo thams cad snang zhing / chos kyi sgra thams cad chos kyi sgo gcig gis yang dag par sgrub pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o/ 
39a4(mdo sde): bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dad pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad parakhyim gyi gnas don tu mi gnyer ba yin/ 'dod pa don tu/ 
39a5(mdo sde): mi gnyer ba yin te/ de mngon par byung bar dga' zhing rab tu 'byung ba mang ba yin/ dben pa la gzhol/ dben pa la 'bab/ dben pa la bab cing chos zab mo bsgom
39a6(mdo sde): pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson te/ de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag sgom mo// gang phal kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis yul ma
39a7(mdo sde): yin zhing mi rtogs pa dang / dmigs par blta ba mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba thams cad kyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag bsgoms pas/ sgrib pa med
39a8(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa kun tu skye'o// chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// bdud kyi yul las kyang shin tu 'da'o// ye shes kyi yul yang yongasu rdzogs pa
39b1(mdo sde): byed do// sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la mi spyod do// de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa gsum 'thob cing / rnam par
39b2(mdo sde): thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam par rtsen pas/ chos zab mo ston pa yin no// don la ston pa yin gyi/ tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no// ye shes la rton pa yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin/ 
39b3(mdo sde): no// nges pa'i don la rton pa yin gyi/ drang ba'i don la rton pa ma yin no// chos nyid la rton pa yin gyi/ gang zag la rton pa ma yin no// sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa yin te/ yi ge
39b4(mdo sde): dang / rnam par rtog pa la chags zhan pa la don la rton pa bstan nas/ yongasu thar par byed// rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la chags// zhen pa la ye shes la rton pa bstan nas/ 
39b5(mdo sde): yongasu thar bar byed do// drang bar sgro brtags pa la chag/ sa// zhen pa la nges pa'i don la rton pa bstan nas yongasu thar par byed do// gang zag la mngon par zhan cing
39b6(mdo sde): chags zhan pa la chos nyid la rton pa bstan nas yongasu thar par byed do// lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis la chags/ zhen pa la stong pa nyid bstan nas/ yongasu thar bar bye // rnam par rtogs
39b7(mdo sde): pa'i sgrib pa thams cad la chags/ zhen pa la mtshan ma med pa bstan nas yongasu thar bar byed// khams gsum pa la chags/ zhan pa la smon pa med pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// 
39b8(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyis chags zhen pa la mi sdug pa'i rnam par bstan nas/ yong su thar bar byed do// zhe sdang skyed pa la chags zhen pa la byams pa bstan nas yong su thar par byed do// gto mug
40a1(mdo sde): spyod pa la chags zhen pa la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan nas yang su thar bar byed do// ser sna la chags / zhen pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
40a2(mdo sde): nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la chags// zhen pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas/ yongasu thar par byed do// gnod sems la chags// zhen pa
40a3(mdo sde): la bzed pa'i pha rol tu byon pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// le lo la chags/ zhen pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas// yongs su thar bar byed do// g.yeng ba la
40a4(mdo sde): chags/ zhen pa la bas mo gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas // yongs su thar bar byed do// 'chal ba'i shes rab la ngo chags/ zhen pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas
40a5(mdo sde): yongs su thar par byed do// sa so'i skye ba rnams la chags/ zhen pa la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// phyin ci log la chags// zhen pa la mi
40a6(mdo sde): rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba bstan nas yong su thar bar byed do// sgrib pa dang chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / lta ba thams cad la chags/ zhen pa la
40a7(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bstan nas/ yongasu thar bar byed do// nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags/ zhen pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// 
40a8(mdo sde): de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// de'i rnam par grol ba
40b1(mdo sde): de mi 'khrugs shing / shin tu mthar thug ste/ dpa' rlabs med la shin tu bsil ba'i dngos par gyur cing rab ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka
40b2(mdo sde): ba yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba yin/ dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral te/ rnyog pa med la shin tu yongs su dag pa yin// zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ba
40b3(mdo sde): sa rnams la shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa byas pas zad mi shes pa yin/ bstan pa mtha' yas mu med pa yin// chags pa med cing bsgrib pa med pa yin/ na mkha'i dbyings su yang dag
40b4(mdo sde): par 'du ba yin te/ dri ma med pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chos thams cad snang ba dang daldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa
40b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyis rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bstan pa dang rgyu 'thun pa yin te/ thams cad las byung zhing / chos thams cad kyi snang ba dang ldan pa yin/ 
40b6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin/ mya ngan la 'das pa la 'bab pa yin te/ shin tu mthar thug cing / shin tu mthar byin pa 'di ni/ bu mo
40b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ye shes lhur len pa
40b8(mdo sde): yin te/ ye shes kyi stobs dang / ye shes kyis mtshon cha dang / ye shes kyi byin dang ldan pa yin no// de'i ye shes de ni nyams pa med par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas/ 
41a1(mdo sde): pa las nges par byung ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dged pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par
41a2(mdo sde): dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pas/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang / 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral
41a3(mdo sde): ba'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug
41a4(mdo sde): dang bcas dang / gti mug med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'khor byed dang bcas pa dang / 'khor byed med pa dang / 
41a5(mdo sde): zang zing dang bcas pa dang / zang zing med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / bla ma dang bcas pa dang / bla ma med pa dang / sgrib pa dang bcas pa
41a6(mdo sde): dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas
41a7(mdo sde): ba dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ma
41a8(mdo sde): dag pa dang / chung ngu dang / chen por 'gyur ba dang / mtha' dang bcas pa dang / mtha' yas pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems dang / 
41b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims la sbyor ba'i sems dang / gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang / gnod sems med pa dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang
41b2(mdo sde): 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i sems dang / log pa nyid du nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nges pa dang / rang
41b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg par nges pa dang / theg pa chen por nges pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba
41b4(mdo sde): bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun tu byung ga 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji
41b5(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de mi skye ba shes pas/ sdug bsngal 'i phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shis si// shin tu kun tu mi rgyu ba shes pa/ kun 'byung ba rab/ 
41b6(mdo sde): tu shes so// chad pa med cing rtag pa med po shin tu skad cig pa/ 'gog pa shes pas/ 'gog pa rab tu shes so// thams cad kyi rje su song ba/ na mkhar yang dag par 'du ba/ bdag
41b7(mdo sde): gi ba med cing yongasu 'dzin pa med pa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i shes pas lam rab tu shes so// de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag de ltar yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes
41b8(mdo sde): kyang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du yang mi byed la/ bden pa yongs su shes pa dang / spang ba dang / bsgom pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la
42a1(mdo sde): chos ston to// de'i chos bstan pade bden pa'i rjes su 'thun pa yin// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / 'gal ba med pa yin/ mthar lta ba thams
42a2(mdo sde): cad yongs su spangs pa yin/ dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa yin rten pa'i chos mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ de chos thams cad rgyu dang bcas shing / rkyen dang bcas pa'i kha na las kyi
42a3(mdo sde): bdag gi kha na las pa ma yin/ sems can gyi kha nA las pa ma yin/ srog gi kha na las pa ma yin/ gso ba'i kha na las pa ma yini// skyes bu'i kha na las ma yin/ gang zag gi kha na
42a4(mdo sde): las pa ma yin/ bar rab tu shes so// de ma rig pa'i rkyen dgyis 'du byed rnams su rab tu shes so// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa
42a5(mdo sde): rkyen gyis/ ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis// skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis/ reg pa dang / reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ tshor ba dang / 
42a6(mdo sde): tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang / srid po'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
42a7(mdo sde): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'bo' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba rab tu shes so// de ma rig pa
42a8(mdo sde): 'gag pa nas/ rga shi 'gag pa'i bar dang / de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'dres pa 'di 'gag par rab tu shes so// de 'di la yang dag par slob pa na/ gang ma rig pa'i rkyen las
42b1(mdo sde): byung ba de ni/ bdag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin/ sems can gyi rkyen las byung ba ma yin/ srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin no// gang bdag gi rkyen las byung ba/ 
42b2(mdo sde): ma yin pa nas/ gang zag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin pa'i bar de ni stong pa'o// stong pa gang yin pa de ni chad pa ma yin// rtag pa ma yin no// chad pa ma yin// rtag pa ma yin gang yin pa de ni
42b3(mdo sde): gdod ma nyid nas ma skyes ma byung ba'o// gdong ma nyid nas ma skyes/ ma byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ dus gsum du brjod du med do// dus gsum du brjod du med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i
42b4(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni bgrong ba med cing / bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa'o// bgrang ba med cing / bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa gang yin pa de
42b5(mdo sde): ni don dam pa'o// dom dam pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'thab pa med cing rtsod pa
42b6(mdo sde): med pa'o// 'thab pa med cing / rtsod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos so// dge sbyong gi chos gang yin pa de ni/ na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin du des de ltar shes shing gnas
42b7(mdo sde): te/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa kun 'byung bas/ ma rig pa kun 'byung bar rab tu shes so// ma rig pa 'gag pa nas/ rga shi 'gag pa'i bar du rab tu shes te/ rgyu dang / rkyen tshogs pa'i shes pas/ 
42b8(mdo sde): chad par lta bar sbyor ba ma yin gyi/ bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos kyi rjes su song ba yin te/ mtha' khas mi len/ nye bar mi
43a1(mdo sde): 'dzin mi dmigs so// mtha' mi dmigs pas/ dbus yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // chos gang la mtha' mi dmigs pa de la dbus yod par gang la/ 
43a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de'i mtha' ci 'dra ba zhig snyam nas/ de mtha' dang / dpung med pa'i chos rnams la 'jug go/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dpung dang bral bas/ mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos
43a3(mdo sde): ston pa yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa
43a4(mdo sde): yin no// stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms rab dang / mtha' yas 'khyil pa'i gzungs la mkhas rabs/ de'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de/ chos kyi
43a5(mdo sde): dbyings mtha' dang / dpung med par yang dag par 'du ba yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin bstan pa rnams la/ na mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya che zhing rnam par mi rtog la/ lhun
43a6(mdo sde): gyis grub pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ rnam par smin pa chud mi za bar ston pa yin/ sems can thams
43a7(mdo sde): cad kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la mngon sum du gyur pa yin/ khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten bstan pa rnams la/ shin tu
43a8(mdo sde): rnam par nges par ston pa yin/ mes pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs shes pa bstan pa rnams mi zad par ston cing 'jug ba yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes pa bstan pa rnams la
43b1(mdo sde): phyogs kyi dra ba thams cad rnam par dbye ba rgyas par byed cing / phyad par lung ston pa yin/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyems par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon
43b2(mdo sde): mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ chos kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par gzhag pa ston pa yin/ sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa shes
43b3(mdo sde): pa bstan pa rnams la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang / tshe dang / skye ba rab 'bring dang / tha ma thog ma'i mthar chags pa med cing / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes ston pa yin/ thogs
43b4(mdo sde): pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i lha'i mig shes pa bstan pa rnams la kun tu rnam par lta ba thams cad du shin tu yongasu sbyangs pa'i lung bstan pa ston pa yin/ zag pa
43b5(mdo sde): thams cad zad pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ bag chag/ sa kyi mtshams sbyor ba ma lus par spang ba shes pa'i/ ston pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa shes pa bstan pa rnams
43b6(mdo sde): zil gyis mi non pa ston pa yin// snying rje chen po'i stobs shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad du tha dad du bya ba med cing sbyor ba mtshungs shing mnyam pa
43b7(mdo sde): rgyun mi gcod pa ston pa yin/ so so ci rigs par chos bstan pa rnams la/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa yin/ sems can thams cad yongs su
43b8(mdo sde): smin par byed cing // 'dul ba'i phyir/ mi zad pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes kyi yul bstan pa rnams la zab mo dang / sna tshogs dang 'phrugs pa dang / snrel zhir
44a1(mdo sde): rgyu ba dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes ston pa yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mongs
44a2(mdo sde): ma yin te/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o// bu me gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ye shes kyis
44a3(mdo sde): byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed de/ de ye shes kyis lus kyi las byung pa ni 'di lta ste/ 'khu ba dang / g.yo dang / gya gyu dang / tshul 'chos pa thams
44a4(mdo sde): cad mi byed do// sdang ba med cing chags pa med pa yin/ rtag tu tshangs par spyod cing / de lus kyi las kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pas/ byang chub dang 'thun te/ bdag
44a5(mdo sde): dang gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin ba'i rgyu 'thun pa snying rje chen po la sbyor zhing / rtagatu sems can gyi don la brtson te/ lus kyi las de lta
44a6(mdo sde): bu dang ldan pa yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing / ye shes kyi rjesu
44a7(mdo sde): 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / kun nas snang ba'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs
44a8(mdo sde): ba'i kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / gzugs dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng ston pa'i lus kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding
44b1(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / dge slong dang
44b2(mdo sde): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dong / srog chags brgya stong du ma lhags pa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad du spyod lam tshad med pa dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyings
44b3(mdo sde): gnas pa mchog dam pa/ gtso bo gya nom pa'i lus bstan nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la chos kyi gtam yang dag par ston to// yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// yang dag
44b4(mdo sde): par gzeng bstod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// yang dag par bsten/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod// yang dag par dga' bar
44b5(mdo sde): byas nas mi snang bar byed do// mi snang bar gyur kyang sang bar shes pa yang med do// 'khor 'dus pa de dag/ tu 'dus shing 'dug ste/ sgra'am cang mi smra yang rung
44b6(mdo sde): 'ongs par shes pa yong med do// de la lta bas kyang ngoms mi myong ngo // des bstan pa la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rab tu rgya chen po yang rnyed do// 'dod pa la dga' zhing rtse ba dang
44b7(mdo sde): yul dang longs spyod thams cad la mi lta ba yid la byed cing sbyor ro// mi snang bar gyur na lta ba dang / mnyan pa'i phyir skom par 'gyur ro// de la lta bas skom pa dang / lta 'dod pa dang / 
44b8(mdo sde): chos nyan pas skem pa dang / chos nyan 'dod pa de yang / zag pa med pa'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang yid kyi las 'thob par rgyur 'gyur te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
45a1(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ye shes kyi byas pa'i
45a2(mdo sde): las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed de/ de ye shes kyis ngag gi las byed pa ni// 'khu ba dang g.yo dang / gya gyu dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed de/ bden
45a3(mdo sde): bar smra zhing phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig khyal ba mi smra ba yin/ phan pa'i tshig dang / ran pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi tshig dang / de tshig de dag smras te tshig des bdag dang / gzhan
45a4(mdo sde): la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// tshig gang sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba don dang ldan pa'i tshig smra ste/ tshig des sems can thams cad tshim par byed do// da mig
45a5(mdo sde): mi 'tshig ste/ ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i tshig dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byung
45a6(mdo sde): chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin
45a7(mdo sde): shin tu bsgoms pa dang / 'khor gsum gyi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngag gi las ci yang mi brjod kyang de skad thams cad las sgra brnyan dang / 'khor thams cad
45a8(mdo sde): kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi gsung sgra dang dbyangs ni don dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ bden pa dang 'thun brten/ 
45b1(mdo sde): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba/ yid 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'thun pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur 'bras bu yod pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur gyur pa yin/ 
45b2(mdo sde): te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
45b3(mdo sde): par ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pA wa rnams mi byed de/ de ye shes kyis yid kyi las byed pa ni// 'khu ba dang / g.yo dang / gyo gru dang / tshula'i chos pa
45b4(mdo sde): thams cad mi byed do// brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang bral zhing / yang dag par lta ba yin/ byams pa dang / snying rje la gnas te/ sems can
45b5(mdo sde): thams cad la sems snyoms shing / byang chub kyi sem/ sa brjod pa med pa yin no// de ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa ma
45b6(mdo sde): yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pargya su lob pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ de la
45b7(mdo sde): de yod do// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsnyoms pa dang / brnag pa rnyog pa med pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems
45b8(mdo sde): gcig gis/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems mnyam
46a1(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyi rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid du
46a2(mdo sde): khong du chud pa yin no// lus thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir/ rang gi chos nyid kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid khong du chud pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyis
46a3(mdo sde): lus kyi chos nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi chos nyid khong du chud pa yin no// rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'du ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi
46a4(mdo sde): lus rang gi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'du ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi lus/ sangs rgyasakyi skur byin gyis rlob bo// de'i byin gyi rlabs de ni/ lha dang
46a5(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang
46a6(mdo sde): g.yos pa 'am/ bskyed par mi nus te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa lnga pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
46a7(mdo sde): pa spyod pa na/ 'das po'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos na/ mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom mi za/ nem nur med cing / mi skrag la kun tu mi skrag cing / mi
46a8(mdo sde): dang la/ kun tu dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
46b1(mdo sde): de dag gi lus kyi las dang / lus kyi spyod lam yongasu dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjesu song ba la mos so// 'das pa'i de bzhin/ 
46b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jog rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra garjod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi
46b3(mdo sde): sgra skad dang / dbyangs dang / chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang / zhing
46b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
46b5(mdo sde): cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba/ rnam par 'byed pa la mes so// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer
46b6(mdo sde): gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing / sgrib pa med pa la yang mos shing yid chas te/ the tsom mi za nem nor med cing mi skrag lo// kun tu mi skrag cing / mi dngangal kun tu dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ 
46b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos so// sems can gzhan dag kyang / mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug go/ de chos yang dag par
46b8(mdo sde): blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de
47a1(mdo sde): yod do// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
47a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad tha dad pa go rims bzhin tu brjod pa'i mtha' mi rtogs so// de bzhin du 'das pa'i byang chub sems
47a3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems can rnams dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang / sems can gyi spyod pa byed pa'i las kyi rnam par smin
47a4(mdo sde): pa so sor myong ba rnams dang / de bzhin du 'das pa'i bskal pa thams cad de/ bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / bskal pa gang dag sangs
47a5(mdo sde): rgyas med pa dag dang / bskal pa gang la de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go rims
47a6(mdo sde): bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de bzhin du 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gang dag rnam
47a7(mdo sde): par dag pa dag dang / gang dag chung ba dag dang / gang dag chen por gyur pa dag dang / gang dag phra ba dag dang / gang dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs
47a8(mdo sde): pa dag dang / gang dag spyi'u tshugs dag dang / gang dag 'thun pa dag dang gdang / khyoglo dang phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang / mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rje su zhugs
47b1(mdo sde): pa las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de/ lag/ 
47b2(mdo sde): mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// 
47b3(mdo sde): bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos nas/ mes shing yid
47b4(mdo sde): ches te/ the tsom mi za/ nem nur med cing mi skrag/ mi dadangang dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// ma 'ongs pa'i de
47b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus dang / lus kyi las dang / lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa chags pa
47b6(mdo sde): med cing sgrib pa med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rje su song ba la mes so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gsheg pa de dag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
47b7(mdo sde): khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang / dbyangs dang / chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa
47b8(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang zhing thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos
48a1(mdo sde): thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las/ 
48a2(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye bas rnam par 'byed pa la mos so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la
48a3(mdo sde): yang dag par mos shing yid che ste/ the tsom mi za nem nur med cing / mi skrag/ mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// sems can
48a4(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yangadag par 'dzin tu 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ ma
48a5(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing / thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// snying rje chen po'i stobs
48a6(mdo sde): dang / smon lam yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin
48a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang tshe'i tshad tha dad pa dang / go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
48a8(mdo sde): dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems can rnams dang / sems can gyi spyod pa dang / sems can gyi las rnams dang / sems can gyi rnam par smin pa so sor
48b1(mdo sde): myong ba rnams dang / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad de/ bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / gang dag sangs rgyas med padag dang / bskal pa gang la de
48b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bskal pa de dag go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de bzhin du
48b3(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gang dag rnam par dag pa dang / gang dag chung ba dag dang / gang
48b4(mdo sde): ngag chen por gyur pa dag dang / gang dag phra ba dag dang / gang dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang / gang dag spyir
48b5(mdo sde): tshugs pa dag dang / gang dag 'thun pa dag dang / gang dag phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag/ pa dang / mi 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rjes
48b6(mdo sde): su zhugs pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad
48b7(mdo sde): la rmongs pa med de/ de lag mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
48b8(mdo sde): 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyang ba spyod pa na/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos na/ mos
49a1(mdo sde): shing yid ches te/ the tsom mi za/ nem nur mi byed cing / mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin/ 
49a2(mdo sde): no// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang / lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa
49a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs
49a4(mdo sde): brjod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la/ bsam gyis mi khyab ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang / dbyangs dang / chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes
49a5(mdo sde): song ba la mos so// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de/ ngag gi sems kyi las/ dus thams cad dang / zhing / thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / sems can thams
49a6(mdo sde): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye bas rnam par 'byed pa la mos
49a7(mdo sde): so// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la yang mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom mi za nem nur med cing mi skrag/ mi
49a8(mdo sde): dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug
49b1(mdo sde): go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na// myur byung ba'i dus la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ 
49b2(mdo sde): de la de yod do// shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i
49b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad tha dad pa go rims bzhin du rnga spong ba'i mtha' ni mi rtogs// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
49b4(mdo sde): dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sem ngas can rnams dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang /  las rnams dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba
49b5(mdo sde): rnams go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' nimo rtogs so// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa thams cad de bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / gang
49b6(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas med pa dag dang / bskal pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i
49b7(mdo sde): mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dang / 
49b8(mdo sde): gang dag chung ba dag dang / gang dag chen por gyur pa dag dang / gang dag phra ba dag dang / gang dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang / gang
50a1(mdo sde): dag gi spyi'u tshugs pa dag dang gang dag 'thun pa dag dang / gang dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang / mig 'phrul rnam
50a2(mdo sde): par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung
50a3(mdo sde): bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de/ de lag mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
50a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o// brtsa brgyad po 'di dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos dam 'dres pa thams cad thob ste/ thams cad gang zhe na/ 
50a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ lus tshad med pa dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon cing thams cad du khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
50a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / lus rtsi sman dang / 'dra ba'i phyir mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi skyon zhi bar byed pa dang / thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pas 'khor thams
50a7(mdo sde): cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rab tu thob pas bag tsha ba med pa dang / yang dag par sbyor bas slob ma bsam pa can dang / gdams ngag can dang / rje su bstan pa dang
50a8(mdo sde): 'thun pas slob ma mi byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gnas pas/ slob ma shin tu dul ba dang / chos bstan pa la the tsom med pas/ spobs pa myur ba dang / gleng ba med
50b1(mdo sde): bas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / don yod pa'i chos ston pa/ gdul bya rnams kyi dbang po yongs su smin pas/ 'khor thams cad rtse gcig tu sems pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra
50b2(mdo sde): skad 'byin pa dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis mngon tu blta ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams tshad med pas brtan
50b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ blta bas mi ngoms pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pas 'bras bu yod pa ston pa dang / spyod lam mi 'khrugs pas/ glang po che'i lta stangs kyis lta ba dang / spro ba che
50b4(mdo sde): bas/ seng ge ltar rnam par bsgyings pa dang / lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas don yod par 'gro ba dang / ngag gi las ye shes mngon du 'gro bas ngag la dbang po
50b5(mdo sde): dang yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas/ kun nas mig/ dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa myur bas bzung bar 'as ba'i tshig dang ldan pa dang / bla na meng ba sbyin gnas su gyur
50b6(mdo sde): bas/ rnyed pa'i mchog dang / grags pa'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing mthas btugs pas bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang / sred med kyi bu chen po'i lus
50b7(mdo sde): dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'i mchog thob pas/ rdzi ba med pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pas/ sems can la bde ba skyed pa
50b8(mdo sde): las mi ldog cing 'khrul pa med la/ brel phongs med pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston par gyur pas/ chos dang bstan bcos mang po shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas
51a1(mdo sde): me dpag tu med pa dang / shin tu mur thug cing mtha' klas pas/ mthong ba dang reg pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / dran pa dang / thos pangon
51a2(mdo sde): yod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pas/ shes rab mi 'khrugs pa dang / chos smra ba med pas/ gtam rgyun chags pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad/ 
51a3(mdo sde): ma lus par spangs pas// bag chags thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rang byung bas/ slob dpon med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus par
51a4(mdo sde): khong du chud pas/ rnam pa thams cad shes pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag thams cad rab tu thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo rin
51a5(mdo sde): chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtsha na sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
51a6(mdo sde): tshogs gang dag la zhugs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
51a7(mdo sde): bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bu mo sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa dag la zhugs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i
51a8(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub ste/ de dag las cung zad tsam zhig bstan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan zhabs shin tu gnas pa 'di ni sngon
51b1(mdo sde): dam bcas pa la brtan pas mngon par grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang / ldan pa 'di ni sngon sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags
51b2(mdo sde): bas mngon par grubo// zhabs kyi rting pa yangs shing / zhabs byin gyis ma tho ba ni/ sngon sems can gzhan dag khyad du ma bsad pas grub bo// sor mo ring ba ni sngon sems can rnams/ 
51b3(mdo sde): chos kyis bsrungs shin bskyabs te/ sbas pa byas pas grub bo// phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa na/ sngon gzhan gyi g.yeg 'khor ma phye ba grub bo// phyag dang zhabs
51b4(mdo sde): 'jam zhing gzhan sha chags pa ni/ sngon bgo bsna tshogs byin pas grub bo// bdun mtho ba ni/ sngon bza' ba dang / btung ba rgya tshon po byin pas grub
51b5(mdo sde): bo byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu ni/ sngon sangasargyas kyi chos yongasu bzung bas grub bo// mdoms kye snga ba sbubs su nub pa ni/ sngon gsong ba'i tshig/ 
51b6(mdo sde): bsrungs shing 'khrig pa'i chos spangs pas grub bo// ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba ni/ sngun dge ba'i las rgya chen po mthar gyis sbyang bas grub bo// thal geng rgyas pa ni/ sngon dag
51b7(mdo sde): ba'i chos yang dag par spyad pas grub bo// dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa ni/ sngon mi 'jigs pas gzhan dbugs phyung bas grub bo// ma matung bar phyag ring ba ni// sngon gzhan
51b8(mdo sde): gyi ci bya'o tshig byed pa la spro bas grub bo// sku rnam par dag pa ni// sngon dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ngoms mi myong bar yang dag par spyad pas grub bo// mgur dung lta bu ni
52a1(mdo sde): sngon dag pa rnams la sman sna tshogs byin pas grub bo// 'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu ni/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa sbyor ba yongasu rdzogs par byas pas grub
52a2(mdo sde): potshems bzhi bcur tshang ba ni/ sngon sems can la bsam pa mnyam par sbyor bas grub bo// tshems thags bzang ba ni/ sngon sems can mi 'dum pa rnams kyi sdums byas pas
52a3(mdo sde): grub bo// tshems mnyam pa ni sngon yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu byin pas grub bo// tshems mche ba dkar ba ni sngon lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las shin tu bsrungs pas grub bo// 
52a4(mdo sde): ljags shin tu ring ba ni/ sngon bden tshig kun tu bsrungs dpas grub bo// ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa ni sngon bsod nams tshad med pas brtan cing yid du 'ong
52a5(mdo sde): ba'i ro bro ba byin pas grub bo// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa ni sngon sems can la 'jam pa'i tshig smras pa dang / tshig bsdams
52a6(mdo sde): ba dang kun dga' ba'i tshig bsgrags pas grub bo// spyan mthon thing lta bu ni sngon byamos pa dang ldan zhing thams cad bsrungs pas grub bo// spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i lta bu ni/ sngon bsam pa
52a7(mdo sde): bcos ma ma yin pas grub bo// 'bral ba'i smin mtshams kyi spu shin tu dkar ba ni/ sngon bsngags par 'os pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pas grub bo// dbu gtsug gtor dang / 
52a8(mdo sde): ldan pa ni/ sngon bla ma la gus shing 'dud pas grub bo// lpags pa srab pa ni/ sngon chos yang dag par sdud pa'i sems la su rung bas grub bo// pags pa'i mdog gser
52b1(mdo sde): 'dra ba ning sngon yid du'ang ba'i gos dang / mal stan byin pas grub bo// spu'i khung bu nas baspu re re skyes pa ni/ sngon 'du 'jiyangs su spangs pas grub bo// spu'i rtse mo g.yas
52b2(mdo sde): phyogs su 'khyil ba ni sngon mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag 'thun par 'dzin pas grubo// dbu an da snyil lta bu ni/ sngon srog chags
52b3(mdo sde): thams cad la/ snying brtse zhing rdo dbyig dang / tshon chu bor bas grub bo// shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa ni/ sngon bdag dang / sems can gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzin la sbyar
52b4(mdo sde): bas grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sred med kyi bu chen po'i lus ltar kun nas mdzes ba 'di ni sngon de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed
52b5(mdo sde): ba dang / mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dang / gzhan 'jig/ sa pa dag dbugs phyung ba dang / sems can mi 'dum pa'i sdums byas pas grub ste/ bu mo sngon dge
52b6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba'i chos med grangs med pa 'di dag spyad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo
52b7(mdo sde): rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
52b8(mdo sde): cad bka' stsal pa 'di ni nga tshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo de de bzhin te/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs
53a1(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa 'di las bstan to// bu mo gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
53a2(mdo sde): las brtsams te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa 'di thos la thos nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rnam pa'i mchog
53a3(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa de dag la ltos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
53a4(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu 'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba/ 
53a5(mdo sde): chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyi
53a6(mdo sde): khri lnga steng ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// steng gi bar snang las kyang lha brgya stong gis me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/ sil snyan yang dkrol nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
53a7(mdo sde): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan rab tu dbye ba mdzad pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos la thos nas kyang mos shing yid ches ste/ 'dzin
53a8(mdo sde): cing de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ de dag ni ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
53b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro// de ni'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni sems can dman pa la mos
53b2(mdo sde): shing nan tan la mi gnas pa rnams kyi sug par 'chi bar mi 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnams kyi sug par mchi bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su dag
53b3(mdo sde): bar spyod pa dang / chos spyod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ chos 'di la dga' bar 'gyur te/ yid la 'bab cing mngon par dga' bar yang 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas
53b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pasang sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs rgyas kyi chos
53b5(mdo sde): thams cad bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan/ 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod par gyur pa'i chos spyod pa ni ci lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
53b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos spyod pa legs par bshang du gsol de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo bsam pa
53b7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa ni chos spyod pa'o// mdza' ba brtan pa dang / byas pa bzod pa dang / byas pa shes pa dang / snying brtse ba dang bcas pa dang / skyabs bu song ba yongasu mi gtong ba dang / 
53b8(mdo sde): nyam chung ba la bzod cing dang du len pa dang btang bar dka' ba yongasu gtong ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po dang / phan 'dogs pa'i blo dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rjes su srung ba dang
54a1(mdo sde): chos nges par sems pa dang / chos kun tu srung ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos srung ba dang / dben pa dang / gcig pur
54a2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas la yongs su mi skye ba dang / dgon pa'i yon tan la yongasu 'jal ba dang / 'du 'dzi yongs su spong ba dang / sems can rjes su srung ba dang / 'khrul
54a3(mdo sde): ba la lta ba dang / byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po la 'jug pa dang / dga' bas chos la dga' zhing / mchog tu dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la bsam gtan 'cha' ba dang / 
54a4(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la sbyor ba dang / theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa smra ba dang / khur blangs dpa khyer ba dang / sems mi zhum ba dang / rung ba'i
54a5(mdo sde): chod shes pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / sdig pa mi 'dod/ pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa spong kha dang / 'phags pa'i rigs tshig shes pa dang / 
54a6(mdo sde): sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / 'thab pa med pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / khro ba med pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / rgyu'i
54a7(mdo sde): byed pa khong du chud pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / shes
54a8(mdo sde): rab kyi nor gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / bka' blo bde ba dang / 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / 'dud pa
54b1(mdo sde): dang / sems dma' ba dang / bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / rang gi yon tan mi brjod pa dang / gzhan gyi yon tan la mi smod pa dang / 'dod chags kyi rdul
54b2(mdo sde): 'phyag pa dang / zhe sdang gyi tha ba rnam par spong ba dang / gti mug gi mun pa mun nag med pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pa dang / spyod lam dang / spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang / chos
54b3(mdo sde): la rim gro byed pa dang / dga' zhing dad la mchog du dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas la mi byed pa dang / chos la mos pa dang / dge 'dun la sten pa ltar 'dzin pa dang / sbyin pa dang / dul
54b4(mdo sde): ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod
