106b5(mdo sde): ni mnyam par gzhog go/ ldang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo
106b6(mdo sde): bar snang de las bengs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug la shod cig/ sring mo des smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi spyod yul du mchis kyi/ bdag la gzhan gyi spyod yul na
106b7(mdo sde): mi 'tshalo// smras pa sring mo khyod kyi bdag gi spyod yul gang yin/ smras pa 'jam dpal na mkha'i dbyings ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod yulo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams
106b8(mdo sde): cad ni nam mkha' las 'gro zhing 'ong ste/ sems con gyi spyod pa de ci tsam pa de thams cad ni na mkha' la spyod do// de bas na na mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod yul te/ 'di lta ste/ nam
107a1(mdo sde): phyag rgya 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas sring mo de steng gi bar snang las babs nas phyogs gcig tu pad mo la 'dug gi/ de bzhin
107a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ tshig kyang mi smra'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sring mo de la 'di skad ces smras// sring mo gang khyod ni de bzhin
107a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la phyag mi 'tshal bar 'dug ste gus pa ma yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin te 'jam dpal bdag ni gus papa lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar ji nas kyang / 
107a4(mdo sde): byed pa yang med/ mi byed pa yang med pa de ltar bdag ma gus mod kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la phyag bgyi bar nus sam/ smras pa de ma lags so// smras pa de bzhin gshegs
107a5(mdo sde): pa la'ang phyag 'tshal bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin nyid de ni ga su med de/ gnyis lta bur dbyer med pa'i phyir ro// yang smras
107a6(mdo sde): ba/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ smras pa mthong ngo // smras pa ci ltar mthong / smras pa ci rdul tsam yang ma mthong ste/ de 'dra bar mthong ngo // smras pa de ltar
107a7(mdo sde): mthong na ci zhig mthong / smras pa de ltar mthong na cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo // smras pa 'jam dpal gang khyod cung zad kyang ma mthong na/ ci khyod mig rtul lam/ smras pa bdag ni mig rtul
107a8(mdo sde): ba yang ma yin no// mig lnga dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mig med pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo ming ni ma skyes pa yang dag par ma skyes pa sgyu ma lta bu ste/ chos thams cad
107b1(mdo sde): dngos po med pa'i phyir/ de ni dngos po 'am dngos po med pa gang gis kyang bshad par mi bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci chos thams cad dngos po med pa 'am/ smras pa dngos po yod pa
107b2(mdo sde): yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin du ci skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sring mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// 
107b3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir na sring mo khyod bud med kyi lus las bsgyur bar mi byed smras pa 'jam dpal de skad ma smra/ rnam par ma rtog cig/ khyod kyis chos gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med du gyur pa de/ 
107b4(mdo sde): mthong ngam/ smras pa de ma yin no// smras pa 'jam dpa nga la ci snyam du sems gzugs skyes pa 'am bud med yin num/ smras pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
107b5(mdo sde): byed dang / rnam par shes pa skyes pa 'am bud med yin nam// smras pa ma yin no// 'jam dpal de ci snyam dus mas/ mig skyes pa 'am bud med yin nam/ rna ba dang sna dang
107b6(mdo sde): lha dang lus dang yid skyes pa'am/ bud med yin nam/ smras pa ma yin no// 'jam dpal da ni snyam du sems/ sa'i khams skyes pa 'am/ bud med yin nam/ smras pa ma yin no// chu'i
107b7(mdo sde): khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / me'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams skyes pa 'am bud med yin nam/ smras pa ma yin no// 'jam dpal de ci snyam du
107b8(mdo sde): sems/ yi ge gang dag gis bshad pa'i yi ge dag tu skyes pa'am bud med du dmigs sam/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal 'o nad/ 'jam dpal ci ltar na sring mo khyod ci'i phyir bud
108a1(mdo sde): med kyi lus las bsgyur ba med ces de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gal te bdag bud mang du dmigs sam/ skyes par mthong na ni bud med kyi lus de bor te/ skyes pa'i
108a2(mdo sde): lus blang na/ 'jam dpal bdag ni bud med du'ang mi dmigs skyes par yang mi mthong na/ de ji ltar na bud med kyi lus las bsgyur bar bgyi/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung bar yang / 
108a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ 'jig par yang mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / steng pa nyid dang na mkha'i dbyings kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur 'jig par yang mi 'gyur na/ de ci
108a4(mdo sde): ltar na chos thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs pa la bud ma dad kyi lus dor zhing skyes pa'i lus blang bar nus par la gur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni blang ba
108a5(mdo sde): 'am/ mi blang ba'i phyir chos 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ yang 'jam dpal mig ni skyes pa ma yin/ bud ma/ da ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang / 
108a6(mdo sde): yid skyes pa ma yin/ bud med ma yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ chos gong skyes pa ma yin/ bud mod ma yin pa de ni 'byung ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med do// smras
108a7(mdo sde): pa sring mo khyed kyis/ ci srid nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ smras pa sgyu ma'i skyes bus ci srid nas rnam par shes pa'o// smra ba sgyu ma'i skyes bu
108a8(mdo sde): yod dam/ smras pa de ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci'i phyir na de skad smra/ khyod ci bzod pa skyes sam smras pa de ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci'i phyir na 'chad par byed/ smras pa sgyu ma'i
108b1(mdo sde): skyes bus ci srid nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de srid nas bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro// yang ci srid
108b2(mdo sde): nas khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed ces de skad smras pa'i 'dri ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye ba ni bskyed par mi nus dgag par mi nus/ gdags par mi
108b3(mdo sde): nus gang dgag tu med pa'i chos de ni skyed pa'am dgag par mi nus so// smras pa tshul bzhin du 'dri ba ni gang tshul de ni gang smras pa mi skye ba ni tshul te/ de 'dra bar 'di 'dri ba ni tshul
108b4(mdo sde): bzhin du 'dri ba'o// yang sring mo khyed bzod pa skyes sam zhes de skad smra ba bdag ni bzod pa skyes pa yang ma legs/ bzod pa ma skyes pa yang ma lagaso// de ci'i
108b5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ bzod pa ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir bskyed par yang ma lags/ 'bri ba yang ma lags so// de bas na bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags/ bzod pa ma skyes
108b6(mdo sde): pa yang ma lagaso// sring mo byang chub sems dpas don gang gi dbang mthong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug/ smras pa 'jam dpal sems can yongasu mya ngan
108b7(mdo sde): las bzla ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi go ca bgo bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thog ma nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir/ 'das pa'i
108b8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas/ ma byon pa rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi 'gyur/ de ltar bzhugs
109a1(mdo sde): pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa sring mo ci'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
109a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal mi byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// smras pa ci'i phyir/ smras pa 'di la cung zad kyang byar med do// smras pa sring me ci'i phyir na rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs// 
109a3(mdo sde): shing dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur/ smras pa mtshams med pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// smras pa sring mo de su zhig yid ches par gyur/ smras pa gang dag ye shes ma skyes
109a4(mdo sde): pa mi 'jig pa'o// smras pa de la su zhig mos par 'gyur// smras pa gang ma mos pa'o// sring mo mos pa la yon tan ci zhig yod/ smras pa 'jam dpal mos pa la ni rnam
109a5(mdo sde): par grol ba'i yon tan mchis// smras pa sring mo khyed// thegs pa med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to// / smras pa 'jam dpal dmigs pa la ma spyod cig/ 'jam/ 
109a6(mdo sde): dpal gang du'ang chags pa yod dam ci na/ de'i phyir bdag la khyod ni ma thogs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan no zhes smra/ smras pa de ma yin no// de bas na bdag ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa
109a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ma yin no// smras pa sring mo gang spobs pa zhes bya ba de/ ci la spobs pa zhes bya/ smras pa gang dag gis rtogs pa de dag la ni spobs pa yod do// smras pa gang du rtogs/ smras
109a8(mdo sde): pa gang du yang ma rtogs pas/ de'i phyir rtogs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma rtogs pas/ de'i phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal yang gang
109b1(mdo sde): dag gis ma rtogs pa/ bdag gis rtogs pa'o// smras pa gang du ma rtogs/ smras pa khams gsum du ma rtogs pa ste/ gang dag gi khams gsum du ma rtogs pa ni khong du ma chung pas rtog so// 
109b2(mdo sde): smras pa sring mo khyod kyis ci srid nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa gang gi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
109b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur med kyi/ 'jam dpal byang chub la mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/ thob par nus sam/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur/ 
109b4(mdo sde): bcang mi smra bar gyur pa dang / sring mo des 'di skad ces smras/ 'jam dpal cang mi smra bar bya ba dus la ma bab kyis shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub ni bshad du
109b5(mdo sde): ma na/ de'i phyir ci bshad ma 'tshal to// de nas de bzhin pa/ shegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas 'di skad ces bsol to// bcom ldan 'das sring
109b6(mdo sde): mo 'di ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing 'di 'dra ba'i bstan par bgyid/ bgyid pa ngo mtshar na/ bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'dis yun ci srid nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
109b7(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed/ ci srid nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci lta bur 'gyur/ 'di'i ming cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid
109b8(mdo sde): mo 'dis byang chub kyi phyir spyad nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi phrag dgu 'das pa dang / de'i 'og tu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ 
110a1(mdo sde): sring mo 'dis gang gi drung du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa
110a2(mdo sde): dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i drung du byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon+ta bkod par gyur pa dag/ 
110a3(mdo sde): bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bshad kyang / cha tsam yang bshad par mi 'gyur te// sring mo 'dis ni der byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gsol pa/ ci bud med du gyur pa lags sam/ 
110a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ de ni ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sgra dang bral ba zhes bya/ bar gyur te/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'di ni bud med ces mi bya// 
110a5(mdo sde): skyes pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// sring mo 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nga 'dzin thob pa ste/ de ci ltar 'dod pa de ltar bdag gis lus sprul par byed do// 'jam dpal sring mo 'di ni/ stong
110a6(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rdul dang yal ga dang mdab ma ci snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
110a7(mdo sde): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ kun tu snang ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon+ta gyi tshogs chen pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
110a8(mdo sde): du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra bar gyur pa 'di yang de bzhin te/ lhag ma med chad pa medo// de nas de
110b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni bgyi ba mang ba
110b2(mdo sde): bgyid pa mang ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la yang rnam par rtog par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ de skad smras pa bzhin no// de ltar bdag ni byed
110b3(mdo sde): pa mang ba ste/ de dag ni chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa'i phyir bde ba zad par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka'
110b4(mdo sde): stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang ma rtsod gcig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni spobs pa dang 'dri ba bsam gyis mi
110b5(mdo sde): khyab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mnyam par bzhag pa gang la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / ldan par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
110b6(mdo sde): mnyam par gzhag pa de dag ming tsam yang khyod kyis ming shes so// de nas 'khor de na/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
110b7(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems sems kyis mkhyen/ 
110b8(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
111a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'dra bar gyur tu zin kyang / sring me 'di'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul dang / ye shes kyi brgya phrag stong gi char yang mi ngon
111a2(mdo sde): do ting nge 'dzin gang dag la sring mo 'di mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldang bar byed pa'i ming yang 'jam dpal gyis mi shes// rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
111a3(mdo sde): na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang ye shes dang / mnyam par gzhog pas the tsom sel ba dang 'dra bar gyur tu zin kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems
111a4(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang stobs dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i brgya phra ga steng gi char yang mi phod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
111a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gang la mnyam par gzhog cing / ldang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag gi ming tsam yang sring mo 'dis mi shes// rigs kyi bu gal te sems
111a6(mdo sde): can thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang / mnyam par gzhog pas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang 'dra bar gyur te/ ye shes de dang ldan du zin kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
111a7(mdo sde): gom pa 'dor ba yang mi shes te/ rmongs par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gom pa ci ltar 'dor/ ci ltar 'jog mi shes par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi
111a8(mdo sde): shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di ston pa'i tshe// srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun nu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
111b1(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bdag cag kyang ye shes de dang ldan par gyur cig ces de skad kyang tshig kyang smraso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba la
111b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sring mo 'dis ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub
111b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' shar phyogs na gang ga'i klung gi bye ma yod pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs bcu na yod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
111b4(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'dis/ sring mo 'di byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ sring mo 'di ci lta dab de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung gi
111b5(mdo sde): bye ma snyed/ rigs kyi bu 'dis ni shar phyogasu byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcugo// phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du ya nga de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu nga nyid da ltar bla na med pa yang
111b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing // de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mthong ngam/ rigs kyi bu nga yang 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin
111b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rab las/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ nga ci lta ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin
111b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed phyogs bcur byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ de dag da ltar bzhugaso// 'tsho ga zhes so// dpag tu med pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'daso// / 
112a1(mdo sde): tshig de gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i/ 
112a2(mdo sde): tsheng kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang sems can
112a3(mdo sde): bsam pa yongasu dag pa rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po la chos kyi rnam grangs grags par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang ma lhag ma chad kun bzung // 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
112a4(mdo sde): yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ srog chags bye ba drug cu rtsa gzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag
112a5(mdo sde): bdun nus ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// dge slongastong phrag bcu bzhis ni zag pa las ma lus par mas rnam par grol lo// dge slong lnga stong dang / lha dang
112a6(mdo sde): mi'i skye dgu sems can khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas
112a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shig/ gzhan la yang rgya cher shod cig/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
112a8(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma pham ji nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ spyod par 'gyur bar khyod la gtad do// 
112b1(mdo sde): ma pham pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa 'tshe ba gzhes pa ci snyed pa dang // 
112b2(mdo sde): gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyad pa spyod pa dang / spyod par 'gyur ba dang / yongasu brtag pa gzung na sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
112b3(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas shing / stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de dag kyang yongasu brtag pa gzung na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
112b4(mdo sde): bcas te/ slar bzhugs par gyur la/ de skad kyi de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa mang po la phyi mi'i mthar thug gi bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur bsti byas/ rim gro
112b5(mdo sde): byas/ bsti stang byas/ mchod pa byas shing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / yun de srid du mchod pa byas nas byang chu ba sems dpa' bsod nams mang du 'phel bar
112b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ram/ ma pham pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dpe 'di thos nas/ sems kyang rmongs par 'gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur
112b7(mdo sde): ro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan la rgya cher ston par
112b8(mdo sde): byed cing / chung ngu na thos nas mos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas kyang shin tu bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ma pham pa dang mya ngan las 'das nas gang bud
113a1(mdo sde): med la la zhig gis sring mo the tsom sel ba de 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa
113a2(mdo sde): 'jug sred kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos sam/ chung ngu na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ de nyid de'i lus tha mar gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur du mngon par
113a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'das nas kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed par 'gyuraro// mi khom pa brgyad kyang yongasu spong bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs kyang dran par 'gyuraro// 
113a4(mdo sde): gzungs kyang thob par 'gyuraro// skye bu chen po'i mtshan sum cuHgnyis kyang thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang mngal du mi gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam
113a5(mdo sde): pa de dag ni bud med gang bdag cog gi ming thos pa de yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad
113a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dag
113a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ba'agro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he dpal dbyangs dang / dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bAh+ma shrI bya
113a8(mdo sde): ra Na na nA ma ma hA ya na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha
113b1(mdo sde): mo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal bu byed kyi tshal mgon med pas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang / thabs
113b2(mdo sde): gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te// lhung bzed bsnams nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegaso// yang de'i tshe
113b3(mdo sde): mnyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi phyi rol na/ byis pa phal po che dag sa rdul gyi khyim dang / sa rdul gyi ra ba dang / sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhing 'khod pa las byis pa phal po che
113b4(mdo sde): dag gis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa ma/ thong ngo // mthong nas kyang lhag par dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te rtse dga' zhing 'khod
113b5(mdo sde): do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khye'u de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyi 8/ gang na khye'u de dag rtse zhing 'khod pa'i sa phyogs der gshegaso// de nas byis pa de dag gi nang nas
113b6(mdo sde): khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen bzhin du byis pa de
113b7(mdo sde): dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byis pa khyed 'di na ci byed/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khye'u de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
113b8(mdo sde): 'di na sa rdul gyi khyim dag dang / sa rdul gyi ra bdag dang / sa rdul gyi khang pa sam ba dag kyi rtsi zhing kyis lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u tshangs dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
114a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i sladadu/ sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsogs pa 'di bzhes su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i
114a2(mdo sde): dpal gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba'i sems thugasu chud nas/ thugs brtse ba'i phyir sa rdul gyi khang pa brtseg pa de bzhi so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig dang / yud tsam de la sa
114a3(mdo sde): rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa de rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'dug par gyur te/ de'i shar phyogs kyi ngos su ni gser
114a4(mdo sde): gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ lho phyogs kyi ngos su ni dngul gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur// nub phyogs kyi ngos su ni bai DUR+Ya'i ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong / 
114a5(mdo sde): zug par gyur/ byang phyogs kyi ngos su ni shel gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe khye'u chang / sa pa'i dpal gyis rdzu 'phrul de mthong nas/ lhag/ 
114a6(mdo sde): par yang ches dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// kye ma
114a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten bgon po yis/ rdzu 'phrul shin tu rgya chen bstan/ bdag nyid la ni thugs rtse'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyis ni rdzu 'phrul bstan// drang srong che la bdag gis ni// sa rdul khang
114a8(mdo sde): brtsegs bul ba de// rin po che las grub par gyur/ kye ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// kye kye zhing ni 'di 'dra ba// sangs rgyas zhing ni bla med pa/ mig med mig ni nyams pa dang / shes
114b1(mdo sde): rab chung ngus mi shes so// rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i zhing // 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa dang // dal ba rab dkon thob pas na// byang chub tu ni smon lam gdab// bdag kyang 'dren pa/ 
114b2(mdo sde): khyod kyi ni/ yon+ta rjesu slong bar 'tshal// bla med byang chub thob nas ni// rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra bdag gi bgyi// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas// bcom ldan
114b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang shel gyi kha dog dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta
114b4(mdo sde): bu dag byung // de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan/ gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
114b5(mdo sde): gtsug tor du nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal mchog 'dren pa 'gro ba'i gtso bo rnams// rgyu
114b6(mdo sde): ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// thugs rje ldan pa 'jig rten sman slang// deng 'dir ci phyir 'dzum mdzad bdag la gsungs// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis che/ 
114b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal 'di mthong ngam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das
114b8(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / sems kyis smon pa 'dis na/ bskal pa sum stong nyis brgya'i bar du nams kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi
115a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// des byang chub bsgrubs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad las mngon
115a2(mdo sde): bar 'phags pa zhes bya ba 'gyuraro// zhes gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas la ni dad pa yi// bsod nams chung ngu skye mi/ 
115a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ chos mchog blo dang dge 'dun la// gus par byas pa'ang de bzhin no// sangs rgyas la ni dad pa la// byang chub thob par dka' ba med// de phyir byang chub 'dod pas 'dir// 'jig rten 'dren
115a4(mdo sde): rnams mchod par bya/ na ga byes tshig rten pa pa'i// mdo na par 'phags pa zhes bya ba// 'jig rten gyi ni 'di/ na par 'gyur// de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ 
115a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin te/ bsam mi khyab la dad pa yi/ rnam par smin pa'ang de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun
115a6(mdo sde): dga' bo dang / khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
115a7(mdo sde): rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba shud d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsA ba ban de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidi d+ya ka ra sing ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de de btsan tras zhus/ 
115a8(mdo sde): gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shrI ma ta prat+sa NI pa ri br-id tsha/ na ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba zag pa chen po'i
115b1(mdo sde): mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bA ra na sa drang song ldan pa ri dgas kyi nags na dge
115b2(mdo sde): slong bdun brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus
115b3(mdo sde): kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bsnams te/ lhung zad bsnams nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang thabs gcig tu grong
115b4(mdo sde): khyer ba' ra na sa bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer bA ra na sar mthar chagasu bsod snyoms spyod cing / bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i khyim ga
115b5(mdo sde): ba der gshegs te byon nas/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir phyogs gci ga tu bzhugs pa dang / bram ze mo dpal ldan mas bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dad par bya ba/ dbang po
115b6(mdo sde): zhi ba thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu byon pa/ zhi ba dul ba bsrungs pa/ sdig pa med pa dbang po thul ba/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
115b7(mdo sde): mchog dang ldan pa/ mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ mi bskyod pa/ mi g.yo ba brnyas pa/ dpal gyis 'bar ba/ lam me/ lhan
115b8(mdo sde): ne/ lhang nge zhing gshegs pa rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de sems dang bar gyur te/ de sems dang bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
116a1(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ 
116a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs par byon to// bcom ldan 'das legs par byon to// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugasu gsol/ 
116a3(mdo sde): zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa so so ci rigs par bzhugaso// de nas bram ze mo dpal ldan mas/ bcom ldan
116a4(mdo sde): 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma dapham pa bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud
116a5(mdo sde): de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer bA ra na se drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi gnas 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi
116a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor te// zhes bdag gis thos na bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bskor ba'i chos de ji lta bu zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
116a7(mdo sde): kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal ldan ma ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen
116a8(mdo sde): gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyis rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis
116b1(mdo sde): len pa len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnam
116b2(mdo sde): 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di 'byung bar 'gyuraro// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pa/ rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par
116b3(mdo sde): shes pa 'gags pas/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas/ skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas/ reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas/ tshor ba
116b4(mdo sde): 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas/ sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'ag dgas pas/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas/  srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas// skye ba 'gag/ 
116b5(mdo sde): skye ba 'gags pas/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'dra
116b6(mdo sde): shig po 'gag par 'gyu ro zhes bya ba dpal ldan ma/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten dub bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor
116b7(mdo sde): lo 'di grong khyer bA ra na sa drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nag suM de bzhin gshegs pas bskor to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bram ze dpal ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
116b8(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ma rig pa nang na mchis sam/ slad rol na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal ldan ma de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ga
117a1(mdo sde): te/ ma rig pa nang dang slad rol na ma mchis pa lags na/ ma mchis pa de ji ltar 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen tu 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang
117a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten pha rol nas mchi'am/ bka' stsal pa/ dpal ldan ma de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rnam pa mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal
117a3(mdo sde): ldan ma de ni mdo/ dpal ldan ma ma rig pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par 'byung gi/ yang dag pa'i rnam par mi 'byungango // dpal ldan ma ma rig pa ni phyin ci log gi rnam par 'byung gi/ phyin ci
117a4(mdo sde): ma log pa'i rnam par ni mi 'byung // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa ma mchis na 'du byed rnams ci las 'byung sdug bsngal yang ci las 'byung / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta/ 
117a5(mdo sde): ste dper na/ zhugs shing n+ya gre ti'i rtsa ba ma mchis na/ de'i ye la ga dang lo ma dang / yal ga bre'u ji ltar mngon par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa ma byung
117a6(mdo sde): zhing mchis pa ma lags na ma rig pa 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen lags par ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin te dpal ldan ma rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
117a7(mdo sde): kyis chos thams cad stong na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ma shes pa ma rtogs pa dag las mngon par 'du byed/ las rnams yod pas srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed// srid pa
117a8(mdo sde): yod pas sdug bsngal myong bar zad/ 'di la las mngon par 'du byed pa yang su yang med cing srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yang med de/ de ni chos rnams kyi don dam pa'o// dpal ldan ma
117b1(mdo sde): 'on kyang sems can rnams ji ltar don dam pa rtogs par 'gyur snyam nas/ tha snyad nye bar bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sems can
117b2(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston to// dpal ldan ma tha snyad ni yang dag pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la khong du chud par byed pa po yang med de la shes par byed pa yang med pa'i phyir// dpal ldan ma 'di lta
117b3(mdo sde): ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa sprul la/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa des kyang sprul pa gzhan sprul na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i
117b4(mdo sde): chos can no// sprul pa sprul pa gang yin pa de yang gsog ste// brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// dpal ldan ma de bzhin// du gang gis chos mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus
117b5(mdo sde): byas pa de yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// chos gang mngon par 'du bya ba de yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa sru ba'i chos can// gsol ba 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das
117b6(mdo sde): kyis stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byin pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byed pa'i 'khor lo dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang / bskor ba ma lags pa 'khor lo dang / 
117b7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang / ji lta bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang / dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo
117b8(mdo sde): 'di bskor ba ni/ na mkha'i 'khor lo 'di skor lag so// de nas bram ze mo dpal ldan mas tsan dan gyi phye ma spar gang blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor nas tshig di skad ces btso
118a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo nas mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo'i bar du chos kyi 'gro
118a2(mdo sde): lo de lta bu bskor bar gyur cig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad // 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad/ 
118a3(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog dum/ kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / lab rgan dang / shel dang dngul
118a4(mdo sde): gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar 'phags nas slar log ste/ 
118a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas bcom lda na 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
118a6(mdo sde): ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi
118a7(mdo sde): mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad
118a8(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// ma pham pa khyod kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan ma 'di tsan dan gyi phye ma spar gang blangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtor ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
118b1(mdo sde): 'das mthong lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa bram ze mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir nga
118b2(mdo sde): 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas drug khri bzhi steng la sti stang byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur ma byed la chung med byed zur de dag las chos kyang nyan par 'gyur/ 
118b3(mdo sde): zos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yong su 'dzin par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la yang mchod pa chen po byed
118b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la 'god par 'gyu ro// de phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dadus na bdag sna ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la/ stong gsum
118b5(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos snang ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung
118b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong tshang bar 'gyuraro// de sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gi don byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasasu
118b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das par 'gyu ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bram ze dpal ldan
118b8(mdo sde): ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa yod de/ bram ze me dpal ldan ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas/ 
119a1(mdo sde): sngon bud med kyi lus nyis la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi sku la me tog gi 'phreng ba gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor/ 
119a2(mdo sde): can gyi sku la yang chos gos gsol te/ de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas lo steng du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// bcom ldan 'das de la zab mo'i gnas rnams kyang zhus so// de bzhin gshegs padzad
119a3(mdo sde): skyo ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang zhal zas kyi tshim par byaso// bstabs pa yang byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig la yang a ti mug ta ka'i me tog dag gis gtor
119a4(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das de las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag blangs// de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la yang ji sri da 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / 
119a5(mdo sde): snyun gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bgron du gnyer te/ bcom ldan 'das des zla ba gnyis bshes gsol to// chags zung zhig kyang phulo// bla na med pa yang dag par
119a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la gser gyi phreng bas gtor te/ 'di skad ces bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par
119a7(mdo sde): ma gyur gyi bar du bud med kyi dngos po las ma gyur cig ces smras te/ ma pham pa 'di yang bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
119a8(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang / bram ze mo dpal ldan ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan/ 
119b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyis
119b2(mdo sde): tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// 6/ rgya gar skad du/ di rgyun kha pa ri prA dza ka pa ri br-id tshwa nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ kun tu rgyu ba sen rings kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// 
119b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis
119b4(mdo sde): brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcigatu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge pa/ bar du dge ba/ 
119b5(mdo sde): tha mar dag gdon bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// de'i tshe kun tu rgyus na rings bcom ldan 'das
119b6(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ khar ba la oM tshugs bcas te/ cang mi smra bar 'dug nas/ bltas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye goru ta ma 'jig rte
119b7(mdo sde): ni las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi bgo skal la spod pa/ las kyi 'ching ba can/ las brtan par bya'o zhes de skad smras pa ni bden na/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ 
119b8(mdo sde): des dge sbyong go'u ta ma rdo rje'i lus dang ldan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar srog gcod pa spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras
120a1(mdo sde): bu yin no/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma sor mo ring zhing sor mo'i bar dra bas 'brel
120a2(mdo sde): par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas spen
120a3(mdo sde): las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge slong go'u ta ma dbang po yongasu tshang zhing lus rab tu rgyas par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga
120a4(mdo sde): ma'i skye bas 'dod pa/ la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i dalas de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong ge'u ta mas sngon la das ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma lces
120a5(mdo sde): gdeng gi dkyil 'khor thams cad khebs/ bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni nges tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu
120a6(mdo sde): yin noHdge sbyong ge'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma seng ge'i stabasu 'gro bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe
120a7(mdo sde): rabs snga ma'i skye bar 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos pa bag med pa'i gnas spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge slong ge'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge slong
120a8(mdo sde): ge'u ta ma so bzhi bcu dang ldan zhing so mnyam la so dkar bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni/ ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa'i
120b1(mdo sde): las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong ge'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma tshul khrims kyi spos kyis lus byugs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
120b2(mdo sde): bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha dog 'chang ba spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong ge'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing
120b3(mdo sde): bsags na/ de dag dge sbyong ge'u ta ma lus mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar glu dang gar dang / rgyan
120b4(mdo sde): rnams spangs pas las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong gi/ de'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dag sbyong gi ru ta ma stan gsum la yongasu spyod/ bcom ldan 'das
120b5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar khri stan mthon po dang / khri stan chen po spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yi no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las
120b6(mdo sde): cig byas shing gsags na/ des dge sbyong ge'u ta ma mgo'i gtsug tor 'phags par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar/ sangs rgyas dang / 
120b7(mdo sde): chos dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / bla ma dang / sbyin gnas rnams la yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te mgo bos phyag 'tshal ma/ mchod pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin// / 
120b8(mdo sde): de nas kun tu rgyu san rings kyis khar ba sa la bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder log su thal mo sbar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
121a1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid 'tshe'i bar du sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o// ji srid 'tshe'i bar du chos la skyabasu 'chi'o// ji srid
121a2(mdo sde): 'tshe'i bar du dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o// ji srid 'tshe'i bar du yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// srog chags thams cad gsod dang / gzhan nor rku dang mi
121a3(mdo sde): tshangs spyod pa dang / ngag gi dbye ba brdzun dang myes skyes dus min za ba dang // 'phreng ba kha dog glu dang gar dang rtse 'dze ma la bstan mthon po rnams// deng nas bdag gis spangs te yain+ta brgyad
121a4(mdo sde): kyis dge bcom tshul du bgyi// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du'o// bdag gis gso sbyong gi tshul khrims dkyis sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa 'di sems kyi rgyan
121a5(mdo sde): dang / sems kyi ye byad dang / byang chub kyi tshegasu 'gyur ba dang / don gyi dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba bla na med pa la gnas par gyur/ 
121a6(mdo sde): cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyed de byed pa legaso lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha
121a7(mdo sde): ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do// // kun tu rgyu san rings kyis zhus pa'i mdo rdzogs so// // bka'/ 
121a8(mdo sde): dang por gtog so// 6// rgya gar skadu/ Ar+ya su bar+Na bA lu ko ma nA ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gsar gyi bye me lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / 
121b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gos thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dgal
121b2(mdo sde): ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyes brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
121b3(mdo sde): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal me sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
121b4(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci de babazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags
121b5(mdo sde): sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan lags sam/ de skad ces
121b6(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
121b7(mdo sde): rnams ni dpag tu med do// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ yon+d+ra dpag tu med pa dang ldan no// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas
121b8(mdo sde): lan gnyis su bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa
122a1(mdo sde): lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang
122a2(mdo sde): ldan lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
122a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med de// kun dga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / 
122a4(mdo sde): yang ldan no// kun dga' bo khyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam/ des kyi dpag tu med pa mnyan pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul shes pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa
122a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi yon tan shes par 'dod dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'bos 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong rnams la bcu
122a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol// dge slong rnams kyis mngon sum du thos na/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
122a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyed kyis me'u dgal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ci lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu 'gro/ 
122a8(mdo sde): bshes sam/ kun dag blo gsol pa/ me'u dgal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ci lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu mchi ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas
122b1(mdo sde): bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod la don 'di dpes bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag dpes don rtogs par
122b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo dperan/ rdzing dpag tshad brgyad stong pa chus gang ba/ bya khras btung du rung bar mu dang kha da cang du 'dug pa/ pad+ma'i lo mas khebs pa zhig yod la/ 
122b3(mdo sde): de nas mi la la zhig gis/ rlung gi shugs las 'das pa'i rta mchog dag dang ldan pa'i lcags kyi shing rta la zhen te/ de yang mu khyud kyi shing yang chul mi reg/ rta rnams kyi rmig pa yang tshul
122b4(mdo sde): mi reg pad ma'i lo ma rnams kyang rta'i rmig pa dag gis mi dbartol ba tsam gyi stobs dang shugs dang / mgyogs pa/ de lta bus rgyug la/ kun dga' bo de nas rdzing de'i nang nas
122b5(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas/ shing rta de mtsho'i nang nas 'am log pa de'i bar skabasu/ shing rta de lan brgyad pa skor na/ kun dga' bo sbrul gdug pas shing rta lan cig/ 
122b6(mdo sde): bskor ba'i yun ci tsam pa de'i bar skabasu/ kun dga' bo khyod chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing / don kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo khyod tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ci tsam pa de'i bar
122b7(mdo sde): skabasu mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing / don kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po tshig gcig smra yun ci tsam pa de'i bar skabasu
122b8(mdo sde): gnas brtan shA ri'i bu/ chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing / don kyang ge bar byed// gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshig gcig smra ba'i yun tsi tsam pa de'i bar skabasu/ rang sangs rgyas
123a1(mdo sde): chos bstan pa/ rnam pa grangs med pa ston to// rang sangs rgyas tshig gcig smra'i yun ci tsam pa de'i bar skabasu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med
123a2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa ston cing / don kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ci tsam pa de'i bar skabasu/ kun dga' bo gnas brtan
123a3(mdo sde): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri 'da'o// kun dga' bo rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa de lta bu'i 'gros kyis/ nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ngal mi bso bar shar phyogasu
123a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin du dalho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / de ba bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / byang
123a5(mdo sde): shar gyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du steng dang / 'og gi phyi gsuM nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ngal mi bso bar song la/ de nas mi la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
123a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ra bas bskor te/ ra bras bskor nas rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / gyo dum med par byas te/ mthon dman med par byas nas/ grong khyer gcig tu thas la/ grong khyer gcig
123a7(mdo sde): tu byas nas kyang yongasu 'brus bkang ste/ byung bur byas na/ kun dga' bo grong khyer de'i nang gi yung 'bru ci snyed yod pa de dag pas kyang / ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sems
123a8(mdo sde): can byang chub la zhugs pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ngas mthong
123b1(mdo sde): po de ngas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag du skye ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten kham
123b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag na 'khod pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ dga'
123b3(mdo sde): ldan gyi lha'i ris dag na 'chi 'pho ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dag pa ngas mthong ngo // de/ 
123b4(mdo sde): pas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ dbyang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba/ dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi
123b5(mdo sde): khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byis pa rtsed mo ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches ma nga ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
123b6(mdo sde): rnams rgyal srid spangs nas/ rab tu 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba sten pa
123b7(mdo sde): dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang chos mang ba'i 'jig rten
123b8(mdo sde): gyi khams dag na/ byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang chub kyi snying po la gces par
124a1(mdo sde): byed pa'i mchog dang / gus pa chen pos lan gsum bskor ba byed pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub
124a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po 'dug pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug
124a3(mdo sde): padag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa
124a4(mdo sde): dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par/ 
124a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba/ 'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag ngas mthong ngo // 
124a6(mdo sde): de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongasu mya ngan 'das pa chen po sten pa dgangs mthong ngo // de dag thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa dang
124a7(mdo sde): gdung 'thun pa sha stag yin na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po la bskor ba/ 
124a8(mdo sde): byed pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi shing na 'dug pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa che
124b1(mdo sde): bo ston pa mtshan tha dad pa dang gdung ba dad pa dag lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag
124b2(mdo sde): tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed gcig mchis lags/ btso// 
124b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams ngas bstan pa gang dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'odas rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang // 
124b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sprad pa spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ kun dga' bo dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang ga'i klung gi bye ma'i nang na/ gser gyi bye ma dkon pa 'dra ste/ 
124b5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dgatu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad/ 
124b6(mdo sde): pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni dkon te/ kun dga' bo ci ltar rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang gi'i klung gi bye ma de dag las la la zhig gis bye ma 'bru gcig blangs pa de bzhin du/ 
124b7(mdo sde): gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das
124b8(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
125a1(mdo sde): rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzog s+ho// 
125a2(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo da dang / prad ny+dza ba ra ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde las sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du// Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ba ri
125a3(mdo sde): brad tsha nA ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dris pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
125a4(mdo sde): lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i kun nas mdzes pa'i khang pa na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gis dge
125a5(mdo sde): 'dun chen po dang / dpag tu med pa'i byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po dang / 'dul ba brgyad stong ma po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang po la sogs pa/ byang chub/ 
125a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i sang ga'i khri la sku mi g.yo bar bzhugs pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tsha/ 
125a7(mdo sde): po 'jam dpal// sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla ges phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ pus mi g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su
125a8(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po gang gis/ 'dul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa
125b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung du 'gyur ba'i bsod nams chen po de ci snyed tshad ci tsam lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems
125b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal bsod nams chen po gang gis 'dul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed
125b3(mdo sde): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung du 'gyur ba'i bsod nams chen por de ni/ shes rab las byung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pa yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'jam dpal 'jam
125b4(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod
125b5(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po de/ brgyar bsgyur bas gling bzhi la dbangakha rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur/ kha'i rgyal por gyur te/ de rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 
125b6(mdo sde): 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / srin po rin po che dang / bud med rin po tsha dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / 'di bdun 'byung ngo // de
125b7(mdo sde): la bu stong dpa' brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'dzem pa rnams yod de/ 'jam dpal de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de/ rdzu 'phral
125b8(mdo sde): che ba yin no/ 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems
126a1(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad kyang bsod nams che zhing mthu chen por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgyar bsgyur bas/ brgya byin lha
126a2(mdo sde): dbang por 'gyur te/ de ltar lha'i dbang po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che'o// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi phung po dang ldan
126a3(mdo sde): bar gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du bsgyur bas/ gang 'dod pa'i khamasu bstan pas/ go bar byed pa/ 
126a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po bdud du 'gyur te/ de ltara'adod pa'i khams kyi dbang po bdud ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing ma thu che'o// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
126a5(mdo sde): na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud kyi bsod/ nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i
126a6(mdo sde): bsod nams brgya stong du bsgyur bas/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams stong byams pas khyab pa stong gi bdag po tshangs par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can
126a7(mdo sde): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad / stong gi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thad skyed nam su gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du bsgyur bas
126a8(mdo sde): gang steng gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khyams byams pas khyab pa stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag
126b1(mdo sde): thabs cad stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya
126b2(mdo sde): stong du bsgyur bas/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab pa tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog tu
126b3(mdo sde): 'gyu ro/ 'jam dpral dbang phyug chen po la ltos// nam bskal pa 'jig pa na/ bskal pa'i chu 'byung ba de'i tshe/ byis par gyi bskal pa gcig tu char 'bab cing // chu'i thigs pa 'byung
126b4(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus gang bar byed/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du chus gang bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i thigs pa de dag thams cad kyang tshangs pa
126b5(mdo sde): dbang phyug chen po'i mchog des sheso// de ltar ye shes chen po dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che mthu che ba yin te/ dge kha'i rtsa ba chungs ni dbang phyug chen por mi 'gyuro// 'jam
126b6(mdo sde): dpal snying gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed pa de dag thams cad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan
126b7(mdo sde): bar gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng du mar bsgyur bas mthu chen po thob pa'i sangs rgyasu
126b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta re shig zhog ste/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha'// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 
127a1(mdo sde): sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ rang sangs rgyas mthu chen po thob pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi
127a2(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha mar gyur pa gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal
127a3(mdo sde): na mkha'i khams kyi mtha' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / drod ga shar las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / 
127a4(mdo sde): gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes so/ dad pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes med 'jugasu med min gyi/ sems can ji snyed de dag thams cad
127a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha mar gyur pa'i bsod na mas kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi sa sum ma
127a6(mdo sde): wa gri brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la/ spu'i khung bu brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu/ 
127a7(mdo sde): re re nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur
127a8(mdo sde): bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul dpe byad bzang po gcig tu 'gyu ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad nu re re nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal dpe byad
127b1(mdo sde): bzang po brgyad nur gtogs pa'i gang bsod nams kyi phung po ci snyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gam zhabs gcig
127b2(mdo sde): rimo rdzas kyi mtshan du 'gyur ro// de ltar ri mo rjes kyi mtshan brgyad nul/ 'di lta ste/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u dang / phreng ba dang / kyo bzang dang / cod pan dang / dbyig te
127b3(mdo sde): dang bum pa dang / glang po dang / rta dang / stag dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / ru sbal dang / rma bya dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang ti'u dang / tsA sha dang / ngur ba dang / ne tse dang / ngang ba dang / thi
127b4(mdo sde): ba dang / nas dang / sman chen po dang / 'od ma dang / ba men da / klu dang / ra dang / khyu mchog dang / ri dang / bil ba dang /  shing dang / ri dgas nag po dang / nor bu rin po che dang / ral
127b5(mdo sde): gyi mchog dang / rdo rje dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / shag / dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / gshol dang / gtun dang / sta re dang / zhags pa dang / glu dang / mu tig gi rgyan dang / sprin
127b6(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 'khor srung po dang / chu'i lha dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / nor sbyin dang / drang srong chen po dang // dpal dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / ma dang / 
127b7(mdo sde): rlung dang / pad+mo dang / g.yung drung dang / gru gsum dang / dge ba'i stan dang / me long dang / rnga yab dang / rtsa dur ba dang / pu ro da sha dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rnga dang / dung dang / mri dang ga dang / gdu bu
127b8(mdo sde): dpa dpung brgyan dang / rna cha dang / sor du ba dang / rna cha byang drul can dang / me tog babang po dang / dpag bsam shing dang 'khor lo'i dpung gi seng ge dang / 'di rnams nor mo rjes kyi mtshan brgyad / 
128a1(mdo sde): nu yin te/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'byung // 'jam dpal gang mtshan brgyad bcu'i ri mor gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung / 
128a2(mdo sde): por gyur pa'i/ bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig tu 'gyur te/ de bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i
128a3(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis re rer 'gyuraro// 'di lta ste/ dbu'i gtsug tor dang / dbu skra mthu mthing la g.yas phyogasu 'khyil pa dang / 'phral ba mnyam pa dang / kha dog gis brgyan pa dang / smin
128a4(mdo sde): mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang / spyan mthen mthing la ba'i rdzi ma 'dra dab dang / so bzhi bcu thags bzang ba dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / lce che zhing
128a5(mdo sde): srab pa dang / ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang / shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / spu khung bu re re nas skye ba dang / pho mtshan mi snang bar nub pa dang / brla gang zhing zlum pa dang / 
128a6(mdo sde): byin pa ri dgas kyi rgyal po e ne ya 'dra ba dang / zhabs rting pa che ba dang / zhabs dang phyag gi mthil 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang / zhabs dang phyag gi sor mo'i bar dra ba 'brel ba dang / zhabs dang
128a7(mdo sde): phyag gi sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi steng mtho ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / dpung mgo zlum pa dang / bdun mtho ba dang / lpags pa srab la gsar gyi kha dog 'dra ba dang / ma btud par
128a8(mdo sde): phyag pus me'i lha nga sa la reg pa dang / zhabs rab tu gnas pa dang / zhabs dang phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / 'di dag ni skyes bu chen po'i
128b1(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyisu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung por gang gyur pa'i bsod
128b2(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po de/ grangs med par bsgyur ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgyur ba dang / dpag tu med par bsgyur ba dang / brjod du med par bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos
128b3(mdo sde): kyi dung du 'gyur ro// chos kyi dung des 'dul ba'i dbang du de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par dbyangs kyis rig par byed do// dbyings kyis ci lta ba de bzhin du 'od dang
128b4(mdo sde): skus kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal de ltar shes rab chen po las byung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pas/ thabs mkhas pa dang smon lam gyis bskyed pa/ tshul khrims
128b5(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa bsgoms pa'i khyad par las yang dag par skyes pa/ bsod nams chen po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sang / sa rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'jam
128b6(mdo sde): dpal rgyu gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/ smon lam gyi dbang dang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu
128b7(mdo sde): smin pa'i dbang ngo // 'jam dpal rgyu de gnyis kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par
128b8(mdo sde): 'phags pa ci lta ba/ de bzhin du chos bstan pa yang / khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa ci lta ba de bzhin du 'on kyang khyad par du 'phags pa
129a1(mdo sde): yin no// 'jam dpal ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od khyad par du 'phags pa de bzhin du spyod pa yang khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de
129a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni skus 'jig rten thams cad du khyab pa yin te/ 'jam dpal kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod pa'i bye brag gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur
129a3(mdo sde): ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod pa'i bye brag de dang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal mtshan gyi bye brag gang dang gang gis sems can rnams
129a4(mdo sde): 'dul bar 'gyur ba mtshan gyi bye brag de dang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs
129a5(mdo sde): su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de dang de lta bur de bzhi/ na gshegs pa chos ston par sems can rnams kyis/ shaso// 'jam dpal spyod pa gang gis sems can rnams
129a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jug pa dang / 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la de bzhin gshegs pa gnas par sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin
129a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang / skye bo mang me la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dang
129a8(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir skye'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan
129b1(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa gang zag zla med pa/ khams gsum na mgon po'i mchog/ sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad
129b2(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten gyi chos mi bskyod pa/ nam mkha' ltar mi gos pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam par 'os pa/ lta 'dod pa/ blta na sdug pa/ 'di 'dra ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa rab du rnyed do// bde
129b3(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa rnyed pa rab tu rnyedado// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dga'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang // 
129b4(mdo sde): dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon dbar bstod do// // 'phags pa dajam dpal gyis dris pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / 
129b5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ nan da pra pra dz+ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo// thams cad mkhye na pa la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
129b6(mdo sde): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sar skya'i gnas kyi n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang / shams thabs mnams te/ lhung gzed bsnams nas/ phyi
129b7(mdo sde): bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / sar skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs pa
129b8(mdo sde): dang / rigs kyi bu dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ris pa sa pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol te/ 
130a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das churang gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa leg so// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhug su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// 
130a2(mdo sde): de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka'
130a3(mdo sde): stsal to// dga' bo ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / dga' bos gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa
130a4(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu spong ba yin no// 'dod chags dang / sdang dang / gti mug rab tu sel ba yin no// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa
130a5(mdo sde): dang / sgyu dang / g.ye'i mun pas bsdus pa'i dri ma thams ca de 'khru ba yin no// lo tog thams cad kyi sa gzhi lta/ bur yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yin no// rin po che thams cad
130a6(mdo sde): kyi 'byung gnas yin no// bde ba thams kyi yid bzhin nor bu yin no// yon tan thams cad kyi go 'phang gi gnas yin// sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa yin no// 'byung po thams cad
130a7(mdo sde): kyi yid brtan pa yin no// srog chags thams cad la mi 'jig pa sbyin pa yin no// sems can dbul po thams cad kyi bum pa yin no// skyabs med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin no// kun tu/ 
130a8(mdo sde): tshol bas 'phongs pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyams thag pa rnams kyi bsti sa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba yin no// 
130b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no// thar par 'gro ba rnams kyi lam yin no// sems can dag pa rnams kyi bsnyen pa bya ba yin no// snod gyur pa rnams kyis bstan par bya ba yin no// ngan
130b2(mdo sde): song gi sgo gcod pa yin no// mtho ros dang thar pa'i ske 'byed pa yin// lha'i 'gro ba rnams kun tu 'gengs pa yin// sdug bsngal thams cad kun tu gcod pa yin no// srid pa'i bcing
130b3(mdo sde): bas bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba'i khyim yin no// thar pa'i yang dag par sdom pa yin no// mya ngan
130b4(mdo sde): las 'das pa la bsnyen pa yin no// rgyun nye bar bcod ba yin no// nyon mongs pa rnams sreg pa yin no// dbu rgyas rnams 'byin pa yin no// lta ba ngan pa'i drang rnams
130b5(mdo sde): 'jig par byed pa yin no// bdud kyi rgyal mtshan stsol/ ba yin no// bzod pa smra ba sgreng ba yin no// 'khor ba 'i 'khor lo ldog par byed pa yin no// chos kyi 'khor lo
130b6(mdo sde): bskor bar byed pa yin no// nu zhe'i rgya mtsho skems pa yin no// rus pa'i ri 'jig par byed pa yin no// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' yin no// phung po'i khur 'jog
130b7(mdo sde): pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin pa yin no// khyim gyi gzeb du bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin// gnod pa'i tshor ba rnams zad par byed pa yin
130b8(mdo sde): no/ the tsom rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma brtan por gyur pa rnams gcod pa yin no// rga shis 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa yin no// sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa yin no// 
131a1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses pa rnams kyi bde ba dang / mi 'jig pa'i 'gram yino// 'dod pa'i khams las rgal bar byed pa yin no// gzug
131a2(mdo sde): kyi khams las yang dag par rgal bar byed pa yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams las rnam par rgal bar byed pa yino// don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa mchog thob par byed pa yin te/ 
131a3(mdo sde): dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mig lta bu yin no// gti mug gi mun pa'i sgron ma yin no// rgyud dag par byed pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu
131a4(mdo sde): zhi bar byed pa yino// lam ster ba rnams la lam kun tu ston pa yin no// chos thams cad kyi de kho na ston pa yin no// bdud po thams cad rnam par 'grol bar byed pa yin no// ma
131a5(mdo sde): rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no// mi sha sa pa'i rab rib kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa rnams 'dral bar byed pa yin no// le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la rtsom par
131a6(mdo sde): byed pa yin no// tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyo bar byed pa yin no// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yino// brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams mchog tu dag
131a7(mdo sde): ba yin no// nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba rnams rab tu dga' ba yin no// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mchog tu chog shes par byed pa yin no// nyen mongs pa'i dgra 'joms par
131a8(mdo sde): byed pa rnams kyi mtshon cha yin no// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams mchog tu rgyal bar byed pa yin no// gnas med pa rnams kyi gnaso// skyob pa med pa rnams kyi skyob pa yin no// 'jigs pas 'brel pa
131b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis mi 'jig par byed pa yin no// skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no// sdug bsngal gyi bde ba'i yo byad yin// 'khor ba'i bcing bas bcings pa rnams 'grol bar byed pa yin te// 
131b2(mdo sde): dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// lha dang mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas pa yin no// mi'i dbang po rnams kyis mchod pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgengs pa yi no// khyim gyi gnas yongs
131b3(mdo sde): su gtong ba yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam 'dren pa yino// skra'i khur 'dreg pa yin no// gos ngur smrig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin/ rigs pa la brtson pa brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin no// 
131b4(mdo sde): 'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin no// bdud sdig toH/ na rnams kyi grags pa 'jom pa yin no// lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu
131b5(mdo sde): yin no// ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bde ba bas kyang ches khyad/ bar du 'phags par bde ba yin na/ dga' bo gzhan yang dal
131b6(mdo sde): ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang shin tu rnyed par bka' ba yin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni de bas kyang ches rnyed par bka' ba yin no// dga' bo thar pa 'dod pa rgyal po'i drang srong
131b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa rnams kyang btsun me'i 'khor dang bcas te sa bor nas rab tu byung // de bzhin du khyim bdag dang / bram ze'i
131b8(mdo sde): tshogs gzhan rnams kyang khyim rnams bor nas rab tu byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni khyim par mchis la/ sbyin bdag
