132a1(mdo sde): stsal/ bsod nams dag bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha
132a2(mdo sde): dang / snyan gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
132a3(mdo sde): kyis khams gsum pa gang dag yin pa'i 'jig rten gang bar 'gyur la// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las lo brgyar 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan
132a4(mdo sde): dang / nad kyis gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed na/ dga' bo de ni byung bar nges par 'byung ba'i sems kyi bcu drug gi char yang mi bod do// dga' bo khyod kyis rab
132a5(mdo sde): tu byung / dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig/ dga' bo dpar na sa chen po 'di chu gcig pur rgya mtshor gyur la/ de na ru sbal
132a6(mdo sde): zhar ba gcig kyang yod/ de na gnya' shing gi bu ga gcig pa gcig kyang rgyu la/ rus sbal zhar de ji skad du/ gnya' shing gi bu ga der mgrin pa chud par bya'o snyam du sems skye zhing / gnya'
132a7(mdo sde): shing bu ga can de yang rlung gis bskyed nas/ phyogs phyogasu rgyug par byed pa na/ dga' bo rgyal rkyen zhig gis ru sbal zhar ba de'i mgrin pa gnya' shing gi bu ga dar 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ dag
132a8(mdo sde): bopo mo nyid thob pa ni ma yin no// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin no// dga' bo khyod kyis mi nyid shin tu rnyed dka' ba dang / de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na/ dga' bo
132b1(mdo sde): khyod kyis rab tu byung // dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed// dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ nga la mi gnyis ma byed cig/ dper na 'ga' zhig gis khab kyi mig gnam du bstan te/ nyungs dkar gyi 'bru
132b2(mdo sde): rnams 'thor bar byed/ dga' bo rgyal rgyan zhig gis der nyungs kar gyi 'bru gang yin pa gcig chud par 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo ma nyid rnyed pa ni ma yin no// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin ni/ 
132b3(mdo sde): dga' bo nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang / de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na/ dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung // dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed/ dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ 
132b4(mdo sde): nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskal pa bya ba stong dang ni/ brgya dang khrag khrig dag tu yang / sangs rgyas sgra ni mi thos na/ sangs rgyas mthong ba ga la zhig/ u dum
132b5(mdo sde): ba ra'i me tog ni// shing las shin tu rnyed dka' ltar/ de ba ni na sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste// khyed kyis nga ni rnyed gyur na/ dga' bo khyed kyis rab tu byung // dal ba shin tu rnyed dka'
132b6(mdo sde): ste/ dga' be sten pa mngon gyur pa/ ngal mi mnyes ma byed cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo kha spu bregs te/ gos drir smug thogs te/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'i yang dag par dad pa kha nas na/ 
132b7(mdo sde): khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / rigs kyi bu dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
132b8(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do// / dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo/ rdzogas+ho// // 'di bka' dang por gtogs so// 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsin t+ya rA dza sU tran nA ma ma hA yA na
133a1(mdo sde): s+yA/ bad shad du/ 'phags pa pasam kyis ma khyab par rgyal ba'i ma gas bya lag pa chen pa'i mang// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
133a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma gad+ha/ chos kyi dbyed dgon pa na/ byang chub kyi snying po na seng ge khri rdo rje dang / ner bu rin po chas
133a3(mdo sde): spros pa'i pad+ma'i snying pa'i gdan la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi
133a4(mdo sde): rdul phra rab skad kyi byang chub sangs dpa' sems dpa' chen bro rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bya chub sems dpa' sems dopa' chen be bsam gyis mi khyab/ 
133a5(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa sa dpa' chen po dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i dri sa dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
133a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa gcig gang yin bden/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
133a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
133a8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig gang yin pade na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
133b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dzem pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
133b2(mdo sde): rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dzem pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od gzer shin tu stug po
133b3(mdo sde): pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od gzer shin tu stug
133b4(mdo sde): po pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ba skal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi
133b5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal
133b6(mdo sde): mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sang ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig
133b7(mdo sde): go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs
133b8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
134a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
134a2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'od gzer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos
134a3(mdo sde): kyi 'od gzer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od
134a4(mdo sde): gzer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyon zhag gcig/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od
134a5(mdo sde): gzer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i blo gros
134a6(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di bskal pa bgrang ba'i thabs 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis brtsis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
134a7(mdo sde): bcu'i rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa'i tha ma/ 'jig rten gyis khams pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
134a8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i dpal bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
134b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa can/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa'i// byang chub
134b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thos par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan dag gis ni thos par mi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
134b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / ming/ 
134b4(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dang / 'i chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa la ma/ 
134b5(mdo sde): bar bstod do// / 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'i mdo zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i med/ rdzog s+ho/ 6/ rgya gar skad du/ a bya su pA ya ko ru sha l+ya na ma ma hA
134b6(mdo sde): na sU tra/ bod skad du'aphags pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang 'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
134b7(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ 'dze ti'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgyad khri stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
134b8(mdo sde): thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ khri drug stong dang yang thabs gcig ste/ yang de'i tshe na/ bcom
135a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs par gyur te/ 'khor brgyad stong du mas bskor cing mdun du 'dar nas chos 'chad do// yang de'i tshe na/ byang
135a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'ongs te 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla mas/ bla gos phrag
135a3(mdo sde): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la gtsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gal te zhus nas
135a4(mdo sde): zhu ba lung bstan pa'i sladu bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o zhes dri skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
135a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma la/ rigs kyi bu khyod de de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa lung bstan pa de dang de nyid kyis ngas
135a6(mdo sde): khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o zhes de skad bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
135a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa/ thabs mkhas pa zhes bgyi 'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems / 
135a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa ni zas kham gcig gis kyang sems can
135b1(mdo sde): thams cad la khyab par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa ni/ byol song du gtogs pa la zas khams gcig sbyin par
135b2(mdo sde): byed pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad la sngo'o// de ni rgyu gnyis kyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed de// 
135b3(mdo sde): gnyis po gang zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang sngo ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa ni pha rol gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
135b4(mdo sde): la yid rang bar byed do// yi rang bar byas nas sems ca ngan thams cad la sngo ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i sam sa des sbyin par byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po de dag zil
135b5(mdo sde): gyis gnon te/ gang len par byed pa de dag kyang zil/ gyis gnon to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni phyogs bcun shing las
135b6(mdo sde): byung ba'i me tog gang ci yod pa phra mo yongasu ma blangs pa'i rnams dang / phyogs bcu na gang spos kyi shing yod pa rlung gis khyer ba yongasu ma blangs pa/ bdag po med pa de dag sangs rgyas
135b7(mdo sde): thams cad la dbul zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sde bar byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ phyogs bcun
135b8(mdo sde): sems can gang ji snyed bde ba'i tsher ba myong ba de thams cad la bsams te/ su'i mang rgya rjes ler nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sngo bar byed do// gang yang phyogs bcun sems can sdug bsngal
136a1(mdo sde): ba'i tshor ba myeng ba de thams cad ni 'chag su 'jug ste/ gang sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal ni bdag la shod shig/ de dag ni bde bar gyur cig ces
136a2(mdo sde): de lta bu'i go cha gyon zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba de byang chub tu sngo bar byed// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas yi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal na/ de bzhin
136a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar de ltar 'dzin te/ de ni 'di ltar slob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig/ tshul khrims gcig go// ting nge 'dzin gcig go// 
136a4(mdo sde): shes rab gcig go/ dgongs pa gcig go// rnam par grol ba gcig go/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig zhes de ltar slob cing / de ltar de bzhin gshegs
136a5(mdo sde): pa gcig la phyag 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha/ mas cad la phyag 'tshal bar 'dzin to// de thabs mkhas pa des sangs rgyas gcig la bkur sti byas nas// 
136a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur sti byed de/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag la mchod par 'gyur ba de snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang yongasu len to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
136a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni nam zhig shes rab rmongs pa can du red na yang / de ni bdag la yi mi bsod kyi gzengs stod par byed do// chung ngun rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcog
136a8(mdo sde): kha don du 'don na yang / rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig gi don gang yin pa gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi don kyang de yin no zhes de de ltar slob cing // des tshig su bcad pa
136b1(mdo sde): de kha don du byas nas/ sems can gang ji snyed kyis bdag gi rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di thos pa/ de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thob par shog shig/ ces de ltar ma
136b2(mdo sde): zhum pa'i sems kyis smon lam 'debs te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyi thos pa mtha' med pa dpe med pa zil gyis gnon cing / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang len
136b3(mdo sde): par byed// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni nam zhig gal te rgyal dbul por gyur na/ de'i tshe na de chung ngu na gzhan gyi las kyang byas nas/ zas gzar bu gang
136b4(mdo sde): thogs te/ sems ma zhum pas dge 'dun nam gang zag la sbyin par byed do// byin nas kyang 'di ltar slob ste/ bco dam ldan 'das kyis sa che bo'i phyir sbyin pa che bar 'gyur ro/ 
136b5(mdo sde): zhes gsungs kyis/ bdag gi sbyin pa chung ngu zin kyang tham/ sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ni dpag tu med pa'o snyam zhes/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis zas
136b6(mdo sde): gzar bu gang po sbyin par byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rin chen bzhin du shog shig ces/ zas gzar
136b7(mdo sde): bu gang po de nyid kyis sbyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang / bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par byed// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
136b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / lhan cig tu gnas kyang de dag la 'dod par mi byed do// gal te yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag
137a1(mdo sde): la bkur bsti byas pa mthong na de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag nyid khong du chud par byed do// de rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las na/ 
137a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung / sangs rgyas las ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bas/ de dag la bkur sti byas na/ bdag nyid la thog ma kho nar bkur
137a3(mdo sde): sti byas pa yin gyide dag la ni ma yin pa dang de dag ni bdag gi pha'i nor la spyod mod kyi de la bdag gis 'dod par mi bya/ phra dog du mi bya snyam du sems pa'o// rigs kyi bu
137a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ sbyin ba sbyin pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de ji ltar na yongasu rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di
137a5(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe/ slong ba mthong na// de ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par byed/ gtong ba tshe/ na po 'phel bar byed de/ de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
137a6(mdo sde): phyin pa'o// gang tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin par byed pa dang / gang ngang tshul ngan pa can de dag tshul khrims la 'jog par byed cing / sbyin pa
137a7(mdo sde): yang sbyin par byed pa de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang byams par sems dpa' dang / sems ma 'khrugs pa dang / phan par sems dpa' dang / sems rtse gcig
137a8(mdo sde): par gyur nas/ sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang myang bar bya ba de dag la lus dang ngag dang sems 'jog cing / 'gro ba dang
137b1(mdo sde): 'ong bar byed pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sbyin pa byin nas gang rtse gcig pa dang dbugs phyin par mi 'dzin pa de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gal te sbyin pa/ 
137b2(mdo sde): de byin nas chos nyid la brten te/ 'di sus byin/ 'di sus zos/ su la rnam par smin par 'gyur zhes des de ltar brtags na/ gang gis byin pa dang / gang la sbyin pa dang / gang la
137b3(mdo sde): rnam par sbyin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs pa de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa sbyin pa sbyin par byed na// 
137b4(mdo sde): pha rol byin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de nas bco ma ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de 'dra bar
137b5(mdo sde): thabs mkhas te/ sbyin pa gang gis sems can gzhan/ dag 'khor ba yongasu len par bgyid pa'i sbyin pa de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
137b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams len par bgyid pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
137b7(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa ni/ sbyin pa nyung ngu yang mang por byed/ sbyin pa mang po yang dag tu med par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes
137b8(mdo sde): bla ma la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ ltung ba lci ba yang thabs mkhas par srab mor byed do// ji ltar srab mor byed ce na/ rigs
138a1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni nam zhig brgya la/ la la zhig tu sdig pa'i grogs pa'i dbang gis ltung ba byung na/ de 'di
138a2(mdo sde): ltar slob ste/ gal te bdag gis mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba na ni/ de ltar bdag gi sems yongasu gdung ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur na/ bdag gis sems can yongasu smin pa
138a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na/ gnas pa'i go cha de lta bu bgos pas/ bdag gis sems gdung bar ni mi bya'i/ byang chub ji lta ji ltar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de
138a4(mdo sde): lta de ltar sems can yongasu smin par bya'o// ltung ba 'di yang chos bzhin du bya'o// ltung ba gzhan yang ma byung bar bya'o snyam du semaso// rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag
138a5(mdo sde): pa bzung na// gal te rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dang/ 'a ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi po thams cad 'das par gyur kyang / thabs mkhas pa 'dis sbyong bar byed na/ byang chub
138a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ltung bar mi 'gyur bar ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'dra la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
138a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma la 'di skad ces bka'
138a8(mdo sde): stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i bslab pa slob pa na/ bskal pa brgya stong du yang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bza bar 'gyur la// sems can thams cad kyis/ 
138b1(mdo sde): snyan par smras pa dang / mi snyan par smras pa yang bzod cing / nyan thos dang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang yang ldan par gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba lci ba la
138b2(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung na/ phung po de nyid kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal ba med pa de bzhin du// rigs
138b3(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang ltung ba ma mthol cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa ma btang na sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal ba med do// de nas
138b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsod snyoms kyi phyir mthar gyis spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang
138b5(mdo sde): ldan gyi rgyal po khang pa zhig na/ bud med dang khri cig la/ lhan gcig mchis par mthong ste ltung ba byung ba mthong na ma bcab shig/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag la/ 
138b6(mdo sde): zlos shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chung zad kyang mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma
138b7(mdo sde): gzigs pa'am/ thugasu ma chud pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du bdag bcom ldan 'das la gsol zhes tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos de skad kyi tshig smras nas// ring po ma lon par de nas de'i mod
138b8(mdo sde): la sa g.yos par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po shing ta la gang tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan
139a1(mdo sde): bdaga' bo dza snyam du sems ltung ba byung ba'i chos can gyis par snang la 'dug par nus sam/ yang tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba
139a2(mdo sde): chos ji lta bu grags shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa 'di la zhus shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag
139a3(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ ltung ba 'chags pa gang dag bdag gis skyes bu bal glang chen po lta bu la ltung btsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das nongs te/ nongs pa 'chagaso zhes de skad gsol pa dang / 
139a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo khyed theg pa chen po la gnas/ pa'i skyes bu dam pa la nyes par 'du shes ma spyad cig dga'
139a5(mdo sde): po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa gcig/ bu gnyis med pa ni zag pa zad par bya ba la bar chad med/ bar 'dod par bya'o// dga' bo de bzhin du byang chub sems
139a6(mdo sde): dpa' thabs mkhas pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa la bar chad med par 'dod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang dkon mchog gsum la/ 
139a7(mdo sde): gzhol bar mi 'gyur ba'i g.yog 'chang bar mi byed do// dkon mchog gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang // chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog go/ dga' bo gang
139a8(mdo sde): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas po'i rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar 'dod pa lnga'i yon+dan gyis rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod par mthong na/ dga' bo
139b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ khyod kyis skyes bu dam bde/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po lnga dang ldan pa shes par gyis shig/ dga' bo khyod yang tsa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan rgyu
139b2(mdo sde): rgyal po bud med dang lhan cig tu khri gcig la 'dug pa de nyon cig/ dga' ba sring mo de ni 'das pa'i dus na/ tshe rabs nyis brgyar byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po'i chu
139b3(mdo sde): mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi bag la nyal de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po de'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang / tshul khrims dang / stobs bskyed pa
139b4(mdo sde): mthong yang brjed nas gnas ngan len gyi tshig smras ste/ de gcig pu lkog du song nasagal te byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po bdag dang lhan cig tu
139b5(mdo sde): khri gcig tu 'dug na/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do snyam du ltar sems par 'gyur ro// dga' bo nas byang chub sems
139b6(mdo sde): dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po'i sems kyis sring mo de'i sems kyi yongasu rtog pa shes nas/ de nyid kyi nub mo 'das pa dang / de'i khyim du 'ongs te/ gang nang gi sa'i khams dang / 
139b7(mdo sde): gang phyi'i sa'i khamasu gcig pa'i chos kyi sgo sa 'dra ba'i sems des/ sring mo de lag pa g.yas bzung ste/ khri gcig la 'dug go/ 'dug ma thag tu tshig su bcad pa 'di smras so// 
139b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad// da ni byis pa'i spyod yul te// 'dod pa'i sred pa spangs na ni// sangs rgyas mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// dga' bo de nas sring mo de dga' zhing rab
140a1(mdo sde): tu mgub skyes nas/ khri de las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa
140a2(mdo sde): 'di dag smras// sangs rgyas kyis ni gang smad pa// 'dod pa slan chad bdag mi 'tshal// 'dod pa'i sred pa spangs na ni// sangs rgyas mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// bdag gi sems kyis gang
140a3(mdo sde): bsams pa'i// nongs pa de ni khyod la bshags// srog chags kun la bde ba'i phyir// byang chub du ni smos bskyed do// dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan
140a4(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po thabs mkhas pa de sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag pa par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bstabs nas/ stan los langs te song ngo // dga' bi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par
140a5(mdo sde): la ltos/ ngas sring mo de lung bstan to// 'di nas shi'/ phos nas bud med kyi lus rjes te/ stan pa grangs/ med pa brgya stong phrag dgu cu rtsa dgun/ kun nas ldang ba dang / 
140a6(mdo sde): bral zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo khyod rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni
140a7(mdo sde): gang ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba'i g.yog mi 'chang bar rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal ba bar snang de las babs twa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
140a8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom
140b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur na/ ltung ba de 'dra bar 'byung zhing ji lta bu'i ltung ba byung bas
140b2(mdo sde): bskal pa brgya stong du sems can dmyal bar gtso bar gyur kyang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba 'byung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la de spro ba nyid
140b3(mdo sde): du bgyi'o// sems can gcig po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu gtong ba dang yongasu 'bri bar ni mi bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po la legs// 
140b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin nas lagaso lag so// skyes bu dam pa bya/ chub sems dpa' dag ni snying rje chen po 'dis ltung ba thams cad spong ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes
140b5(mdo sde): pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i pha rol gyi yang shin tu ba rol na/ khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba zhig yod de// nags kyi 'dab na lo bzhi khri nyis stong du tshangs par spyod
140b6(mdo sde): pa spyad nas/ de lo bzhi khri nyis stong 'das pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor pa zhes bya bar phyin nas/ de grong khyer chen po der song ba dang / chu chun ma zhig gis khye'u bzang po de mthong
140b7(mdo sde): nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis yongs zin pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ khye'u de'i mdun du brgyugs te phyag 'tshal to// de nas rigs kyi bu khye'u skar mas bud med de la 'di skad ces
140b8(mdo sde): smras/ sring mo khyod ci 'dod/ mos pa de la 'di skad ces smras// khye'u bdag khyod 'tshalo// khos de la 'di skad ces smraso// sring mo kho ni 'dod pa dgos pa ma yin no// mos de la 'di ska
141a1(mdo sde): ces smras// gal te bdag khyod dang 'jal bar mi 'gyur na bdag 'gum par 'gyuraro// de nas khye'u skar mas 'di snyam du bsam so// gang bdag gis la
141a2(mdo sde): bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ bdag gis brtul shugs gzhig pa ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam nas/ nan gyis 'than te bud med das btangs nas/ gom pa bdun
141a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa dang / de gem pa bdun la gnas nas snying rje skyes te/ bdag gis brtul shugs 'di bshigs nas/ sems can dmyal bar song bar gyur kyang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug/ 
141a4(mdo sde): bsngal de myong bar bzod kyi bud med 'di shir 'ong gis bde bur gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu khye'u skar ma de kha slar lo/ ngag ste/ bud med de lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas/ sring
141a5(mdo sde): mo khyod ci 'dod pa byas longs shig ces de skad ces smras// de nas khye'u skar ma lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du khyim na gnas nas slar yang mngon par byung ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas
141a6(mdo sde): bzhi bskyed nas shi 'phos pa dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyeso// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du de ltar ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
141a7(mdo sde): na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga ni khye'u skar mar gyur to// grags 'dzin ma ni chu chun du gyur to// rigs kyi bu nga 'dod pa ngan pa dang / ldan pa'i snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pas kyang / bskal ba steng
141a8(mdo sde): phrag bcu'i bar du 'khor ba rgyab kyis ltas shing spangs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu ltas gang sems can gzhan dag sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba de/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs
141b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa ni/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / shA ri'i bu thabs mkhas pa dang ldan du zin na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka de sems can
141b2(mdo sde): dumyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sal gyi gsung rab la dge slong dri ma med pa
141b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de dgon pa'i brag pug cig na gnas pa nas/ rgyang mi ring ba zhig na drang srong lnga gnas pa la/ de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po byung / dus ma yin pa'i char pa
141b4(mdo sde): yang tshor bab pa dang / de nas bud med gnyis shig char pa'i skyabs kyi phyir dge slong dri ma med pa'i brag phug tu zhugs tre/ slar byung ba dang drang srong rnams kyis mthong nas/ a ma'o// 
141b5(mdo sde): dge slong dri ma med pa 'di sdig 'dod pa'o// tshangs par spyod// pa ma yin pa'o zhes yid byung bar gyur te// de nas dag slong dri ma med pa'i sems kyis drang srong de dag gi sems kyi
141b6(mdo sde): yongasu rtog pa shes nas/ de'i tshe na mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags de nas drang srong de dag gis dge slong dri ma med par snang gi nam ka la 'dug pa mthong nas/ bdag
141b7(mdo sde): cag gi gtsug lag las 'byung ba ltar na// mi tshangs par spyod pa yin pa na mkha' la 'phags mi nuso snyam du sems par gyur nas/ de'i tshe yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshag so// / 
141b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri ma med pa na mkha' la ma 'phagasu zin na/ de'i tshe drang srong lnga'i lus sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ 
142a1(mdo sde): de ma da dus na/ dge slong nga ma med pa zhes bya ba de gzhan du gyur pa snyam du khyed de ltar ma lta zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de'i mo dge slong / 
142a2(mdo sde): dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang me'u dgal gyi bu na mkha' la 'phag su zin na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar yang mi
142a3(mdo sde): 'gyur rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' thebs mkhas pa'i ye shes gang du 'jug pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ma yin par rig par bya'o// gas
142a4(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ smad 'tshong mthabs drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa shin tu longs pa nor 'dod pa ni/ skyes bu de/ sa ner ma grub kyi bar du sems can can de dag gi drung na cinas
142a5(mdo sde): kyang bdag gi lus gtong ba yang ston pa dang g.yo byad/ thams cad kyang mi sbeng bar de lta de ltar gnas// de nas phyis de la mi lto mi sems par 'dor te/ de'i phyir de
142a6(mdo sde): la 'dod par yang mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa yang thabs mkhas pa gang gis sems can 'di dag bdag gis yong su smin par bya bar shes
142a7(mdo sde): na/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la dga' bas chung zad kyang mi sbed cing bdag gi lus stong par byed pa sten pa'i bar du sems can dag gi drung na de lta de ltar gnas te/ nam zhig a
142a8(mdo sde): ma'o sems can 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa yin te/ phyin cad de las lhag par gzhag tu mi nus par shes nas ni/ de la mi lta zhing dga' ba dang / rtse ba thams cad kyang btang ste 'grel
142b1(mdo sde): de las rag lus pa'i sems kyang mdo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byol song du gtogs pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa bung ba zhes bya ba de me tog thams cad kyi dril snom yang gang du yang rtag/ 
142b2(mdo sde): par sred pa mi sgom mo// dri dang lo ma yang mi 'phrog/ de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtse ba thams cad kyang spyod kyang gang du yang rtag par
142b3(mdo sde): sred pa mi skye/ bdag dang gzhan nyams par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa bon yongasu gdungs pa ni kha dog nyams pa med kyang ljang bu 'byung bar mi nus// rigs kyi bu de
142b4(mdo sde): bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon dpa med pa'i shes rab yongasu bsgoms pa nyon mongs pa ni dga' ba dang / rtse ba thams cad la spyod kyang de ltung bar 'gro ba
142b5(mdo sde): yongasu mi lan/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan las kyang yongasu mi nyam so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nya pa shin/ tu bslabs pa ni/ skud pa gcig la gzon ma btags pa'i
142b6(mdo sde): mchil ba sbyar nas mtsho chen por bcug ste/ de gsasang gi tshe na 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe// skud pa de mtsho chen po nas 'dren to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang
142b7(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongasu bsgoms pa'i sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par 'brel nas/ 'dam rdzab chen por ltung zhing de thams cad mkhyen pa
142b8(mdo sde): nyid kyi sems de srungs pas/ gang dang gang gi tshe 'ded pa de dong de'i che/ shaM 'bas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sngags kyi rigs 'dzin gyi skyes
143a1(mdo sde): bu rgyal pos bzung ste/ zhags pa lnga yis bcings pas bcingasu zin kyang / de gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de sngags kyi rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa gcig/ 
143a2(mdo sde): gis bcings pa thams cad gtugs te 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa yang gang gi tshe/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas dga' ba myong zhing / de dag gis rgyas por gyur kyang / 
143a3(mdo sde): gang gi tshe 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad rab tu bcom ste/ shi 'phros nas
143a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mda' dang / mtshon gyi slob dpon ral gyi rnon bro gcig mi mngon par thogs nas 'dron pa mang po'i bsal byed
143a5(mdo sde): na/ de la sems can gang mi shes pa de dag ni mda' dang / mtshon gyi slob dpon de la mi 'di ni mda' gzhu yang ma/ da/ mtshon cha gzhan yang med g.yog kyang med de/ 'di ni bdag
143a6(mdo sde): gi skyabs kyang mi nus na/ 'dron pa'i lta ci smos mi rgod las rgyal bar lta ga la nus te/ 'di ni de dag du mi rigs par sdug bsngal bar 'gyu ro zhes snying rje bsgom mo// de nas mda' dang
143a7(mdo sde): mtshon gyi slob dpon de 'brog dgon pa'i dbusu phyin te/ mi rgod mang po byung ba dang / mtshon gyi phyir go cha lags par bgos nas/ mtshon cha de la yongasu brtags te/ mi rgod de dag la/ 
143a8(mdo sde): 'deb so// des mi rgod de dag thams cad sreg dang phral nas slar yang mtshon cha de lag par 'jog/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha
143b1(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon shin tu thogs nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'dod pa yon tan lngas rtse dga' zhing yongasu spyod do// de la gang dag de'i lus kyi dbang po mthong na/ de dag ma dad par byed/ 
143b2(mdo sde): cing 'di ni 'di ltar bag med par gnas te/ 'di ni bdag thar bar kyang mi nus na sems can gzhan lta la ci smos/ bdud las rgyal bar lta ga la 'gyur zhes snying rje skyed par byed mod kyi/ byung
143b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa shin tu yongasu blangs pas nam 'dod pa de'i tshe des shes rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa'i dra ba dral nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dge ba bud med med/ 
143b4(mdo sde): pa g.yam pa med pa gzhan du 'gro'o// yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ste/ 
143b5(mdo sde): de bsod snyoms spyod pa las khyim bdag gcig gi khyim du phyin pa dang / de na bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog ce sa bya ba khang thog na 'dug pas/ dge slong gi sgra thos nas zas
143b6(mdo sde): blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa ga la ba der song ngo // de nas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog gis mthong ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa'i skad dang
143b7(mdo sde): bltas pa las rjesu rtog pa'i mtshan ma bzung nas/ 'dod chags kyis yongasu bzung ba'i sems kyis 'dod chags kyis yongasu gdung zhing 'grang bzhin du lus thams cad kyang brtul nas 'chi
143b8(mdo sde): ba'i dus byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pas/ bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog mthong ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam
144a1(mdo sde): par rtog pabyung ba dang / de'i ched la chags pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin zhes dran pa skyes nas ci mig de chags pa'am zhen/ mig kyang tshor ba med pa/ byed pa med
144a2(mdo sde): pa/ 'dus byas pa/ shi phung po ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir tshor ba med do// 'o na rna ba dang sna dang lce dang yid chags pa 'am zhe na/ des nang yang ru byi yang rung / 'dod chags par
144a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba 'am/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yang ma dmigs so// de ma dmigs nas 'dod chags kyi sems de bsal te/ de'i lus pags pa dang / shas g.yogs pa'i rkang pa'i mthil/ 
144a4(mdo sde): yan chad spyi bo'i bar du brtag so// des yang dag pa ji lta bar brtags nas/ chos thams cad mi skye bar rtogs te/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / de dga' ba dang rab tu
144a5(mdo sde): mgu ba de nyis kyis stang gi bar snang la shing ta la gang tsam du 'phags nas/ mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po lan bdun du bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
144a6(mdo sde): song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po'i bzhin du thog pa med par 'ong ba gzigaso// gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la
144a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bar byed pa par snang las 'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das
144a8(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa des ni/ 'dod chags kyi sems las chos thams cad yongasu brtags yong su rtog so// bdud kyi sde 'du'o// chos kyi
144b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor ro// de nas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog shi ma thag tu bud med kyi lus las bsgyur te/ shi 'phos pa dang mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba/ 
144b2(mdo sde): mnyam par skyes so// de skyes ma thag tu gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa yang byung / g.yog bya ba'i phyir lha'i bu mo khri bzhi stong yang bskyed nas/ de'i
144b3(mdo sde): tshe dag pa'i rtsa ba gang gis 'dir skyes par gyur ces shes pa skyes te/ des bsams pa dang 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag ni mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag gis bu mor
144b4(mdo sde): gyur pa las/ de nas bdag gis 'dod chags kyi sems kyi das byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa mthong nas/ da bdag gi sems 'dod chags kyis kun tu zin te/ 'chi ba'i
144b5(mdo sde): dus byas pa dang / bdag bud med kyi lus las gyur te/ bdag gis skyes pa'i lus thob nas/ bdag gi rdzu 'phru la dpag tu med pa 'di dag thob bo snyamo// de nas lha'i bu
144b6(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod chags kyi sems kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'di yin na/ gang bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa la phyag bya ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba
144b7(mdo sde): lta ci smos kyis/ gang bdag rtsa ba 'am/ dga' bar byed pa de rigs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ de ltar bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang dga' bar byed pa ga la ba der 'gro'o snyam// 
144b8(mdo sde): de nas lha'i bu de 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams thogs nas kha dog tshad med pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ me tog dang 'phreng ba
145a1(mdo sde): dang drug pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshad nasabacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsus/ 
145a2(mdo sde): bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo spyad te/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras// sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab// byang chub rab mchog gnas rnams
145a3(mdo sde): bsam mo khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam mi khyab// grags pa rnams kyi skyed pa bsam mi khyab// bdag ni mnyan du yod par bu mar gyur/ tshong dben bu me mngon
145a4(mdo sde): bsod nams mchog/ bzang men tshed dang po dang yang na// pa dang ma yang byams shing yod du mchi// gang dayang sangs rgyas ma smad pa yi sras// dga' bar byed ces bgyis
145a5(mdo sde): mthub che// mnyan du yod dang bsod snyoms phyir mdza pa// bdag gi pa'i khang par phyin pa dang // yidun zhing snyan pa'i sgra zhes te// bdag ni rab tu dga' bos pa shes
145a6(mdo sde): thogs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po dga' byed pa// mthu bo che dag ga na bar mchis nas// mthong ma thag tu bdag gis sems skyes pa// tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod chags ldan
145a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// gal te bsam pa bzhin du ma grub na// bdag ni mi 'tsho 'chi ba'i dus bgyi snyam// tshig kyang smra ba nyid du ma nus te// bsod snyoms de yang dbul bar ma nus nas// tshul
145a8(mdo sde): bzhin ma lags 'dod chags kyis gdungs te// de nyid dag tu brtul nas gum par gyur// lus kun rdul zhing shi bar shes gyur nas// bu me'i pha dang ma ni ngu bar bgyid// ro lags
145b1(mdo sde): par na rab tu gnas par sems// gang phyir dge sbyong la yang tshig cing du// bcom ldan padag ni 'chi 'bo gyur ma thag/ de med dag ni bud med lus pa // 'ad gsal skyes pa'i lus/ 
145b2(mdo sde): 'di thob par gyur// gum nas bdag kyang mtho ros 'jig rten skyes// bdag gi gzhal med khang 'di mchog grub pa// ren rgyu ste de 'dra su la'ang med// lha'i bu mo steng phrog bcu bzhi 'di
145b3(mdo sde): bdag gis g.yog tu thob po bcom ldan 'das// de tshe bdag kyang nga 'dra'i sems skyes te// 'di 'dra rnam smin bzang po lags// de ltar bsams nas 'di snyam du gyur te// 'di na
145b4(mdo sde): 'dod chags sems kyi rnam smin to// dga' byed mgu byed mkhas pa 'od byed la// bdag gis chags pa'i sam sa kyis brtags pa dang / de'i las kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/ 
145b5(mdo sde): de'i tshe bdag ni 'bar ba'i mthu can gyur// bde bar ga shags pa'i ye shes gar 'jug pa// dar ni nyan tho// sa dag dang rang sangs rgyas// de dag sar ni gzhar yang mi 'gyur
145b6(mdo sde): te/ 'dod chags sems kyi 'bras bu 'di 'dran// bdag go bskur bsti bgyi ba ci smos te// bdag gi rgyal ba 'di yi spyan sngar ni// sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub mchog thob smon// bskal
145b7(mdo sde): pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed du spyad// bdag gi yi dam gtang bar mi bgyi ste// dge ba'i bshas gnyen dga' bar byed pa la// mchod pa yangs shing rgya chen dag kyang bgyi// mngon par byang
145b8(mdo sde): chub phyi thugs ma gcigs par// gzhan du 'dren pa rnams la mchod mi 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa dam po kun spyad cing // 'dod chags sems kyi bdag lagangs pa// dodog/ 
146a1(mdo sde): / bud med lus ni spangs gyur nas// thams cad mi 'jigs skyes bur 'gyur bar sheg/ sangs rgyas mthus ni lha'i bu pho de// pha ma'i drung du song ste
146a2(mdo sde): tshig smras pa// dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed// yun rigs dus su sdug bsngal gyur ta re// gang yang bsod nams ldan mchog shi bde// sum cu rtsa gsum po dang skal ba mnyam// 
146a3(mdo sde): 'dir ni bud med lus kyang brjes gyur nas// 'od gsal lha yi bu po mdzes par gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de yi gnas song ste// khro sems nyes pa de ni bshags par gyis// sangs
146a4(mdo sde): rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par// sems can dedag ni mgon skyabs gzhan med do// 'jigs pa med pa des ni bskul ba dang // pha dang mas kyang sangs rgyas sgra thos
146a5(mdo sde): nas thams cad 'tshegs te lhan cig 'grogs gyur nas/ shAkya thub pa'i drung du song bar gyur// skyes bu dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// khro sems nyes pa dag kyang
146a6(mdo sde): bshags byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa la yang skyabs seng ste// bder gshegs rang byung la yang zhu ba zhus// ci tsam gyis na 'dren la mchod par 'gyur// chos dang dge 'dun la
146a7(mdo sde): yang ji ltar mchod// zhus pa de yang so sor lung bstan gsol// thos nas de bzhin lags kyis meche bar bgyi// rgyal bas de dag gi ni sems mkhyen nas// 'jig rten mgon gyis yang dag
146a8(mdo sde): tshig gsungs pa// gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa// byang chub phyir ni brtan pa'i sems skyed cig/ bu me'i pha dang ma dang gnyen pa rnams// lnga brgya'i mi nyung tshang ba de dag kyang
146b1(mdo sde): skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni tshig thos nas// de'i tshe byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed do// de'i tshe dga' bo dag la bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa bzhin du dga' bo nyan// byang chub mad
146b2(mdo sde): bsam spyod bsam mi khyab// thabs la mkhas pa'i shes rab de bzhin no// dga' byed smon lam phyi phyir 'debs pa ni// bud med gang dag chags sems kyis lta ba// de ni bud med lus kyang / 
146b3(mdo sde): yongs spangs te// skyes bu yangs pa'i sems can 'gyur bar shog/ dga' bo 'di yi yon tan ci 'dra ltas// gang gis sems can gzhan dag dmyal 'gro ba// de nyid dga' bo dag la chags
146b4(mdo sde): bskyed nas// mthe rosu ni skyes bur gyur par shog/ lha yi bu dreng la bkur sti byas// gus dang bcas pas byang chub ma chog gnas// bskal pa mang por sangs rgyas mchod byas nas// 
146b5(mdo sde): shin tu gzigs shes bya ba'i rgyal bar gyur// lnga brgya gang dag byang chub la gnas pa// de dag rnams kyang mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// de la dang phyir bde ba bsam yas na// 
146b6(mdo sde): mgon po la ni bkur sti su mi byed// gang dag dga' bar byed la chags sems pa// bud med lus spangs skyes par gyur pa ni// gcig dang gnyis dang gsum ni ma yin gyis// bya ba khrag khrig stong
146b7(mdo sde): phrag mang po ste// rtsi yi rgyal po grags pa chen po yi// byang chub de la zhe sdang su zhig skyed// nyon mongs las kyang bde ba sbyin byed na// de la bkur sti byed pa smos ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'dra
146b8(mdo sde): la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lhun po'i drung du// sems zhe sdang yang rung / sems chags pa yang rung / chos la bar/ 
147a1(mdo sde): chad bgyid pa'i sems kyang rung ste/ mchin de thams cad kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste gser gyi kha dog go/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang su yang rung / byang
147a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i drung du sems dang dam/ sems zhe sdang ngam/ sems chags pa'am/ chos la bar chad bgyid pa'i sems kyang rung ste/ mchi na de dag thams cad kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ba ni 'di/ 
147a3(mdo sde): lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi sa dog/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni do ring phan chad/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ri rab lhun po dang 'dra bar 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dpar
147a4(mdo sde): na/ sman gyi rnam pa blta na bzang ba la sems can su yang rung sre/ nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bstas na nad de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom
147a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin du gang su yang rung ste sems dad pa 'am/ sems zhe sdang ba'am/ sems chags pas byang chub sems dpa' la bltas na/ de thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang
147a6(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la lagaso zhes bya ba byin nas/ dga' bo de bzhin no// dga' bo ji skad smras pa de
147a7(mdo sde): bzhin no zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa rab tu ngo mtshar to// byang
147a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas kyang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sladu slar yang 'dod pa'i khamasu yang gda'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
147b1(mdo sde): smin pa med pa la gnas shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang ma reg la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la yang 'bab par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/ 
147b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa la gnas la/ de ni 'di lta ste/ chags par 'gyur ba/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad la/ 
147b3(mdo sde): spyod kyang de dag la chags par mi bgyid do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te/ dpe chung zad cig gcig gsol bar/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so// 
147b4(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so// bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod spobs par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'brog dgon pa zhig mchis la// 'dreg
147b5(mdo sde): dgon bden rtsig pa 'khor ba'i rtse mo'i bar du phyin pa zhig tung mchis par gyur/ dgon bden chab sgo yang gcig can/ mchis par 'gyur/ 'brog dgon pa de nas shin tu rgyang mi
147b6(mdo sde): ring ba zhi gnas/ grong khyer zhig kyang mchis la/ 'byor pa dang // bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur/ gang dag grong khyer der mchis pa de dag kyang rga ba
147b7(mdo sde): dang / 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ grong khyer chen po de'i shul ni mtho gang tsam du gyur la/ de na g.yas g.yosu g.yang sa khru 'bum mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa de'i dbus na sems can
147b8(mdo sde): mkhas pa zhib pa yid bzhungs pa/ don 'tshal ba phan par 'tshal ba 'byor pa dang / bde bar 'tshal ba gcig cig skyes la/ des 'brog dgon pa der sems can de dag la 'brog dgon pa/ 
148a1(mdo sde): 'di nas shin tu rgyang ring ba zhig na grong khyer zhig yod de/ der su 'gro ba de ni rga ba dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur gyis/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ grong khyer chen po
148a2(mdo sde): der 'dong ngo // ngas ni khyed yongasu drang ngo zhes de skad sgra bsgrags/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / de na gang dman pa la mos shing 'byung ba'i bsam pa mchis pa de dag ni/ bdag cag bstan pa de dang
148a3(mdo sde): yul der mchi yang 'tshal na/ 'di nas kyang mi 'phags la/ gang grong khyer de na yon tan mchis pa de dag kyang 'di na mchis bzhin du 'byung bar gyur cig ces mchi'o// gang chen po la mos pa de dag
148a4(mdo sde): ni bdag cag kyang mchi ste khyod ji ltar ba bdag cag kyang de 'dra'o zhes de skad mchi'o// gang bsod nams chung ba de dag ni sgra de thos pa dang / thos nas yid ches par mi bgyidado// de nas
148a5(mdo sde): skyes bu mkhas pa de 'brog dgon pa de nas byung nas lam de mthong ngo // / des shul mtho gang tsam po de mthong nas song ba dang / lam gyi g.yas phyogs na/ g.yangs khru 'bum dang
148a6(mdo sde): g.yon phyogs na g.yang sa khru 'bum mchis na/ lam de'i g.yas g.yos su des rtsig pa'i rten bcas te/ gra bzhis shul de rgal bar bgyid cing / g.yas su yang mi lta g.yon du yang mi lta
148a7(mdo sde): de'i rgyab nas sgra rnams sgra sgeg cing 'jigs par ston kyang de kha phyir yang mi lta ste/ lam du zhugs pa dang / ji lta ji ltar mchi ba da ltar grong khyer chen po mthong ngo // de lta de ltar de'i
148a8(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thams cad kyang ma mchis so// grong khyer chen po der phyin nas sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don kyang bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'brog dgon pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ de
148b1(mdo sde): ltar 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par blta bar bgyid do// rtsig pa 'khor ba'i rtse mo'i bar du byin pa zhes bgyi ba ni de ltar ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / srid par blta bar bgyi'o// srog chags/ 
148b2(mdo sde): brgya stong mang po 'brog dgon pa de na mchis shes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad du blta bar bgyi'o// chab sgo gcig ces bgyi ba ni de ltar thag pa gcig gi lam du
148b3(mdo sde): blta bar bgyi'o// skyes bu mkhas pa zhes bgyi ba ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por blta bar bgyi'o// sems can dman pa la dad pa 'byung ba'i bsam pa mchis pa gnas de
148b4(mdo sde): nas kyang mi 'phags la grong khyer gyi yon tan kyang 'tshal yang zhes bgyi ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su blta bar bgyi 'o// gzhan dag bdag cag kyang mchi'o// khyod ci 'dra ba
148b5(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang de 'dra'o zhes mchi ba ni de ltar byang chub sems dang / 'a dag tu blta bar bgyi'o// sgra thos kyang yid ches pa/ ra ma gyur ces bgyi ba ni/ de ltar mu stegs can
148b6(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu blta bar bgyi'o// 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung zhes bgyi ba ni de ltar thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus su lta bar bgyi'o// shul mtho gang tsam zhes bgyi ba ni de ltar
148b7(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings su blta bar bgyi'o// g.yas g.yos na g.yang sa khru 'bum mchis shes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar blta bar bgyi'o// g.yas g.yos kyi
148b8(mdo sde): phyogs su rtsig pa'i rten bcas shes bgyi ba ni/ da ltar thabs mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus su blta bar bgyi'o// gra bzhis mchi bar bgyid
149a1(mdo sde): ces bgyi ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams sdud pa la bgyi'o// rgyab logs nas dgra'i mi dag 'jigs pa ston
149a2(mdo sde): ces bgyi ba ni de ltar bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rna su blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du gang sems can ma rungs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la btsal bar bgyid/ bsting bar bgyid smod par
149a3(mdo sde): bgyid pa gzhan dag la lta bar bgyi'o// kha phyir ma lta zhes bgyi ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam pa lhag pa'i tshig bla dgas lag so// g.yas g.yosu mi lta zhes bgyi
149a4(mdo sde): ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas sa mi 'tshal bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas lagaso// ji lta ji ltar grong khyer mthong ba de lta de ltar 'jigs pa ma mchis
149a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar ji ltar sangs rgyasakyi yon tan mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang ya shes la rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
149a6(mdo sde): dang / thabs mkhas pa la bslabs pa de lta de ltar sems can rnams la mi 'jigs shing the tsom ma mchis pa la bgyi'o// grong khyer du phyin nas sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa'i don bgyid
149a7(mdo sde): ces bgyi ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dgas lags bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni ye shes dang ldan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
149a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'od srung legaso leg so// 'od srung khyod kyis 'dir dang
149b1(mdo sde): bshad pas lha dang mi'i skye dgu srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa la gnas pa
149b2(mdo sde): ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' ni gang bdag la gnod par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba'i las de lta bu mi byed do// 
149b3(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba
149b4(mdo sde): gcig gis thogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi dgasung rab las mgo reg 'di mthong bas mchog go dge sbyong mgo rag 'di la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni
149b5(mdo sde): shin tu dkon pa'o zhes tshig smras par gyurabacom ldan 'das de skad smras pa'i don gang lags/ de skadaces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
149b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ye shes bla ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la drod ma 'dzin cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
149b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ji ltar ci nas kyang / sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gnas pa yin no// / 
149b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs khyod la bshad do// byang chub sems dpas mar me mdzad tshun chad bsam gyis/ 
150a1(mdo sde): mi khyab pa'i thabs bstan pa de las chung zad tsam zhig bstan to// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe na/ byang chub sems dpas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag
150a2(mdo sde): tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa tshun chad/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'khrul pa med/ ca tse med/ dran pa nyams pa med de/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa ni
150a3(mdo sde): 'dod na nub bdun gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// 'dod na sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bskal pa brgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// gal te slar yang srid par 'ongs na shes rab
150a4(mdo sde): kyi stobs kyi mthu bskyed pas gang gi che ba/ 'dod pa de'i tshe 'tshang rgya'o// 'dod na phyi ma'i mthar thug par gnas kyang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas
150a5(mdo sde): par shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang nyan thos ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ste/ mas par 'jug pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin zhi ba yin te/ de'i lus
150a6(mdo sde): kyang mi g.yo/ de'i sems kyang mi g.yo zhing bdag yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'dzin to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sems
150a7(mdo sde): can smin par byed cing bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rigs
150a8(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na/ dga' ldan gyi khang pa na 'dug bzhin du/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor bar 'gyur na/ gang 'dzam bu gling
150b1(mdo sde): gi mi de dag chos nyan pa'i phyir lha'i khang par 'gro mi nus nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ lha dag ni chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'bab nus kyi 'dzam bu glang
150b2(mdo sde): gi mi rnams ni chos nyan pa'i phyir lha'i khang par 'gro mi nuso snyam na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu gling du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de yang byang chub sems
150b3(mdo sde): dpa'i thabs mkhas par blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ ma'i mngal gyi khyim du ma zhugs par de'i mdo nyid la byang chub mngon par rdzogs/ 
150b4(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/ de la sems can kha cig the tsom skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di lha 'am dri za'am sprul pa nga zhig gam 'di dag las 'ongs pa zhig ces de dag the tsom du gyur nas/ 
150b5(mdo sde): chos nyan par mi 'gyur bas rgyud dang rkyen de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngal du gnas par ston to// de yang bya/ nga chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// rigs
150b6(mdo sde): kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngal gyi mal du zhugs nying byed de ltar ma lta shig/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mngal gyi mal du zhugs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
150b7(mdo sde): dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs nas ma song bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ dga' ldan gnas kyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems
150b8(mdo sde): dpa' shi 'phos so snyam du 'dzin cing de na de mi mthong mod kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sprul pas bya ba thams cad
151a1(mdo sde): / dang / mangs du 'jug pa dang skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dga' bar spyod pa thams cad ston te/ de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'
151a2(mdo sde): sprul pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gcong mar spyod pas slar yang mngal gyi mal du 'jug ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// 
151a3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ban glang gi bu dkar por bsgyur te/ ma'i mngal du 'jug par sten can dkar po'i phyogs yon pa'i tha tshig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
151a4(mdo sde): thams cad khyad zhugs pas de'i phyir/ ci nas kyang lha dang / yang mi 'dra mi dang yang mi 'dra ba dad ltar 'jug pa bstan/ bar bya dgas te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas
151a5(mdo sde): bar shes par bya'o// ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems da pa' ma'i mngalan zla ba dgur mi gnas par zla ba bcur gan sa she na/ sems can kha cig kyi ma'o 'di ni mngal na gnas pa
151a6(mdo sde): dus ma tshang bas/ dbang po nyams pa zhig byung ngo zhes de ltar sems pa'i phyir/ mngal na dbang po yongasu rdzogs par ston pas zla ba bcur gnas kyi dgur ma yin te/ de yang byang chub sems
151a7(mdo sde): dpa'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' grong dang grong khyer du ma skyes kyi dgon par skyes she na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas dgon pa shin tu
151a8(mdo sde): dgon pa'i bsngags pa brjod par byed la/ dben pa na gnas shing gtsang mar spyod pa dang khyim gyi nang du song bar gyur na/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis lha'i dri dang bye ma dang / me tog/ 
151b1(mdo sde): dag gis rgyun ma chad par mchod pa byed mi nus pa dang / grong khyer ser skya'i sems can dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par skyes so// 
151b2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dku brtol te/ mngal gyi mal du zhugs she na/ sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ni pha ma'i mar mer po las gyur pa yin gyi/ 
151b3(mdo sde): rdzus te skyes pa ma yin no snyam du sems dpa'i sems can de dag gi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dku brtul te zhugaso// zhugs nas kyang rma dang / bu gar ma
151b4(mdo sde): gyur la yum sgyu ma yang de'i tshe dade ba myong ba lta bu sngon ma myong ngo // ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma sha dang brag sha'i yal ga la 'jus te/ sha 'chus su byas nas
151b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' skyes she na/ sems can ga nga dag lha mo sgyu ma ni bud med gzhan bzhin du sdug pa sngal ba'i tshor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyed do snyam/ 
151b6(mdo sde): du/ de ltar sems dpa'i sems can de dag la bde bar bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i mas shing blag sha'i yal ga la 'jus nas sha 'chu su byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'
151b7(mdo sde): bskyed// ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye gnas dang lus kyi phyogs gzhan nas mi 'byung bar/ ma'i mngal brtol te/ dran bzhin shes bzhin du mal nas 'byung zhe na/ 
151b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni gtsang mar spyod la/ 'jog rten gsum pa thams cad kyi mchog yin pas/ de skye gnas la'ang mi shing skye ba bstan dgas la/ sems can tha ma gzhan dag
152a1(mdo sde): yang mi 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dku brtol nas/ mngal gyi mal nas 'byung zhing skyes ma thag tu de'i tshe na gro la rma yang
152a2(mdo sde): mdo/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu brgya byin lha'i dbang pos blangs kyi/ mir gyur pa gzhan dag gis ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu/ 
152a3(mdo sde): 'bar ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu de ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang pos blangs par shog shig ces smon lam btab pa'i phyir ro// ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes
152a4(mdo sde): ma thag tu ma blangs par gom pa bdun bor gyi/ drug dang brgyad ma yin zhe na// rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'a phul ba dang / skyes bu dam par sngon sus kyang ma bstan pa
152a5(mdo sde): bstan dgos la/ sems can gang dag gi don gom ba bdun bor te bya ba de/ gem pa drug gis kyang mi nus la gem pa brgya ber na yang lhag par gyur pas/ de'i
152a6(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu ma blangs par gom pa bdun ber gyi/ drug dang brgyad ma yin no// ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun ber nas nga ni 'dzin rten
152a7(mdo sde): na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar bya'o zhes tshig tu smra zhe na/ 'khor de ni tshangs pa dang / lha mthu che ba dag lhags shing 'khod de/ nga rgyal can du gyur pa de dag
152a8(mdo sde): bdag cag gtso bo yin gyi/ 'di ni ma yin no snyam du sems shing de dag byang chub sems dpa' la bdud par mi byed/ yang dag par 'dud par mi byed pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
152b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam sems te/ tshangs pa dang lha 'di dag yun ring por phan pa med par gyur du 'ong zhes/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten nang mchog go/ skye ba dang / 
152b2(mdo sde): rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar 'byin to zhes smra zhing sgra des kyang steng gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu bsgo ba dang / gang byang chub sems dpa' ma lhags pa de dag kyang sgra des lhags
152b3(mdo sde): par gyur nas/ de'i tshe tshangs pa de dag dang lha'i bu de dag byang chub sems dpa' la thal me sbyar nas 'dud par gyur to// rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten na nga mchog go// 
152b4(mdo sde): dmachog go// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / shi ba mthar 'byin to// zhes de skad kyi tshig smra'o// ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' gad mo cher dgod ce na/ byang chub
152b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni g.yem pa'i dgod pa 'am/ char dag da pa med mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di dag ni 'di nyid dung dang / lhan
152b6(mdo sde): cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ngas byang chub thob kyang 'di dag la lor gyur pas/ da dung 'khor ba stug por las te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba'i
152b7(mdo sde): thar pa'i la la brtson 'grus mi rtsom ste/ de dag da ltar bdag la phyag 'tshal na/ de dag ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur zhes snying rje chen po bskyed
152b8(mdo sde): nas dman pa dang / bag med pa'i sems can dang / bdag gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gad mo char dgod do// ci'i phyir na/ byang chub
153a1(mdo sde): / sems dpa' dri ma med bzhin du khrus byed ce na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pas mchod pa'i las byas pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpas ni
153a2(mdo sde): nges par 'jig rten shes pa'i rjesu 'jug par bya dgos te/ skye ba mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyang nges par khrus bya'o// // 'phags pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ba
153a3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' dgon par skyes ma thag tu/ byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar de nas slar khyim du 'jug ce na/ 
153a4(mdo sde): dbang po yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sbas pa'i phyi ba snyan pa'i phyir/ dga' ba dang rtsa ba chen po de dag bstan nas khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar byed do// gling chen po
153a5(mdo sde): bzhi spang bar bstan pas na/ nga'i rjes su slob pa ga zhan dag kyang dga' ba dang / rtse ba chen po spangs nas/ rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir khyim nas mngon par 'byung ste/ rgyu de
153a6(mdo sde): dang rkyen de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' slar khyim du zhugs// ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma nyi ma bdun len pa dang / 'chi ba'i dus byed ce na/ lha mo sgyu mtshe zad nas 'chi ba'i/ 
153a7(mdo sde): dus byas kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa na ma yin no// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas nyid na gnas shing / lha'i mig gis lha mo sgyu ma'i tshil ba rtags nas/ nam lnga
153a8(mdo sde): mi sgyu ma'i ma zla ba bcu dang gnyim bdun lus par shes pa dang / de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi dzis ta ma'i mngam du'i'ajug/ de bas na rnam grangs dpa
153b1(mdo sde): kyang lha mo sgyu ma ni tshe zad nas 'chi dus byas kyi byang chub sems dpas nyes par ma yin no// ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzo slob ce na/ 'jig rten gyi rje su 'jug pa'i phyir du zad/ 
153b2(mdo sde): kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni stong gsum gyi steng chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gtsug lags gam/ glu 'am gar ram sngag sam/ thabs sam dgod pa 'am/ cha ba 'am/ rtse ba'am blta ba
153b3(mdo sde): gang yang thog mar ma bslabs pa med do// ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' chung ma len ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa dgos par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir na skyes bu dam pa de ni
153b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe 'dod pa dang bral ba yin mod kyi byang chub sems dpas/ ni nges par skyes par bstan dgos te/ sems can kha cig byang chub sems dpa' la skyes pa ma yin gyi nga la ma ning gi/ 
153b5(mdo sde): rang bzhin can no zhes de snyam du sems par mi 'gyur zhing / de dag gi the tsom gcod pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sras ner sbyin len bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu/ 
153b6(mdo sde): me grags 'dzin las sogs pa blangaso// nor sbyin 'dzin mar mer po las gyur pa'o zhes gang de snyam du 'dzin na/ de ltar mi lta'i nor sbyin 'dzin ni lha las shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pas pha ma'i mer
153b7(mdo sde): mar po las gyur pa ma yin gyi/ rdzus te skyes par shes par bya'o// yang sngon gyi smon lam gyis shAkya'i bu mo grags 'dzin blangs pa yin te mar ma mdzad tshun chad skye ba'i tha ma'i bar du khyod kyi/ 
153b8(mdo sde): chung mar gyur cig ces smon lam btab la/ sangs rgyas la dag pa'i rtsa ba skyed pa de yang slu bar mi 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir shAkya'i bu mo grags 'dzin blangs// yang sems can 'di dag ni 'dod/ 
154a1(mdo sde): pa'i nyes pa can khyim gyi bya ba la zhen pa yin pas de dag spangs te/ rab tu 'byung bar mi nus nas/ de dag gi phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
154a2(mdo sde): po g.yog len to// yang 'di ni chung ma bzang me'i g.yog 'di lta bu spangs te/ rab tu byung nas bdag lta ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung zhes de snyam du sems dpar 'gyur zhing / yang byang chub
154a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i nang na gang bud med gzhon nu dag yongasu smin par byas nas de dog kyang 'dza' ba 'di gcugs pas srid pa tha ma'i bar du bdag cag khyod kyi chung
154a4(mdo sde): mar gyur ces smon lam btab la/ de dag gi chos dkar ba de rnams kyang shin tu yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bya nga chub sems dpa' g.yog len te/ de la byang chub sems
154a5(mdo sde): dpa' slas kyi nang na gnas nas bud med bzhi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs smin par byas// lhag ma dag kyang mi ltung ba'i chos dang ldan
154a6(mdo sde): par byas// rnam grangs de'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' g.yog len gyi/ gang bud med kyi 'dod chags yongasu gdung bas yongasu gdungs pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ma thag tu
154a7(mdo sde): bdag 'dod chags dang bral bar shes so// yang byang chub sems dpas ni bdag gi chu zhang dang 'dra bar sprul pa dag sprul nas/ bud med de dag sprul pa de dag rnams dang rtse dga' yongasu spyod cing / 
154a8(mdo sde): bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing yongasu spyod do snyam du sems med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba
154b1(mdo sde): dang bde ba la gnas so// 'di la sprul pa rnams kyis 'dod pa la dga' ba dang yongasu spyod paci lta ba mar ma mdzad tshun chad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa la yongasu spyod pa thams cad
154b2(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du blta'o// bran ts+tshan ti ka dang rta kan tha ka yang sngon gyi smon lam las gyur par blta'o// ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bas mo gtan byed ce na/ 
154b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas pas lha bye ba phrag bdun nu brtul zhing de nges par mngon par khyim nas 'byung bar pha ma la bstan pa'i phyir ro// ci'i phyir na/ skyed mos tshal du song zhe na/ rgas
154b4(mdo sde): pa dang nad kyis btab pa dang / 'chi ba bstan pa'i phyir te// dganyen dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rga ba dang na ba dang ra darmobs 'jigs skrag nas khyim nas mngon par 'byung gi
154b5(mdo sde): gnyen la gnod par 'dod pa ni ma yin no// zhes de ltar sa par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mo nom phyed kyi dus kyi tshe/ khyim nas mngon
154b6(mdo sde): par 'byung gi nyin mo ni mi 'byung zhe na/ de na 'dug na dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phral nas chos dkar po 'dod pas nam phrad na ma dris par de nas 'gro bar bya ba dang / bde ba'i ye byad kyang spang
154b7(mdo sde): bar bya'i chos dkar po'i phyogs ni yongasu gtang bar mi bya'o zhes sems can rnams la bstan pa'i phyir ro// ci'i phyir na/ skye bo dag gnyid kyis log par byas she na/ lho rnams
154b8(mdo sde): kyis nyes par bstan pa'i phyir te/ skye bo dag byang chub sems dpa' la zhe sdang gi tha ba skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de dag yun ring por gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang / ltung bar mi 'gyur bar
155a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ lha rnams kyis gnyid log par byas te/ lha rnams sgo bya nas lha rnams kyis bar snang las khrid pas lha rnams kyis nyes kyis/ byang
155a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma nyes so zhes dad pa ma rnyed par mthong nas gnyid log par byas so// ci'i phyir na/ byang
155a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rang gis ral gris skra gcad can/ de ltar stong gsum gyi stong po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin 'am/ mi 'am ci gang yang byang chub sems
155a4(mdo sde): dpas dpal dang gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te/ skra gcad nus pa su yang med cing rgyal po zas gtsang ma de das thos nas yang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis
155a5(mdo sde): sgra gcad par mthong nas/ khro bar mi 'gyur zhing sus nga'i bu'i sgra gcad ces de la bsad pa 'am/ chad pa ra mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro// ci'i phyir na/ rta dang rgyan
155a6(mdo sde): rnams bran ts+tsha na da ka'i lag tu byin ce na/ tshig shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gsar dngul mi 'dod cing dngos po thams cad la mau lta bar rab tu 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir ro// 
155a7(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpas skye bo pha ma dag bslab dgos te/ bstan pa 'di la gang rab tu 'byung ba de dag nga'i rjesu slob cing dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la
155a8(mdo sde): gnas nas/ rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyi thog ma nyid nas rab tu 'byung ba'i 'tsho'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro// yang rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems
155b1(mdo sde): dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' ni las kyis bsgribs pa'i nyes pas bka' ba spyod pa spyad pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas
155b2(mdo sde): ni nges par sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba bstan dgos te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi
155b3(mdo sde): gsung rab la mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas par blta'o// dgongs pa'i chog blta'o// byang chub sems dpas ji ltar
155b4(mdo sde): dgongs te tshig de smras she na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u skar ma skyong gi ne'u ljang braHze'i bu shing sA la chen po lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i
155b5(mdo sde): theg pa la gnas pa lnga yod de/ de dag sdig pa'i grog/ sa po'i dbang gis byang chub kyi sems brjed par gyur/ nas/ rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag sangs rgyas kyi brtul zhugs
155b6(mdo sde): can ma yin gyi/ mu stegs kyi brtul zhugs ldan pa/ mu stegs kyi gsang sngags la brtson par byas/ bdag cag gi yang byang chub yod do// bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas zhes
155b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid ston par 'dzin to// de nas khye'u skar ma skyeng gis/ rigs kyi bu lnga po de dge snod du gyur par rtogs nas/ mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni shin tu dkon
155b8(mdo sde): na/ da mthong ste ci rung zhes mu stegs can de dag gi drung du tshig de skad smras// khye'u skar ma skyeng gos mu stegs can de dag gi drung du mgo rig la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni shin tu dkon
156a1(mdo sde): pa'o zhes tshig de skad smras pas rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag rims kyis yongasu smin par byas par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu khye'u skar ma skyong ne'u
156a2(mdo sde): ldang lnga po de dag dang / sa'i phyogs gzhan zhig na 'dug par gyur pa'i dus kyi tshe yod de/ de nas rdza mkhan rdze'u byed pa zhig sa'i phyogs de ga la ba der song nas/ de bzhin gshegs
156a3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod cing / khye'u skar ma skyong la tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
156a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung gi drung du 'dong ngo zhes de skad ces smras da pa dang / de nas khye'u skar ma skyeng 'di snyam du gyur to// dkye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin na/ 
156a5(mdo sde): gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod la/ mu stegs can gyi ni mi bsngags pa brjod
156a6(mdo sde): dang rigs kyi cad dag dogs shing 'ong du mi btub par 'gyuraro snyam nas khye'u skar ma skyong gis thog ma'i yi dam de nyid srung zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i ye shes dang rgyu 'thun pa'i thabs
156a7(mdo sde): mkhas pas mgo rag la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni shin tu dkon pa'o zhes de skad kyi tshig smras// ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes dang rgyu 'thun pa yin zhe na/ 
156a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ byang chub tu 'du shes par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas 'du shes pa med/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shesu 'du shes pa med/ 
156b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpar yang mthong / byang chub nang du yang mi mthong ngo // byang chub phyi log su yang mi mthong / byang chub nang dang byi log su yang mi mthong ste/ byang chub ni shin tu steng
156b2(mdo sde): snyam du sems shing / khye'u skar ma skyong des chos thams cad ma dmigs nas/ thabs mkhas pas mgo rag la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni shin tu dkon pa'o zhes de skad kyi tshig smras
156b3(mdo sde): so/ de nas khye'u skar ma dang ne'u ljang lnga po de dag dang lhan cig du chu 'gram zhig na gnas pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag kun 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba'i phyir rdza
156b4(mdo sde): mkhan rje'u byed pas/ skar ma skyong mi 'gro ba dang skra nas ba zung ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der song ste/ gzhon nu lnga po de dag gis kyang rdza mkhan
156b5(mdo sde): rje'u byed pa de la byugs ma byed bzhin du yang dag par rdzog/ sa pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
156b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ma thag tu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun gyis dad pa rnyed do// de dag dang pa rnyed nas khye'u skar ma skyong la 'di 'dra ba'i ston pa bzhugs na/ thog mar
156b7(mdo sde): mi sbran par zhes gshe bar gyur to// de nas bram ze'i bu shing sA la chen po lta bu lnga po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsob yang ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dpal dang gzi brjid dang / 
156b8(mdo sde): spobs pa mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis ci nas kyang
157a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag gis mi skye ba'i tshod la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs
157a2(mdo sde): bshad do// rigs kyi bu de 'di lta ste/ nga ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shas kyis lung bstan to// rigs kyi bu gal te khye'u skar ma skyong gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod du zin na/ 
157a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi drung du 'gro ba'i gnas dang skabs med/ rigs kyi bu de lta ste/ byang chub sems
157a4(mdo sde): dpa' ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub la the tsom med mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rgyu 'thun pas mgo reg
157a5(mdo sde): la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni shin tu dkon no zhes/ de skad kyi tshig smras te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'
157a6(mdo sde): lnga po de dag kyang smin par bya dgos la/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang bstan dgos pas/ las de'i phyir ngas dka' ba spyod pa spyad do// sems can gzhan dag mi shes par tshul khrims dang ldan
157a7(mdo sde): pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag mthong nas/ tshig tu smra bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes sam mi shes kyang rung ste/ smras na de'i phyir de dag yun ring por gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang mi bde ba dang / 
157a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes sems can de dag gi las kyi bya ba yang bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar las ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi sgrib pa ni/
