183a1(mdo sde): gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba bres pa'i rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyings kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi na bzas g.yogs pa
183a2(mdo sde): rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyings kun tu gnas par gyur cig gzhal du ma mchis pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang / rin po che thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyings kun
183a3(mdo sde): tu gnas par gyur cig/ snying po'i spos thams cad kyis bdugs pa'i rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyings kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa las grol ba
183a4(mdo sde): sil snyan 'khrol ba dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyings kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi pad+ma bkram pa'i rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyings kun tu gnas
183a5(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ thams cad kyi rje su sgrog pa'i sprin gyi rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyings su kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ rin kho che sprin snang ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyings
183a6(mdo sde): kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ lha'i thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ rin po che'i cod pan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyings kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ da ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba
183a7(mdo sde): 'dis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa thamasacad dang ldan pas 'jug pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang dag pa'i rtsa ba 'dis
183a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ de ltar dpag tu ma mchis par phyi ma'i mthara' mur thug par byin gyis rlob pa la 'jug par gyur cig/ gang du yang ji ltar
183b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / 
183b2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bgyi ba dang / gsol bar bgyi ba dang / dbul
183b3(mdo sde): bar bgyi ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 
183b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsolo// yongasu ga tong ngo // don to// dbu'o// bdag gis sems can tham/ sa cad dang // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
183b5(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phul nas/ bsod nams kyi phung po yongasu bsdus pa/ 
183b6(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa des bdag brtan par gyur nas/ bdag bla na med pa
183b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od
183b8(mdo sde): la mchod pa'i dam pas mchod nas dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
184a1(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa tshong dpon gyi bu mngon dgar gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes chen la brten te dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de
184a2(mdo sde): bzhin du/ bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dge slong rjes kyi 'byung gnasu gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de
184a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la tshig su bcad de'i dbyangs kyis mngon par bstod nas/ byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang byang chub tu sems
184a4(mdo sde): bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga/ shegs pa mi 'khrugs pas/ sems thegs pa ma de mchis pa dang / sems mi 'khrugs pa dang / tshe rabs thams
184a5(mdo sde): cad du rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba'i sem/ sa kyis seng ga'i sgra mngon par bsgrag te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rab tu dang ba las byang chub tu thugs bskyed/ 
184a6(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i dpal la
184a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i rtsa ba rnam pa mang po bskyed nas/ byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byams pa rgyal po gsar mdog
184a8(mdo sde): lta bur gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mchod sdong gi 'od la bkod pa du mas mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyis nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du/ 
184b1(mdo sde): bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho yul shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
184b2(mdo sde): yon tan gyi 'od zer mtha' yas la bkur bsti bgyis nas/ byang chub tu samra bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'
184b3(mdo sde): mdzod lhas dbang bskur te/ steng gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam thams cad las yang dag par byung ba/ rin po che'i gzi
184b4(mdo sde): brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po gdugs gcig bzhi na du/ rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam pas mchod pa bgyi sa te/ bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur mchod pa dang / rim
184b5(mdo sde): gro bgyis nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur
184b6(mdo sde): pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbangs bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la mchod pa dang // rim gro rnam pa du ma bgyis nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag
184b7(mdo sde): kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rdo rje rgya mtsho'i rgyal po la sti stang bgyis nas// 
184b8(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bzhin du/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// mchog dam pa nga rgyal zhi ba/ sems ma lags pa'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su
185a1(mdo sde): bskyab pa'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems des khyad par ma byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings de gang yang ma mchis so// byang chub tu semra bskyed pa'i
185a2(mdo sde): dge pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs des gsum du ma khyab pa chung zad kyang ma mchis so// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bgyid pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
185a3(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i sems dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad rje su yi rang ba'i sems dang / sems bskyed pa des yongasu zin par ma gyur pa'i sems can
185a4(mdo sde): de gang yang ma mchis so// mchod par ma gyur pa'i de de bzhin gshegs pa de gang yang mi bzhugaso// gang du sems bskyed de/ bskyed ma thag pa'i bsod nams kyi phung
185a5(mdo sde): po ni rab tu mang gi/ sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
185a6(mdo sde): su gyur pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni de tsam ma lags so// bdag gi bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang / sems can thams cad
185a7(mdo sde): la stsal pa gang lags pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul ba dang lags pa dang / sangs rgyas
185a8(mdo sde): thams cad la dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po yongasu bzung ba gang lags pa dang / gang ye shes dang / mos pa mngon par bsgrubs pa rnams kyi mos pa dang ldan pa
185b1(mdo sde): dge pa'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhag par mchod pa dang ldan
185b2(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / mos pa'i stobs las byung ba'i mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / sgrib par 'gyur ba thams cad sel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
185b3(mdo sde): gang lags pa dang / rdza su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
185b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge pa'i rtsa ba rab 'byam sang ngas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bos te/ 
185b5(mdo sde): bdag gir bgyi ba dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thog ma dang po ma mchis pa'i tshe rabs nas/ bgyis pa thams cad mkhyen par yongasu ma bsngos pa gang lags/ 
185b6(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dus byas kyi yo byad 'tshal bas mngon par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i slad du mngon par
185b7(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba las kyis bsgrubs pa sngon gyi dus nas bstsags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad yongs
185b8(mdo sde): su bsdu'o// yongasu bsdus nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bgyid cing dgyes par
186a1(mdo sde): bgyid par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasu sbyong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bgyid par gyur cig/ dge ba'i
186a2(mdo sde): bshes gnyen thams cad dang / chos smra ba thams cad mgu bar bgyid cing dga' bar bgyid par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin cing srung ba dang / yongs
186a3(mdo sde): su skyeng bar gyur cig/ sgrib pa'i ling tog thams cad rnam par spong bar gyur cig/ bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
186a4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig/ ting nge'adzin thams cad dang / dbang thams cad thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsen pa dang / 
186a5(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul par gyur cig/ ci nas kyang 'khor ba ni mi 'bral zhing tshe rabs gzhan du rjes pa na chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub
186a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo dang 'dra bar 'grib pa'i cha dang 'thun par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu
186a7(mdo sde): bsngo'o// ci nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du sangs rgyas de dag la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan gyis
186a8(mdo sde): brgyan par bgyid du 'chi ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan de'i tha ma'i sems bskyed pa thob pa yongasu rdzogs par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu bsngo'o// 'chi ba'i dus kyi chen
186b1(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdag gi spyi bor 'dzeg par gyur cig/ ci nas bdag dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba bkod
186b2(mdo sde): ba rgyun thogs pa ma mchis pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu bsgos pa'i sems dang / tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig/ dad
186b3(mdo sde): pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / ri mo gus par bgyi ba grangs ma mchis pa dang / dga' ba dang dad pa grangs ma mchis pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la lta zhing rtog la/ kun tu
186b4(mdo sde): smra bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig/ mchod dpa yid du 'ong bas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / 
186b5(mdo sde): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dpag tu ma ma chis pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod
186b6(mdo sde): cing lta la rtog bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sems can dmal ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur
186b7(mdo sde): cig/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ lha dbul po thams cad dang / mi dbul po thams cad dang / ser sna thams cad dang // 'chal
186b8(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims thams cad dang / gnod sems thams cad dang / la lo thams cad dang / rnam par g.yang ba thams cad dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab thams cad rgyun chad par gyur
187a1(mdo sde): cig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa dang / 
187a2(mdo sde): 'bral bar gyur cig/ dge ba rtsa ba 'dis bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / lus mnyam par gyur cig/ ngag mnyam pa dang / sems mnyam pa dang // ye shes
187a3(mdo sde): mnyam par gyur cig/ ji ltar gong du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta
187a4(mdo sde): bus/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yodasu bsngo bar bgyi ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang dge ba'i
187a5(mdo sde): rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba tu yongasu bsngo ba'i mchog gis yongasu bsngo'o// gca/ bo dang / dam pa dang / khyad par du 'phags ba dang / 
187a6(mdo sde): rab dang / phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / gang na ma mchis pa dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / snang ba ma
187a7(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / bdag nyid chen po dang / bla ma dang / zil gyis mi non pa dang / yon+dan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka'
187a8(mdo sde): stsal ba'i yong su bsngo bas yongasu bsngo'o// ji ltar bdag gi don tu yong su bsdus pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can ji tsams
187b1(mdo sde): can gyi ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang yong su bsngar// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la su dag shas kyis 'dzin par 'dod pa dgags kyang rjesu la rang // zhes
187b2(mdo sde): brjod par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dam 'char bar gnas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// 'jam dpal ji
187b3(mdo sde): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'chags pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ rdza su yi rang ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / bskul ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa kha na ma tho ba
187b4(mdo sde): med pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba kha na ma tho ba med pa yin de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu dar gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la
187b5(mdo sde): dam 'cha' bar gnas pa la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
187b6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing / des yan lag la gtug par bya ste/ des pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la 'jugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces
187b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des pus mo g.yon pa'i lha ngas la 'dzugs pa la/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can gang su
187b8(mdo sde): dag g.yon phyogs kyi lam la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa'i lam la gnas shing / yang dag pa'i lam la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des lag pa g.yas pa sa
188a1(mdo sde): la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la bzhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dam ldan
188a2(mdo sde): pas/ dbu dang sku dang / skyil mo krung la yongasu byug te/ phyag g.yas pa sa la bsnun nas/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul te/ byang chub bsnyes pa de bzhin du/ sems can
188a3(mdo sde): 'di bdag gis kyang bdud phyir rgol ba choms par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cings chen po la bsnun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// 
188a4(mdo sde): des lag pa g.yon pa sa lo 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skadaces sems can gang su dag byis pa'i chos la gnas te/ 8/ phyogasu 'dzin pa 'dul dka' ba de dag thams cad bsdu
188a5(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po bzhis shin tu sdud par gyur cig ces brjod pa/ ra bya'o// des gdong dang 'phral ba sa la gtug pa na/ tshog 'di skad ces sems can thams cad nga rgyal ma mchis
188a6(mdo sde): pa 'dis bla ma rnams la rim gri bgyid pa rnyed cing / spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ngo / dge ba'i las thams cad 'phags par gyur cig/ de ltar bdag yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba
188a7(mdo sde): 'dis sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar gyur cig/ dbang po lnga yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongasu shes par gyur cig/ mngon par
188a8(mdo sde): shes pa nyams pa med pa lnga thob par gyur cig/ mig lnga yongasu dag par gyur cig/ sems can 'gro ba lngar skyes pa rnams 'gro ba lnga las khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig/ tshul
188b1(mdo sde): khrims khyad par du 'phags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dang / shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rnam par grol ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i/ 
188b2(mdo sde): ye shes mthong ba khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des yan lag lnga yong su dag pa dang / sgrib pa lnga dang bral ba dang / stobs lnga la gnas pa dang / de bzhin gsheg
188b3(mdo sde): pa yid la byed pa dang ma bral bas/ tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku dang ldan lags pa gsung dag pa gsung mi mnga' ba/ sems dang sems mi mnga' ba/ 
188b4(mdo sde): ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa/ ma byon pa ma ba zhud pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad ga/ zigs pa dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag
188b5(mdo sde): gis 'khor ba thog ma'i mtha'i mu nas bzung ste/ yang da ga pa'i mtha' dang bdag gi mtha' ma 'tshal bas/ chos ma lags pa la chos su 'du shes bskyed pa dang / 'dul/ 
188b6(mdo sde): ba ma lags pa la 'dul bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / sbyin gnas ma lags pa la sprin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mi dge ba la dge bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / phyin ci log gi sems
188b7(mdo sde): kyis bdag gi sems kyis bdag gi lus su lta bas yongasu bkris pa dang / dge bo'i chos gang sangs rgyas kyis bka' ma stsal pa mngon par 'dus bgyis pa dang / bgyid pa dang / bgyid du
188b8(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjesu yi rang bar 'gyur ba gang ci mchis pa de dga' chags so// dmigs pa la gnas ste/ bdag gis sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du 'du shes pa dang / 
189a1(mdo sde): sems sgyu ma lta bur ma 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang lags pa de thams cad 'chags so// 
189a2(mdo sde): bdag gis mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis par 'tshal nas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis chos dag pa dang / mi dge ba mngon par bgyid pa dang / mngon par bgyis pa gang lag pa de
189a3(mdo sde): 'chags so// bdag gis sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid du 'tshal nas/ dmigs par ltung bas sbyin
189a4(mdo sde): pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pas/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / lus dang sems la gnas te/ 
189a5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'du shes dang / dmi gas pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan skyed pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par
189a6(mdo sde): dga' bas/ shes rab rnam par dpyad pa gang lags pa de dag 'chag so// bdag gis don dam pa'i mchod pa ma 'tshal nas/ gzugs dang rgyan dang / mtshan la mngon par zhen pas/ 
189a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la mchod pa bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chagaso// bdag chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i ye shes la ma zhugs kyis/ chos tha dad pa la gnas te/ chos mnyan pa 'am// bshad pa/ 
189a8(mdo sde): 'am/ rab tu bsams par gyur pa gang lags pa de 'chagaso// bdag gis chos 'dus ma byas su ma 'tshal nas/ dge 'dun la mang por 'du shes te/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bskur bgyis pa gang
189b1(mdo sde): lags pa de bdag 'chag so// bdag gis dgon pa ma 'tshal nas dgon pa'i gnas bsten te 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang lags pa de bdag 'chags so// bdag
189b2(mdo sde): gis chos nyid gnas par 'tshal nas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan blang bar zhugs pa gang lags pa de bdag 'chagaso// bdag gis chos kyi dbyings yongasu
189b3(mdo sde): bzungs pa ma mchis ma 'tshal ma zhugs kyi sems can sdu bar 'tshal ba'i bsdu bas sems can dag bsdus pa lang lags pa de 'chags so// bdag gis byang chub kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang
189b4(mdo sde): bzhin ma 'tshal nas lta ba yongasu zhen pas byang chu rab kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa gang lags pa de 'chag so// bdag gis dge sbyong gi lam zhi ba ma 'tshal
189b5(mdo sde): nas/ rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs te/ dge slong gi/ dngos po bskyed pa gang lags de 'chags so// kun rdzob la 'jug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan gang dag bstsags pa dang / 
189b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis 'dus byas kyi bde bar gyur te/ 'dus ma byas las shin tu ring du gyur pa gang lags pa de dag 'chagaso zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar thog
189b7(mdo sde): mar byang chub sems dpas bag la nyal dang bcas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / 'bad pa dang bcas pa dang / spos pa dang bcas pa dang / len pa
189b8(mdo sde): dang bcas pa dang / gnas pa dang bcas pa dang / rten dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa'i chos thams cad bshags par bya'o// de la 'di lta bu'i snga ba dang / spros pa dang bcas pa kun
190a1(mdo sde): tu mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sdig pa bshags pa yongasu dag pa yin te/ 'di na bshags pa'i phung po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
190a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dang po thugs bskyed pa nas
190a3(mdo sde): bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang ldan pa rnams kyis bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung / sangs rgyas kyis
190a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa rtsa ba dang ma mchis shing rten ma mchis pa/ gtong ba ma mchis pas gtong ba rnam par dag pa dang / rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims mi zad mi skye ba dang / sems can
190a5(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i bzod pa dang / dmigs pa las dben/ ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems kyi ngo bo nyid la ngas par sems pa'i bsam gtan dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol
190a6(mdo sde): gyi mthar lta ba rnam par spangs pa'i shes rab rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i byams pa dang / rnam pa'i rnam pa ma mchis pa'i snying rje dang / 
190a7(mdo sde): chos la kun tu mi 'byung ba'i dga' ba dang / yal bar 'dor ba ma lags pa'i btang snyoms gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rong // khyim gyi dngos po thams cad bzung ba ma mchis shing
190a8(mdo sde): yongasu ma bzung ba/ rtsa ba ma mchis shing rten ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma dran pa dran par gyur pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / ma 'gags pa dang / ma skyes pa'i yang dag par
190b1(mdo sde): spang ba rnams dang / lus dang / sems dang brtson 'grus dang / 'dun pa dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po lnga mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i dbang ba rnams dang / nam / 
190b2(mdo sde): ltar mi thul ba'i stobs rnams dang / don dam pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / mi gnyis pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i lam dang / zhi ba'i zhi gnas thob pa dang / 
190b3(mdo sde): rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / 'thun pa'i lhag mthong / mngon par shes pa ye shes sngon du 'gro ba de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang // thog ma'i mtha' nas lus kyi ngo bo nyid
190b4(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa'i ngag rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas la rim gro bgyi bab snyen bkur bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / chos la rim gro brgya
190b5(mdo sde): ba chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa dang // dag/ 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba chog ma mchis shing yon tan ma mchis pa dang / spyod lam thams cad rnam par ma brtag/ 
190b6(mdo sde): pa'i sdom pa spyod pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar gyur pa de dag gis chos spyod pa yang dag pa'i sdom pa bdud thams cad kyis
190b7(mdo sde): mi shigs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyisar ma nges dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang 'thun pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
190b8(mdo sde): bzang po/ las dkar po ma lags pa 'gag par 'gyur ba gzhan gang ci mchis pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po 'od gsal ba'i las gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ sangs
191a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ye shes thob pa dang / 'thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la bdag rje su yi rang ngo // 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba/ 
191a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub brnyes pa de dag gi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa ma mchis
191a3(mdo sde): ba dang stobs mi thul ba rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos chags pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / kun tu mi 'byung ba'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
191a4(mdo sde): chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'dzeg pa dang spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba na mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang lags pa dang / gnyis ma mchis pa'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i mtshan
191a5(mdo sde): nyid dang / lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rgyun bcos ma ma la gas pa/ nam mkha' ltar yong su dag pa dang / brgya byi na dang / tshangs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba'i chos kyi
191a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo dang / brjod pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la shes pa snang ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan ma lags pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi ngo // 
191a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i slad du/ thabs mkhas pa'i gnas pa dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa yongasu mya
191a8(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/ dam pa'i chos nub kyi bar du de dag la mchod pa bgyis pa dang / bgyid pa dang / bgyid par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang ngo // 
191b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa/ sems can thams cad yang dag par 'das pa rnams dang / dad pas rjesu 'brang ba rnams dang / chos
191b2(mdo sde): kyi dbyings la zhugs pa rnams dang / chos kyi rje su 'brang ba rnams dang / log pa brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa'i brgyad pa rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i
191b3(mdo sde): rigs kyis pa rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rgyun las bzlog ste/ zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba gang du yang mi 'gro ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba 'di nas
191b4(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas der gnas par 'gyur ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa grangs ma mchis shing skye ba ma mchis pas rab tu phye ba rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel
191b5(mdo sde): par 'byung ba zab mo khong du chud pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mngon sum du rtogs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' sems sa dang mchung
191b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor/ 
191b7(mdo sde): ba'i chos las 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa rnams dang // byang chub sems
191b8(mdo sde): dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rten po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag dang / 'dus byas las yongasu rgal ba de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang ngo // 'dra ba dang // 
192a1(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims kyi bsod nams
192a2(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i dngos por gyur pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rdza su yi rang
192a3(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ba mchog dang / ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang nges pa'i don gyi
192a4(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pa dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / na mkha' dang mnyam pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam da ba dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi rje su yi rang ba
192a5(mdo sde): rje su yi rang ngo // ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sa mas dpar gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
192a6(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas bzung du 'brel pa ma chags par spyad pa shin tu spyad pa spyod pa rab tu mkhyen nas/ mkhyen pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon sum du mdzad nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
192a7(mdo sde): la rje su yi rang ba dang / rje su yi rang bar mdzad pa dang / rje su yi rang bar 'gyur ba'i mnyam pa nyid de dang chos nyid des rje su slob pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang rje su yi rang ngo // rje su yi rang ba mchog
192a8(mdo sde): dang / ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang nges pa'i don gyi chos dang ldan pa dang / bla na ma mchis
192b1(mdo sde): ba dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rje su yi rang bas rje su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i rjesu yi rang ba'i phung po kha na ma tho ba
192b2(mdo sde): mang ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma
192b3(mdo sde): mchis shing / grangs ma mchis pa rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos thams cad ma dmigs nas/ bdud bzhi'i lam las
192b4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa/ brjod du med pa'i chos skyon ma mchis pa brnyes pa/ yi ge dang / brjod pa dang / skad thams cad dang bral ba/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du brnyes pa/ 
192b5(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pas chos gzung bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ ji tsam du brtags pa sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa 'i slad du/ thugs rje chen pos chud ma gzan pa/ bskul
192b6(mdo sde): ba'i sa la gzhes pa cang mi gsung ba la dgyes pa/ byang chub kyi shing la gzigs pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang
192b7(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod de// dgyes shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba bskul gyis/ 
192b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo mi 'jug pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mngon par mi 'grub pa'i 'khor
193a1(mdo sde): lo dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol yongasu gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i 'khor lo dang / bdud phyir rgol ba chom pa'i/ 
193a2(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor du gsol/ brjod du ma mchis pa'i rnga gdung du gsol/ sgra ma mchis pa'i dung bung du gsol/ chos shes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang tog bsgreng du gsol// shes rab dang / 
193a3(mdo sde): ye shes dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ thugs rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar gsol/ chos chen po'i chu'i char pa'i rgyun gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo
193a4(mdo sde): tog rnam par sprul du gsol/ 'phags pa'i shes rab da / ye shes kyi nor gyis sems can thams cad tshim pa ra mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'ang
193a5(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bskul ba'i phung po kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di// 
193a6(mdo sde): skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag shin tu mdzad pa/ legs par
193a7(mdo sde): bgyis pa'i chos kyi rgyun ma gcod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu lung bstan pa/ dge 'dun 'phags pa rab tu gnas pa/ gdul ba'i sems can dag shin tu gtul
193a8(mdo sde): ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba shin tu tshol ba/ chos gzung ba 'dzin par mdzad pa'i slad du yongasu mi skyo ba/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
193b1(mdo sde): de dag bdag chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i tshul gyis ji ltar de dag mi skye ba ma skyes pa de bzhin du ma 'gags mi 'gag 'gag par 'gyur bar bzhugs su gsol lo zhes brjod par bya'o// 
193b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsol ba 'debs pa yod pa ma yin pa// len pa med pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
193b3(mdo sde): des de bzhin du 'dug ste tshig 'di skad ces ma mchis bzhin du bdag gi mgos phyag bgyis pa dang / bshags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / 
193b4(mdo sde): gsel ba 'debs pa gang lags pa dang / phyag 'tshal da ba dang / 'chags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / dbaskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa de yang ma mchis pa/ 
193b5(mdo sde): len pa ma mchis pa 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// de ltar phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'chags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa gang
193b6(mdo sde): lags pa de yang ma mchis pa/ len pa ma mchis pa/ 'dus ma bgyis pa ste/ de bzhin du byang chub kyang len pa ma mchis pa/ 'dus ma bgyis pa ste/ chos nyid de dang / 
193b7(mdo sde): ma chad pa dang ma lhag pa dang / ma smad pa dang mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mtho ba dang / mi dma' ba'i yongasu bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
193b8(mdo sde): chub la chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs par yongasu bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// mig gzugs rnams la mi 'jug ste/ gzugs kyang mig la ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmigs
194a1(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa de yang mig las ma byung / gzugs las kyang ma yin te/ byung nas kyang
194a2(mdo sde): zhig cing med de mi gnas so// de bzhin du rna ba la ma yin/ sgra la ma yin/ sna la ma yin/ dri la ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ rol ma yin// lus la ma yin/ reg bya la
194a3(mdo sde): ma yin te/ yid chos rnams la mi 'jug/ chos rnams kyang yid la mi 'jug med kyi 'on kyang dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ de yang yid las kyang mi byung/ 
194a4(mdo sde): chos las kyang ma yin te/ de ni byung nas zhig cing med de mi gnas so// de bzhin du dag pa'i rtsa ba byang chub la mi 'jug/ byang chub kyang dag pa'i rtsa ba la mi 'jug mod/ 
194a5(mdo sde): 'on kyang byang chub kyi rkyen gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sa/ mas bskyed pa rnams skye'o// de yang mi gnas pa ste/ skyes nas zhig cing med do// de la sems gang gis dag pa'i
194a6(mdo sde): rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / sems gang gis byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag phan tshun du 'brel bar ma byed de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs
194a7(mdo sde): te/ byung nas kyang zhig cing med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi ma yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ 'odra nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la rten nas 'bar te/ byung nas zhig/ 
194a8(mdo sde): cing med do// ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa de lta bu dag la blo rnam par mi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu bsngo ba'o// skyon med par 'jug pa dang // 
194b1(mdo sde): lung bstan pa dang / bzod pa snang ba'i ye shes thob pa rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi blo rnam par me dbyed pa gang yin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du byas te/ yongasu
194b2(mdo sde): bsngo bar bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu
194b3(mdo sde): bsngo bar bshad pa de bzhin du/ thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes des yongasu bsngo'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngo ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// 'jam dpal
194b4(mdo sde): gzhan nur gyur pas phung po gsum pa'i bsngo ba 'di bshad pa/ na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
194b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad la dam 'cha' bar gnas pa yang mgu'o// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshang pa la
194b6(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i rdzogs s+ho// / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab
194b7(mdo sde): pa// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya pra ti b+ha na ma ti pa ri brid can ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spabs pa'i bla gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 
194b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
195a1(mdo sde): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis rgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri
195a2(mdo sde): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang pos yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos ston to// de'i tshe tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros shes bya ba zhig
195a3(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam/ so sor g.yog 'khor lnga brgyas yongasu bskor cing mdun du mdar ba dang / lhan cig tu mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
195a4(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom nga ldan 'das ga la ba de legasu song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mig bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
195a5(mdo sde): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ g.yog 'khro/ re dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ de nas sang sa rgyas kyi mthus tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las
195a6(mdo sde): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das
195a7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni bla ma'i mchog/ khams gsum pa'i dam pa/ byang chub kyi bsod nams kyi lhag pa'i bzhi/ sems can thams cad nges par sgrol bar mdzad
195a8(mdo sde): pa/ kun tu khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i phyogs thugs pa ma mchis pa nges par thob par mdzad pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus snyigs ma'i rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa la
195b1(mdo sde): dug gsum 'bar la gcig la gcig gdung bar bgyid pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang na/ gang nyes par bsam pa sems pa'i dus na/ gtso bo ma mchis shing de gang gi yang ma lags
195b2(mdo sde): pa dang rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams yul la sred pas zil gyis gnon te/ phan tshun mi 'thun zhing gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa dang / de dag gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed
195b3(mdo sde): pa na/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang / de las gzhan pa yul gyi mi lus chab 'tshal ba rnams kyi ming yang mi mda' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi mthus/ sangs rgyas
195b4(mdo sde): kyi slob ma gang zag bzhi po mang po de dag kyang bstan pa 'di dal 'jug cing rab tu byung ba'i tshul 'thob pa dang / de dag kyang phyi rol gyi gos ngur smrig tsam dang / khong ba'i nang
195b5(mdo sde): gi 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / shin tu ma gus shing phan tshun mi 'thun la/ gcig la gcig skur pa'adebs par bgyid pa dang / skyon sgrogs par bgyid pa dang / 
195b6(mdo sde): yon tan nges par sbed par bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas non cing / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par bgyid pa dang // de dag shi 'phos na yang ngan
195b7(mdo sde): song gsum du skye zhing yud tsam zhig rnyed pa'i dpal yang ma 'tshal ba dang / tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa/ rtsu ba ga/ tshab yid du mi mchi ba
195b8(mdo sde): dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam nas rnam par bzlog nas/ 
196a1(mdo sde): bsod rnams kyi gzhal med khang thob par 'gyi ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ de skad ces gsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mang dben spabs
196a2(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spobs pa'i blo gros de ltar khyod seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhing / de ltar sems can thams cad de bzhin
196a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la chos zhu bar spro ba skyed pa legs so leg so// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can rnams gang thob nas/ legs par rab tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / nag po'i phyogs
196a4(mdo sde): sgrub pa spangs nas/ dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing / don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag khyod zhus sha dag/ zhus nas kyang the tsom med par nyon cig dang bshad
196a5(mdo sde): bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ spobs pa'i blo gra/ sa kyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gang dag gis ni/ lha rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ma
196a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni dud 'gro rnamasu skyo bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni yi dgas rnamasu skye bar 'gyur// 
196a7(mdo sde): gang dag gis ni rigs mthon po rnamasu skye bar 'gyur/ gang dog gis bran dang bran mo rnams skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das los gang dag gis ni mi rnams kyi nang du sems can skyes pa rnams
196a8(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing / khyim khol dang ldan pa dang / kha dri bda' ba dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / mthong na dga' ba dang / gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / lus dang sems
196b1(mdo sde): shin tu tha mal du gnas pa dang / skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnamasu 'gyur/ las gang dag gis ni sems can rnams ma'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo
196b2(mdo sde): mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang / kha dro mi bda' ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang sems mi dga' ba dang / lus shin tu sbrengs pa ma lags pa dang / nyes byas kyi las
196b3(mdo sde): thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung ba/ dge sbyong dod/ rigs kyi bu dang / rig kyi bu mo
196b4(mdo sde): bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa rnams gang dang gang du skye ba nga'i skye ba thams cad du/ rgyun tu sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral ba/ 
196b5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong na/ sa kyang / de dag las chos thos nas yid dga' zhing // / ci bsams pa bzhin du don yang 'grub par 'gyur/ 
196b6(mdo sde): bdag gis zhu ba bcu po de dag zhus pa lags na/ 'byung po grangs ma mchis pa thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pa/ 
196b7(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dbang dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la lkog tu ma gyur pa'i spyan dang ldan pas/ rnam par phye ste rgyas par lan stsal du gsel de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
196b8(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros khyod kyis ci ltar zhu ba zhus pa rnams rgyas par rnam par phye ste bshad kyis nyon cig/ tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros kyis/ 
197a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces pa/ 
197a2(mdo sde): stsal to// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ lha nyid thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang ba byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnod pa med
197a3(mdo sde): par sems can rnams yongasu skyong bar byed cing bzang po dang ldan pa rnams yin gzhan gyi nor 'phrog par mi byed cing / 'akren pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pas yongasu
197a4(mdo sde): gtong bar byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi chung ma la spyod pa da rnams kyang yongasu dag pa yin te/ bslab pa'i ga bzhi rnams kyang srung bar byed pa yin/ gso sbyong la brtson zhing / 
197a5(mdo sde): bden pa smra ba yin rang bzhin du 'dug cing rang gi skye na tshad med pa spong bar byed la myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa yin te/ las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa
197a6(mdo sde): rnams lha'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// srog chags gsod las ldog pa byas pas lha dang // mi dang lha ma
197a7(mdo sde): yin rnams/ 'jig rten du ni mi thub lus can tshe ring nad med 'gyur ba yin// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i lus can shis ldan dri med rdzogs pa'i lus lha nang rab mchog de'i longs
197a8(mdo sde): spyod sna tshogs dpal can rtag tu 'byung / bor ma thag tu lha nang rtag tu lha'i dbang phyug rnamasu 'gyur/ bsam med bstsal pa 'phrog pa rnam log rin chen longs spod rnams dang ldan// 
197b1(mdo sde): rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu yid dga' dpal ldan gzhal med khang gnas shing // rtse zhing dge ba'i dpag bsams shing gi yul na me tog gtor lus ldan// mkhas shing 'dod pa mi phan
197b2(mdo sde): yongasu spangs dri mchog dag pa'i lus dang ldan// tshe rabs kun tu dpe med gser mchog lus dang zhing rab tu mdzes// rtag tu lta yi nang du bskal pa bzang thob lus las 'od 'byung 'gyur/ 
197b3(mdo sde): lha me sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dod pa'i dpal la spyod par byed// sngon chad tshogs bzhin du ngag sbyin bzhi spangs kha na dro zhim ldan// gsal zhing thogs med mi 'jigs tshig
197b4(mdo sde): mchog lha rnams 'dir ni nges par 'byung // yang dag la na 'debs rnam sgrags snyan cing skye bas shin tu tshig pa dazung nges// pibang rol ma'i sgra 'byor sprin snyan pho brang lal
197b5(mdo sde): skad ldan// marmongs sems kyis myos 'gyur ma leg sarjod byed spangs pas lhar 'gyur zhing grags med dag pa'i lha yos mchod pa lha yi gnas na gnas par
197b6(mdo sde): 'gyur 'ablo dang ldan zhing lus brtan yid bzang bag yang kun dang ldan par 'gyur// de dag rtag tu bde 'gyur dbang rnams de dag phan pa brjod par byed// gal te tshe zang lha yul nas
197b7(mdo sde): ltung ba yi lha rnams de che smad// sdig med lo brgya nyi shu 'gren lce'i gan su 'gro bar 'gyur// bsod nams lnga mngon gyur pas de ni dam pa dang lo ldan lus can// lha rnams lam sa la/ 
197b8(mdo sde): byed cing lha rnams bye ba mched de brten par 'gro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang slebs pa'i bla gras la bka' stsal pa rlabs pa'i blagros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa
198a1(mdo sde): rnams/ mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po byas pa gzo bas byin pa dang / bkren pa dang / dbul po dang / sdug
198a2(mdo sde): bsngal ba la kun 'ged pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mnyam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis
198a3(mdo sde): sems can le le can rnams dge ba'i chos la spro bar byed cing / nges pa'i sems kyis gus pa dang bcas la/ 'thun par 'dzin pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las
198a4(mdo sde): lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams mi nyid thob par 'gyur zhing / longs spyod kyang chen por 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring ba dang // mdzes pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi
198a5(mdo sde): rjeng dpon du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis da gsu gcod pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sbyin pa byin bas mi yi rgyal po dam par 'gyur// rtag tu langs spyad
198a6(mdo sde): 'byor dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur// lus ngan po dang mtshungs par sbyin dang spyod par byed// rigs dang dam pa thob pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// tshul khrims ma nyams de ni dkon mchog mchod
198a7(mdo sde): par byed/ nyes byas yongasu spangs pas shin tu nges pa ste// tshe rong dam pa thob pas 'chi 'pho med pa yin// bde ba thob pas skyon med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa'i mi ni pha rol sems
198a8(mdo sde): 'khrugs ma byas shing // gzhan dag rnams kyis gnang byas phyir ni gnod ma byed// de bzhin tshig ngan brjod kyang gsha bar mi byed pas// dge ba'i mchog gi tshul thob nas ni mdzes par
198b1(mdo sde): 'gyur// brtson 'grus bzang la lhag pa'i bsam pas sems dkar zhing // stobs dang ga'i brjid chen po dge pa rnams dang ldan// dmag dpon nyid kyi dam pathob par 'gyur bas na/ 
198b2(mdo sde): longs spyod 'byor pa'i spyod yul ldan pas lta ra 'gyur// mi 'phrogs sems ldan mkhas shing shin tu 'thun pa ste// byas pa bzo zhing las la 'dod par rab tu byed// dkon mchog gsum
198b3(mdo sde): dang ma la sogs la mchod 'dzangs pa// nam yang kun la the tsom byed par mi 'gyur ro// mig gang khyad par 'phags pa dge ba lnga po rnams// byed pa de ni sa'i bdag por rab tu 'gyur// 
198b4(mdo sde): stobs la stsogs dang gzugs dang longs spyod mi zad ldan// grags ldan shin tu gtso bo rnams kyi rim gro byas/ da de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros
198b5(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes nas kyang de dag tu bskal
198b6(mdo sde): pa bye ba mang por gnas par gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la dad par mi byed la/ kun tu bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod pas
198b7(mdo sde): skur pa 'debs par byed cing / 'phags pa'i lam la brnyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mcho de rten 'jig pa dang / bar gyi dus na yang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge
198b8(mdo sde): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang zag bzhi po mang por mi gus pa/ 'thun par mi 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi smra ba lhur len pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog pa/ gcig la
199a1(mdo sde): gcig nyes rtsom gyis/ gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gis/ rgyal po dang / rje dpon dang / blon po dang / ba dang bu rnams
199a2(mdo sde): gcig la gcig mi 'thun pas/ mi gus pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
199a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa la bstan nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ bdag nyid dge slong yin par khas mche zhing / dge ba'i chos yang dag par sgrub pa la
199a4(mdo sde): mi gnas la/ mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams mgu bar mi byed cing / bka' bla mi bde la/ 'thun par mi 'dzin cing / yang dag par rjes su bstan kyang rje su bstan
199a5(mdo sde): pa la sgrub par mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar khyod la/ bdag la bstod par byed/ gzhan la smra/ da par byed cing nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs
199a6(mdo sde): ba'i shes che la/ bla ma rnams la brnyas par byed rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la lhag par zhen cing / skur pa 'debs par byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga pa de dag
199a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing / skyes nas kyang ji srid du steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig pa byung ba de srid du gnas
199a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing / 'jig pa byung nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nasamra can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phan par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe der yang 'jig pa byung bar gyur na/ de
199b1(mdo sde): tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na/ sen
199b2(mdo sde): dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'khyam zhing / sdug bsngal nyam su myong la 'byung ba'i mtha' med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 
199b3(mdo sde): rmongs pas thogs ma med nas 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal bying gyur pa'i// 'jig rten sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho khas len mi byed de// de ni kun rig ma yin rnal 'byor rgyal po ma yin zhes/ 
199b4(mdo sde): bdag nyid chud gzan skye bo'i gzhan rnams la yang sme bar byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'byor pa sdug pa'i mchog byas na/ dge ba chung ngu 'gyur zhing 'jig
199b5(mdo sde): par byed pa'i char 'gyu ro zhes/ mi dag 'di ni mngon sum dge ba mdun na yod bzhin du// 'on kyang sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu spyod par byed// bar ma rtsod pa'i dus 'dir
199b6(mdo sde): bzhi po bkres pas nyam thag pa// phan tshun 'khon du 'dzin pas dkrugs shing bla ma sbed par byed// 'khor du 'dus pa 'dul ba'i dga' ba 'di ni rnam shigs pas// mi bzang ro med log par
199b7(mdo sde): ltung ba'i sar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal po pha dang sring mo spun dang gzhon nu bu mo rnams// byams pa'i yid ni log/ 'gyur longs spyod rnams la brkam chags te// byis pa bu rnams thams
199b8(mdo sde): cad gcig la gcig ni gzhad gang byed// log ltung dam pa rnam par 'bying bar myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus 'dir gang dag shin tu sdig can sems can rnams// 'thun par mi 'dzin
200a1(mdo sde): dge sbyong kha dog 'dzin pa gzugs mi sdug/ ngan pa'i bdag nyid ldan pa sdig pa khrag khrig byed 'gyur ba// de dag shi 'phos nas ni sdig brtsod pa'i mchog gi
200a2(mdo sde): gnon/ mi yis bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sdig pa lnga po dag/ bsgrubs shing byas pa dag ni bshags par nus pa ma yin te// gang du sangs rgyas khrag khrig gis kyang bskyab par mi spyod pa'i/ 
200a3(mdo sde): ma ri drag po mnar med pa yi mer ni sreg par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni dud 'gro/ 
200a4(mdo sde): rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po 'chal ba de'i tshul khrims dang / chom rkun dang gzhan gyi bu lon blangs nas/ gnod sems su byed pa dang / srog gcod
200a5(mdo sde): pa dang / ma dad pas dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan par dga' zhing / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan pa la dga' bas/ log pas 'tsho ba thams cad la dga' ba ste/ 
200a6(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni dud 'gro rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rtag tu
200a7(mdo sde): gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa la dga' ba'i mi rnams ni// bu lon byin pa rnam par blangs nas mi gzhan gsod par byed// srog gcod pa la dga' ba'i ri dgas 'chi bdag rgya lo rnams// rgyal sogs
200a8(mdo sde): bas bzung nas sems can rnams la gsad par byed// dad pa la sogs dman pa'i blo gros dkar ba'i 'du shes can// nag po'i dpag tu med pa bdag cag spyod pa mi shes pa// rmongs pa rnams
200b1(mdo sde): ni dem chos dkon mchog gtam la dga' mi byed// 'jig rten zhugs pa'i chos la 'dir ni rje su 'gro bar 'gyur// ji ltar gang ri las 'dir khab bab dang rab bab pa// chu yi chu yi shugs kyis
200b2(mdo sde): 'phral du sa 'og 'gro ba bzhin// lha mi'i grong du sdig pa'i phung po mang du byas pas na// rmongs pa rnams ni de bzhin dud 'gro rnams su myur du 'gro/ rta dre'u rnga bong glang chen ba lang ma he seng ga dang / 
200b3(mdo sde): wa dang sbrul dang phag dang khyi la sogs par gyur nas su// rtsa za ba dang sha dang bdud rtsi lo ma'i zas za zhing // de dag rtag tu gzhan gyi khur khyer byed cing dub par 'gyur// bkres pas zil gyis gnon
200b4(mdo sde): pas gcig la gcig za lhur byed pa// bskal pa khragakhrig rnam su'ang nam yang thar par mi 'gyur zhing // tso ltar rgya mtsho gcig na ru sbal mig ni gcig yod pas/ 
200b5(mdo sde): gnya' shing bu gar 'grin pa gtad par mi nus pa// de bzhin/ lha dang mi dang dbang phyug che nyid bde blag tu// log par ltung ba brgya yis thob par nus pa ma yin te// sangs rgyas
200b6(mdo sde): 'od zer dam pa tshegs can dpag tu med pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog 'od kyis de dag 'byin par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ 
200b7(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni// yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyuraro// lnga gang zhe na/ dang po bkren zhing chags pa dang / mun pa mun nag chen po'i bshes
200b8(mdo sde): gnyen dang / stsogs pa ltar byed pa'i phyir// bdag nyid kyang longs spyod par mi byed pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i phyir phrag dog dang / ser sna lhur byed pas spun dang / sring mo dang / 
201a1(mdo sde): bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / 'brel ba dang / sbyin gnas
201a2(mdo sde): dang / dag sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa thams cad la rab tu sbyin par mi byed cing / pha ma dag la yang rab tu sbyin par mi byed pa dang / nges par bskyang bar 'os pa dag mi skyong la bsnyen
201a3(mdo sde): bkur mo byed cing / bla ma la mi gus la gces par mi byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni yi dgas rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
201a4(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bkra/ na pa'i nyes pas bcom pa nor gtong mi 'od pa/ de dag gzhan dag las ni blang bar 'dod par byed// mdzod
201a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni sgo 'bar dam du bsdams pa rnams// 'dir na bskyang 'os rtsa lag mchog rnams gso ma byed// gzhan nor chud gson pa yis rtag tu skrag pa rnams// bla ma la
201a6(mdo sde): yang de dag rab rtsu ba byams can min// de dag bdag gi chung ma la sogs g.yog tshogs la// dbyig sbyin mi byed shin tu snying brtse shes med cing // dkar po dag las log pa de dag 'di nas
201a7(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas// yun ring mchog tu lus 'bar sdug bsngal yi dgas 'gyur// de dag lo brgya rnams su rmi lam rmis par yang // gos dang zas dang btung ba'ang nam yang rmi mi 'gyur// 
201a8(mdo sde): khab 'dra'i kha dang ri chen lta bu'i lho can rnams/ nyams zag shar dang nub kyi rgya mtshor rgyug par byed// kha nas ma 'bar lus ngan phyags dang lho phyogs gzhan// skams par mthong nas/ 
201b1(mdo sde): rin chen med rnams ltung bar 'gyur// gshin rje'i pho nya dpung mgo las grub rab stug cing // sra ldan rnams kyis mnan nas zang bzhun bzod dga' rab// me 'drar bre med pa de dag rnams
201b2(mdo sde): la ldud// rmongs rnams yan lag brgyad ldan chu bzhin 'thung bar byed// nang grol lus kyi khong pa bsregs pa bsal ba'i rlung gis su// skyes pa'i bdag nyid rnams la stobs chen
201b3(mdo sde): yang ldung byed// de nas shi 'phos mi'i 'jig rten 'dir skyes rnams// rigs dang longs spyod lus g.yog rnams kyis dman par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
201b4(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo dgros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni rigs mthon po rnamasu 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing dang
201b5(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pa dag gis 'jig rten thams cad la ga na/ da sems med par gyur pa dang / dkon mtsha ga gsum dang / pha ma la gus pa dang / lhan cig skyes
201b6(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / shin tu gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung rnam pa sna tshogs klag pa dang kha thon tu bya ba la brtson pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros
201b7(mdo sde): sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ rigs 'thon po rnams su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsam byas/ 
201b8(mdo sde): gang dag bsod nams tshogs pa skal bzang sbyin pa'i cho ga bzhin// kun tu sems can mngal kun bged de dag rtag tu nad med 'gyur// tshe dang kha dog stobs ldan lus can 'jig rten
202a1(mdo sde): mchog tu 'gyur/ mtshungs dang rgya can khyad par can gyis mdzes brjod pa da dbang bzhin// 'dul ba nyams dga' dkon mchog mtshungs med
202a2(mdo sde): ba ma rnams la bsnyen bkur bas// shin tu rgya chen gtso mchog khyim du skyes bu grangs med skye bo mchog/ shin tu nus kyang yid 'khrug rnam spangs kun tu gzugs kyis 'phags pa rnams
202a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnams kyi mig tu sdug pa bskal bzang rigs ni mthon por 'gyur// gang dag brtan zhing kun bzod shin tu yid bzang dkar dang 'thun rnams dang / mi rnams gang dag shes rab dag/ 
202a4(mdo sde): mchog sangs rgyas gsung la kho don brtson// de dag 'byor/ rab thob nas rigs mchog skyes pa kun mchog mdzes/ de dag dge bas rgyas pas lus chen rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du sra
202a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bran dang bran mo nyid 'thob par 'gyur
202a6(mdo sde): te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma rnams la mi gus pa dang / gya nom pa'i sems ma yin pa dang / zlog pa med cing ci dgar sdig pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / bu lon
202a7(mdo sde): phrogs nas bdag sbed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni bran dang bran mo nyid 'thob par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su gcad
202a8(mdo sde): pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod nams rgya chen 'byor pa gang 'od lta bu'i khyim du skye thob nas/ blun po gang dag rgyags khengs dregs pas dkrugs shing gus par mi byed la// pha ma rnams
202b1(mdo sde): la rmad byung sbyin gnas 'dra bar 'du shes mi byed pas// de dag nyes pas gzhan du 'jig rten dbang gyur dman zhing g.yon can 'gyur// dkon mchog tshungs med rnams la ma gus ltar byed ma
202b2(mdo sde): rungs brlang tshig 'gyur// gang dag byams dang de bzhin snying rje ma lus dge ba chung gsan pa// de dag grangs med skye bar 'dzin med gzhan 'joms ngo tsha mi shes shing // mi yi yul du sman nyid/ 
202b3(mdo sde): spangs nas skad cig gis ni dma' bar 'gyur// gzugs dang dbang phyug rigs mchog blo bral dman la mos pa'i glen par 'gyur// dkon mchog rnams ni mchod pas nga rgyal med cing zhan la
202b4(mdo sde): mdangs ngan 'gyur// dpal kun med cing ting 'dzin bral ba las rnams kyis ni bsdigs par 'gyur// de dga' 'jig rten kun dga' dga' ston che stsogs med cing tshegs kyis
202b5(mdo sde): 'tsho de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing / 
202b6(mdo sde): khyim khol dang kha dri zhim pa dang gnod pa med pa dang / lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa dang blta na sdug pa dang / skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe
202b7(mdo sde): 'du shes ci lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa dang / ma tshang ba med pa dang / sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po dang / theg pa/ 
202b8(mdo sde): rnam pa gsum po thams cad kyi chog gi rang bzhin la mi bzod pa med cing / mi smod la mo spong zhing de thams cad du gzung ba dang bshad pa dang / klag pa dang / kha don la sogs
203a1(mdo sde): pa byed pa dang / ngag gi spyan bani 'a tshad med pa rnam par spong shing 'phags pa'i lam la sbru ra'i 'debs pa dang / sems can log par sgrub pa la gnas
203a2(mdo sde): ba rnams la snying brtse zhing yangasu bskyang ba dang skyon de las bzlog cing dge ba la dgod pa dang / gzhan gyi spyan mthong ba'i brjod pa yal bar 'jog pa ste/ spabs pa'i blo gros
203a3(mdo sde): sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ mi rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/ skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim kho la dang ldan pa dang / kha dri zhim pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / 
203a4(mdo sde): 'thun pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / mya ngan med pa da 8nga/ sems tha mal du gnas pa dang / khro ba med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / grags
203a5(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa rnamasu 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas sogs la shin tu shas cher gus 'bad pha ma rnams
203a6(mdo sde): mchod pas/ rtag tu ngag skyon kun bral 'jig rten dag tu rmad du 'byung bar 'gyur// tshig gi yon tan gzung 'os rnga sgrar bcas shing tshe rabs kun tu phan// ud pa la dri dang mdzes pa'i rlung ldan
203a7(mdo sde): kha yis phyogasu snyan par grags// gang dag bdag byams gzhan mtshungs mi phan skyon brjod sdig pa ngan pa las// brel nas dge ba kun la sems can rnams ni sbyor du 'jug byed pa// de dag
203a8(mdo sde): mi yi 'jig rten thob nas skal bzang kun tu thams cad dga'// shin tu yid 'ong rin chen yul can bde gnas sdig las log par 'gyur// dam pa'i chos ni gzung dang bstan brtson de sems byed
203b1(mdo sde): cing nges par 'gyur/ 'dir ni sems can kun la pha ma 'dra bar byams pa'i sems ldan 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus su lus can kun ni nged kyis rtsa lag tshogs gyur ces// de ltar zla ba lta bu'i sem
203b2(mdo sde): spungs de dag la ni phan par byed// 'gran dregs khyad gsod la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs phan tshun sun 'byin pa'i// sdig pa yongasu spangs nas dag pa'i yid can skyon rnams kun sbas nas// 
203b3(mdo sde): sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas snyan tshogs phan tshun brjod par byed// myur du lha yi dbang phyug mtshungs med thob nas sangs rgyas dge bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das
203b4(mdo sde): kyis yang spongs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal ba spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnam sa ni mo'i dam pa thob nas/ rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par
203b5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / kha dra ma na ma pa dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa me yin par 'gyur te/ 
203b6(mdo sde): lnga gang zhe na/ brdzun du smra ba dang brdzun tu smra bas rtag tu gzhan bslu ba'i sems lhur len pa dang / chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam chen po la 'dus pa na/ chos kyi gtam de lo rnam par smod pa dang tshangs pa
203b7(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mthong na de dag la brnyas shing khyad du gsod pa dang dma' ba'i sems su byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams
203b8(mdo sde): ni mo'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang / kha dri mo zhom pa dang / sems mi dga' ba
204a1(mdo sde): dang / gnod pa mang ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mtshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
204a2(mdo sde): stsal to// sems yid rnams kyis gzhan sems drag tu 'khrug dang sdig pa rnams byas pas// log pa'i ngag dang gzhan la gnod par dga' ba tha ma rnams sems dang // lus kyis sdug
204a3(mdo sde): bsngal gzhal med rdzogs pa bar med nyams su myong bar 'gyur// ljags kyi lcags kyu chen po rnon po rnams kyis nyam thag lha 'byin 'gyur// gshin rje'i dbang phyug gnas su 'ang / 
204a4(mdo sde): mi rnams shin tu zangs bskol ldud par 'gyur// dmya dal bar mi bden tshig can skyes pa de dag dga' bar yi/ dang mi 'gyur// gang tshe 'dir ni tshig bzang bral ba ro
204a5(mdo sde): ltar kha dri mi zhim zhing / 'jig rten mig tu yid 'ong blta sdug ma yin rnamasu 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mi snyan skur 'debs rtsod pa'i skyon mang zhing // de
204a6(mdo sde): dag rtag tu skyon gnas mi ni sa yang mang pos gleng bar 'gyur// sems can brdzun smra rnams kyis tha mal sems dang lus bde ma yin phyir// sngar bshad nyes 'gro de yi 'bras bu sdug/ 
204a7(mdo sde): bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur// mi nyid spangs nas dbang med mi rnams bde ba kun la slu byed pa'i// sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur de nas shi 'phos gyur nas ni// 'gro ba
204a8(mdo sde): lnga po'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtsub par dud 'gro rnams su skye// de ltar lus can 'khyam pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal zod par gyur pa med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs
204b1(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar shi ba gtso bar 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang gang
204b2(mdo sde): du skye ba'i skye ba de dang de thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang ngage 'dun dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang / de dag las/ 
204b3(mdo sde): chos kyang thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsam pa bzhin du/ byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 
204b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum la sku dbas su song nas/ gzhan dag kyang gsum la skyabasu 'gro rab grub pa la rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang / rnam pa thams
204b5(mdo sde): cad kun tu rdzogs shing rgyas la rgya chen po legs par bya sa pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'ju ga pa dang / mkhan pa dang / slob dpon shes shing gus pa
204b6(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa dang bka' blo bde ba dang / 'thun par 'dzin par sgrub pa dang / kun tu thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems can thams cad bdag dang 'dra zhing bu gcig pa'i
204b7(mdo sde): byis pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / ci ltar brtsams pa'i mdo sgrub pa dang / klag pa dang / kha thon dang / lung mnod pa dang / bshad pa rnams yid la byed pa yangs shing rnam pa sna
204b8(mdo sde): tshogs pa dag gis bar chad med par bsgom pa la mngon par zhen cing bsgrub par byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso
205a1(mdo sde): bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang de thams cad du/ bar chad med par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 
205a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas/ yid dga' zhing ci bsam/ 
205a3(mdo sde): pa bzhin du/ byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su gcad pa
205a4(mdo sde): 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi chos la gnas// de dag nyid kyis sam das can thams cad 'dul bar byed// sangs rgyas sku gzugs
205a5(mdo sde): gzugs legs rnams ni byed par 'gyur// mkhas pa rnams ni slob dpon tshig la mchod par byed// gang dag phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten ma lus la/ 
205a6(mdo sde): bdag dang bu gcig byis po rnams dang 'drar mthong ba/ de dag srid pa kun tu mya ngan med nges 'gyur// shin tu rnam dag thugs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong // gang dag
205a7(mdo sde): shes rab rin chen chen po 'byor mdzad rnams// nyin dang mtshan du dge ba kun tu spyod par byed// 'dir ni rmad du byung ba'i 'od dang ldan pa rnams// 'jig rten mun pa che la snang ba mchog
205a8(mdo sde): byed 'gyur// kun tu chos rnams thams cad rab tu rnam phye nas// sangs rgyas lam las mchog ni gzhan med par// nges par byas nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi// 
205b1(mdo sde): mthar thug 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni shes par 'gyur// de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshig zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ste/ 
205b2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam po dang / so so'i g.yog 'khor lnga brgyargyam pa de dgan ces rnamal chos kyi mig rdul med
205b3(mdo sde): cing dri ma dang bral ba thob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
205b4(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis ni/ ci bsam pa bzhin gyi thag pa rnams la sems skyed do// 
205b5(mdo sde): ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa yang thob cing ma tog dang spos dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / rgyan la sogs pa/ dpag tu med pa rnams kyis bcom ldan
205b6(mdo sde): 'das la gtor to// de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan
205b7(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de leg su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa'i bla ma chos lnga po 'di dag legs par gsungs pa legs so/ 
205b8(mdo sde): legs so// chos lnga po de dag thos nas/ 'khor 'di yid bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par don grub par gyur lags so// ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'di nyid thos nas
206a1(mdo sde): nag po'i phyogs spangs te/ dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing brtul zhugs grub par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
206a2(mdo sde): 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par spyan 'dren na/ bdag cag la thugs brtsa ba'i sladu/ khyod kyis de ltar gnang bar mdzad du gsel/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
206a3(mdo sde): tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang bar mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste/ yid
206a4(mdo sde): rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bas bya ngag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
206a5(mdo sde): ba byas nas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas seng ngo // de rang gi khyim song nas/ pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyag byas te/ thal mo lcug lkug
206a6(mdo sde): por sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum 'di ltar gang 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po khams gsum pa thams cad las 'das// 
206a7(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gis gdugs chod la spyan drangs na/ des kyang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ gnang lags kyis mkhyen
206a8(mdo sde): par mdzod cig/ de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyis pha ma dag yid dga' ste/ 'di skad ces smras// bu legaso// khyed kyis lags par byas so zhes mngon par stod de/ de bzhin gshegs
206b1(mdo sde): ba mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyur to// de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyis rang gi rlung ma dam pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la bsgo ba/ bzang mo khyad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe/ 
206b2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i don du/ bza' ba dang / btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa mang ba dang / bsod par sbyor cig/ sbyar nas kyang
206b3(mdo sde): khyim thams cad chag chag gdab pa dang / phyag dar bya ba dang / bla re bre ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi gdags pa dang / me tog chal bar bgram pa dang / bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs
206b4(mdo sde): par byed du chug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig pa'i gdan ci 'os su thing ste/ mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul ba spyan ngar bzhag pas
206b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dam pa de la sdod cig ces bsgo ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros mdza' bshas dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'grogs
206b6(mdo sde): shing ci skad smras pa thams cad byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal bskyed mos tshal
206b7(mdo sde): chen po nas/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dpal rnam par 'phral pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rol pas/ cho 'phrul dang bcas
206b8(mdo sde): bar mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por gshegaso// gshegs nas kyang rim gyis spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim ga la ba de log su bzhud do// de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog/ 
207a1(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das bsu nas mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
207a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba dang bcas par khyim gyi nang du gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das ni ci 'os pa'i gdan mchog la bzhugs// dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'os pa la 'khod do// 
207a3(mdo sde): de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dang / slas dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams ni yid dga' 'dud la/ bla ma la gus pa dang / gces par
207a4(mdo sde): byed pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dag 'dun dang thabs gcig pa la 'drim par rtsom mo// / spobs pa'i blo gros ni/ me tog dang / spros chur bcas
207a5(mdo sde): pas bkang ba'i ril ba thogs nas/ ston pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal/ kha'i grogs po gnyis shig/ spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim du/ 
207a6(mdo sde): phyin par gyur nas/ de gnyis las gcig ni dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang / btung ba 'byor tshegs shes ma smras la/ bcom ldan
207a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs rang ba ma gsungs pas/ de gang gis kyang ci yang ma byin nas/ de khros te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du/ kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang gis
207a8(mdo sde): yang ma byin pa ni/ dge sbyong bdag nyid ngan pa rnams te/ sems nye bar zhi ba ma yin zhing / snying rje med la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag go// gang de dag la byin
207b1(mdo sde): yang 'bras bu med pa de lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni/ sbyin pa dag blun pa ste/ gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na/ thams cad kyi lcags kyi 'khor los gcad do snyam du sems par
207b2(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag 'byor tshogs shes byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rje su thugs rang bar mdzad pa dang / 
207b3(mdo sde): gcig shes 'ongs par gyur to// des ni bza' ba dang / btung ba mang ba dang / bsod pa thob nas// de yi rangs te/ phyir byung nas 'di snyam du/ kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la
207b4(mdo sde): gang gis bza' ba dang / btung ba mang dang / bsod pa dbyin pa ni dge sbyong bdag nyid chen po rnams te/ stong brtse bar byed la sems nye bar zhi ba yin zhing byams pa'i
207b5(mdo sde): bdag nyid can dag go/ 'dis ni bdag zhag bdun du tshim bar 'gyur bar bya'o// gang 'di dag la byin na/ 'bras bu che ba sbyin gnas chen po 'di lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa
207b6(mdo sde): ni sprin bdag chen po mkhas pa ste legs so// gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhag bdun du/ bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis
207b7(mdo sde): rimo gror byed par gyur cig snyam du sems par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs chod gsol nas/ gsung sder gyu ste phyag bcabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
207b8(mdo sde): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dang phyin cad bza' ba dang / btung ba ma blangs pa nyid du rje su yi rang ba brjod cig/ de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das
208a1(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin tu
208a2(mdo sde): gzhug pa sngon du byed pa'i chos kyi gtam sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyed par mdzad de/ gdan las bzhengs nas bzhud de/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs
208a3(mdo sde): nas/ de na bzhugaso// de nas sdug bsngal ba de gnyis 'khor 'khor 'khyam 'khyam ste/ yul gzhan zhig tu song nas pha zad chu zad tsam gyi phyogasu nyal bar gyur to// der bsod nams
208a4(mdo sde): kyi las can de la steng gi namakha' la grib ma'i don tu/ sprin gyi bla re klog dang rlung 'byung ba dang bcas pa rab tu gnas bar gyur to// de'i tshe yul de na rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chib
208a5(mdo sde): dus byas so// de na gang rgyal srid la dbang bskur bar bya/ ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa yang gzhan med de/ de na tshong dpon dang grong mi dang / yul mi dang / blon po chen
208a6(mdo sde): bai dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams ni/ mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan dang / skar ma dang / gza' spyod pa la mkhas pa la/ rgyal por 'gyur ba su yod ces
208a7(mdo sde): brtson par gyur cing da sa smras pa skyes bu dbul po mtshan dang ldan pa zhig yod do// de ni rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// rgyal po la 'os pa ring thang che ba'i
208a8(mdo sde): khri stan bzang po gser gyi rkang rten dang bcas pa dang / yu ba nor bu las byas pa'i gdugs dkar po dang / yu ba gser las byas shing / nor bu ldan pa'i rnga ma'i bsil yab dang / spos
208b1(mdo sde): chus bkang ba'i bum pa du ma dang / me tog dang / rgyan 'phreng dang / gos dang / dbu rgyan dang thod dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang / spos kyi phur ma dang / sme ma dag thogs te/ sil
208b2(mdo sde): snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang bcas pa dag dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nas byung ste/ kun nas de kun tu btsal to// ltas mkhan des sprin gyi tshogs kyis bkab pa'i/ 
208b3(mdo sde): phyogs de mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag gis sprin sngon po'i dkyil 'khor gyis khebs pa dga' zhing gsal ba'i phyogs mthong ngam/ de
208b4(mdo sde): dog gis smras pa grogs po mthong ngo // des sna ngas pa de na rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'dug ste/ de'i bsod nams kyi las kyi grib ma'i
208b5(mdo sde): don du sprin de dag 'dus// de nas de dag dong nasasil snyan dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgras sbran te/ btod nas de la 'di skad ces smras so// dbang bskur ba bzhes
208b6(mdo sde): la rgyal por gyur cig/ des smras pa/ kho bo lta bu rgyal po'i 'os ga la yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ bsod nams kyi las can khyod de skad ma zer bar/ khyod gdon mo za bar
208b7(mdo sde): rgyal po bya dgos// smras pa/ de bzhin du gyur cig/ de nas de dag gi gser gyi rkang rten la rkang pa bzhag pa de stan bzang po la 'dug du bcug nas// bkris thams cad kyis rgyas
208b8(mdo sde): par byed cing / dbang bskur te/ dbu rgyan der thaMd can la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis rgyan nas/ shing rta'i mgo leg su gdugs chen po bsgreng ste/ gcugs shing u pa gsor
209a1(mdo sde): las byas pa nor bu can gyi rnga ma'i bsil yab dag gis g.yob cing / lha rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig ces/ kun nas mngon par bstod de rgyal
209a2(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor du khrid do// de nas rgyal po'i shing rta de bsgyur ba'i 'khor los bkren pa gcig shos gnyid log pa'i mgo tshad do// de nas bsod nams kyi las can de yang rgyal srid
209a3(mdo sde): la gnas par gyur to// de'i rgyal srid de yang yams kyi nad med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos
