326a3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de la yid dul ba ni yid kyi las kyi nyes pa rnam pa gsum yongasu sungs pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni ser sna'i sems 'dul ba la gnas kyis// gzhan dag kyang ser sna
326a4(mdo sde): sems dul ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur/ ra te/ de la ser sna'i sems 'dul ba ni/ bdog pa tham su cad yongasu gtong ba gang yin pa'o// bdag ni g.ya
326a5(mdo sde): med pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang g.yo med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la g.yo med pa ni sems can thams cad la sems
326a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa'o// de la sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam
326a7(mdo sde): dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// / bam po bzhi pa// 'jam dpal gzhan yang
326a8(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongasu sbyang bar 'gyur to// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ni le lo'i sems 'dul ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan
326b1(mdo sde): dag kyang la la'i sems 'dul ba la dag da gas dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur/ de la le la'i sems 'dul ba ni dge bcom pa thams cad la zhum pa med pa'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas
326b2(mdo sde): mchod pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la sangs rgyas mchod pa ni gang byin gyi rlabs byas nas/ sangs rgyas 'gyu
326b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i chos ston pa gang yin pa de dag la mchod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'o// bdag ni ye shes spyod pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang ye shes spyod pa
326b4(mdo sde): la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la ya des spyod pa ni sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i rab tu 'ged pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni ngag gi spyod po la
326b5(mdo sde): gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ngag gi spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbug/ sa 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te// de la ngag gi spyod pa ni sem sa can thams cad kyi ngag gi nyes pa yongasu sbyong po gang
326b6(mdo sde): yin pa'o// bdag ni sems kyi spyod pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sems kyi spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la sems kyi spyod pa ni sems can thams
326b7(mdo sde): cad kyi sems kyi nyes pa yongasu sbyong ba gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam
326b8(mdo sde): dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byon pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ni bdud kyi las sgro btags pa med pa sangs
327a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi phrin las la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bdud kyi las sgro btags pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin las la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par
327a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de la bdud kyi las sgro btags pa mang pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin las ni/ bdud kyi las sgra btags pas/ sems can yongasu smin par byed pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni de bzhin
327a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o// zhes bya bar mos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la
327a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa ni dbyer med pa'i phyir ro// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug go/ zhes bya bar mo das pa gnas kyis// gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs
327a5(mdo sde): pather zug go zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'gyu na ba rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad rgyun ma
327a6(mdo sde): gcod pa'i phyir ro// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa zhes bya ba mos pa la dgod de zhes
327a7(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa shis pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba dang // thob pa dang / dran pa rnams don yod pa'i phyir ro// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa g.yung
327a8(mdo sde): drung ngo zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa g.yung drungango zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la de bzhin
327b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa g.yung drung zhes bya ba ni sku'i mtha' med pa'i phyir ro// sku mtha' med pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang
327b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'grur
327b3(mdo sde): te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni phan pa'i dngos po la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang phan pa'i dngos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la phan pa'i dngos po
327b4(mdo sde): ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems kyi mi bde ba yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir/ de sdug bsngal gyi yo byad gang ci yang mi len pa med de bde ba'i yo byad gang ci yang yongs
327b5(mdo sde): su mi gtong ba med pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni chos tham sa cad mtshan ma med pa la gnas kyis// gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la dgod do
327b6(mdo sde): zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rlom sems ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// 
327b7(mdo sde): bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabasu song ba yin gyis// gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la sangs rgyas la skyabs
327b8(mdo sde): su 'gro ba ni sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni chos la skyabasu song ba yin gyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos la skyabasu 'gro ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin po rnyed// 
328a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ de la chos la skyabasu 'gro ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni dge 'dun la skyabasu song ba
328a2(mdo sde): yin gyis gzhan dag kyang dge 'dun la skyabasu 'gro ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyurade yi dge 'dun la skyabasu 'gro ba ni rje su chags pa dang / khong khrog
328a3(mdo sde): spangs pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga pa de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang gi yongs sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan
328a4(mdo sde): yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa'ade rnams kyis dang ba yongasu spyod bar 'gyur te/ lhag deng shen 'di ltaste/ pidag ni lus mo byed pa la gnas
328a5(mdo sde): kyis/ gzhan dag kyang lus mo byed pa la dgod do zhes dbu gas 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyu / de la lus mi/ dpa ni pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba gang
328a6(mdo sde): yin pa'o// bdag ni dad pa mi phyed pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dad pa mi byed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dad pa mi phyed pa ni las
328a7(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa la dgod de/ 
328a8(mdo sde): zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la snyoms par 'jug pa ni/ dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni chos mi phyed pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan
328b1(mdo sde): dag kyang chos mi byed pa la dgod dogs dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos mi byed pa na chos grub pa gang yin pa'o// bdag na dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi byed pa la/ 
328b2(mdo sde): gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byon pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi phyed pa no// dge
328b3(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen mi slu ba gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 
328b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag kya dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongasu spyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'odi lta ste
328b5(mdo sde): bdag ni chos dang rje su 'thun pa'i chos la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang chos dang rje su 'thun pa'i chos la dag do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la
328b6(mdo sde): chos dang rje su 'thun pa'i chos ni chos la yang dag pa nyid du sgrub pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni de tsha shes pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang ngo tsha shes pa la dgod do/ 
328b7(mdo sde): zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la ngo tsha shes pa ni lus dang ngag gi legs par spyod pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni khrel yod pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag
328b8(mdo sde): kyang khrel yod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la khrel yod pa ni yid kyi legs par spyod pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni yang dag par mthong ba la gnas kyis/ 
329a1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang yang dag par mthong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la yang dag par mthong ba ni chos thams cad la mtha' dang / 
329a2(mdo sde): dpung med par 'jug pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni rje su chags pa spong ba la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang rje su chags pa spong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la/ 
329a3(mdo sde): rjesu chags pa spong ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba'i las mi skyed pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po
329a4(mdo sde): yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang da bugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta/ 
329a5(mdo sde): ste/ bdag ni khong khro ba spong ba la gnas kyis/ gzha na dag kyang khong khro ba spong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la khong khro ba spong ba
329a6(mdo sde): ni dge ba'i las skyes pa rnams chud mi gzon pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni cho ga la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang cho ga la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ 
329a7(mdo sde): de la cho ga ni nga tsha shes pa dang khril yod pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par srung ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par
329a8(mdo sde): srung ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par srung ba ni las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni gzhan gyi dge
329b1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa bachung ma gnon pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chud ma gzon pa la dgod dgas dbugs 'byin parnyed par 'gyu / de la gzhan kyad / 
329b2(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni stong pa nyid la mos pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang stong pa nyid la mas
329b3(mdo sde): pa la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la stong pa nyid lta bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po
329b4(mdo sde): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongasu sbyong / bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa'
329b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur te/ ldo ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni sgrib pa med ba'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la gnas kyis// gzhan
329b6(mdo sde): dag kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyurate/ de la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ni/ gnyis
329b7(mdo sde): dang gnyi su med pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni chos rnams rten cing mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos rnams rten cing mi 'byung ngo // 
329b8(mdo sde): zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos rnams rten cing mi 'byung ba ni rkyen rnams mi skye ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// bdag
330a1(mdo sde): na chos thams cad gnas med do zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad gnas med do zhes bya bar mos
330a2(mdo sde): pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de chos thams cad gnas med do zhes bya ba ni phyogs cha tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro// bdag ni sangs rgyas na mkha' dang mtshus
330a3(mdo sde): so zhes mos pa la gnas kyis// gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas na mkha' dang mtshungaso zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la sangs rgyas
330a4(mdo sde): namakha' dang mtshungaso zhes bya ba ni/ tha dad pa/ med pa dang / rten pa med pa'i phyir ro// bdag ni sangs rgyas sems dang / yid dang rnam par
330a5(mdo sde): shes pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs
330a6(mdo sde): 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la sangs rgyas sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba ni lhan gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal
330a7(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongasu spong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub
330a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag
330b1(mdo sde): kyang sbyin pa las byung ba'i sdu ba'i ngos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te de la sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po ni bsam pa dang sbyor ba'o// bdag
330b2(mdo sde): na tshul khrims las byu 'i sdu ba'i dngos po la gnas kyis// gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims las byung ba'i sdu ba'i dngos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la
330b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po ni byams pa dang snying rje'o// bdag ni bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la gnas kyis// gzhan dag kyang bsgom
330b4(mdo sde): ba las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'a byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la bsgom ra ba las byung ba bsdu ba'i dngos po ni thabs kyis yang dag par
330b5(mdo sde): zin pa'i shes rab go bdag ni bsam pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang bsam pa la dgod do zhes dbugasa'abyin pa rnyed par 'gyur// de la bsam pa
330b6(mdo sde): ni dge ba'i chos rnams las dad pa dang 'dun pa'o// bdag ni sbyor ba la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang sbyor ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la
330b7(mdo sde): sbyor ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 
330b8(mdo sde): do nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi brjod pa mthar phyin par rig nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang ba
331a1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smraso// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ston pa thogs pa med pa gang yin/ sangs
331a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pa gang yin// 
331a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kun nas mngon tu gyur pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa gang yin// sangs
331a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mtha' yas pa gang yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul gang yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
331a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsamagyis mi khyab pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
331a6(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi kun tu gzigs pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi grags pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbyer med cing mo
331a7(mdo sde): gnas pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku thogs pa med pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba
331a8(mdo sde): gang yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa'i spyod pa'i gnas rnams gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a// 
331b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi samag mang su ldan par mdzad par ma 'jigs pa rnams gang yin de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu babang bas 'jam
331b2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mthong bar dkar ga par dka' ba/ brtag par bya ngo ma yin nang rtog sa
331b3(mdo sde): spyod pa ma yin ni/ mos par dga' ba ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sems can de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur
331b4(mdo sde): zhing zas nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro// 'jam du dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de/ dmus long la mar me mo gzugs kyimig dang ldan
331b5(mdo sde): ba rnams la mar ma gzugs te/ kye rgyal du ni/ sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po gang dag bsad nams dang ye shes kyi tshigs
331b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa bsags pa de dag gi par kho bo 'dra'o// gang dag bskul po grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yo dgas gshin rje 'dzin
331b7(mdo sde): rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las cha 'od nyid la myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi bye ba ba 'drar// gang dag mthong ba dang thos pa dang bstan bkur byas pa don yod pa de dag
331b8(mdo sde): ga bya la ba 'dres sbyin cig/ kyi rgyal pa sras ches kyi rnam grangs 'di la mams pa la blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma smras kyi
332a1(mdo sde): pa'i sras skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde bdang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang
332a2(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir ston cig de skad ces smras pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 'jam
332a3(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de la ston pa thogs pa med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams so son
332a4(mdo sde): gling re rer yang gser gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba'i lha dang ma rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhi na gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa
332a5(mdo sde): med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po skar 'od kyi kha dog gi 'a/ dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po/ cha'i rgyal po skar 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs
332a6(mdo sde): pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa
332a7(mdo sde): med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po gnyi zla mar me'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po gnyi zla mar me'i
332a8(mdo sde): kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa
332b1(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la
332b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po za ba can gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ 
332b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po za ba can gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba
332b4(mdo sde): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu ston pa la'o/ gas pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i
332b5(mdo sde): rgyal po seng ga'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi
332b6(mdo sde): rtse mo'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin pa che'i rgyal po brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor
332b7(mdo sde): bu rin po che'i rgyal po brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la
332b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chu dang bar byed pa'i kha dog gis
333a1(mdo sde): 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chu dang bar byed pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// 
333a2(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// 
333a3(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pad+ma ral gyi'i kha dog gis 'dal ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pad ma ral gyi'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// 
333a4(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog tu ston pa la
333a5(mdo sde): thogs pa medo// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po a/ nad rnyil gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po'i rgyal po an da
333a6(mdo sde): rnyil gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mthon ka chen po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor
333a7(mdo sde): bu rin po che'i rgyal po mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo'i snying po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la// de bzhin
333a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo'i snying po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams
333b1(mdo sde): 5/ de bzhin gshegs pa na bu na pa cha'i rgyal ba dpal gyi stong pa'i kha dag tu ston pa la thogs pa medade/ nar bu na pa che'i rgyal ba dge ba bkad pa'i kha dag gis 'dul
333b2(mdo sde): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nar du rin pa che'i rgyal ba dag pa bkod pa'i kha dag tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ nor bu rin pa che'i rgyal po ma chags pa bkod par
333b3(mdo sde): byung ba'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams lade bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba ma chags pa bkod par snying po'i kha dag tu ston pa lathogs pa mang do/ 
333b4(mdo sde): nar bu rin pa cher rgyal bi mu ta~Mg dkar bar kha dag gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin/ shegs pa nang bu nipa mi'i rgyal po mu tig dkar tsa
333b5(mdo sde): kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med de/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba mu tig mthon ka'i kha dog sa 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin
333b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba mu tig mthon ka'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba mu tig gser lta bu'i kha dog gis 'dus
333b7(mdo sde): ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig gser lta bu'i kha dag tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba mu
333b8(mdo sde): tog na mkha'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba mu tig na mkha'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// na
334a1(mdo sde): bu rin po che'i rgyal po bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med par rje su sgrog pa'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin
334a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med par rjesu sgrog pa'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ye shas
334a3(mdo sde): kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes
334a4(mdo sde): sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mchog dngas med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams
334a5(mdo sde): lo de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med po rje su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin
334a6(mdo sde): boche'i rgyal pos rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nar bu rin pa tsha'i rgyal pos rgya mtsho grangs med pardzasu skrag
334a7(mdo sde): pa'i kha dog tu snyan pa la thags pa med de/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes sgrog pa'i kha dag gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin ga shegs
334a8(mdo sde): pa nor bu rin pa che'i rgyal po gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsha grangs med pa
334b1(mdo sde): rje su skrag pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs
334b2(mdo sde): pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa'i rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog gos 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che
334b3(mdo sde): rgyal po rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes
334b4(mdo sde): sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha
334b5(mdo sde): dag tu ston pa la thogs pa med de// nor bu rin ba che'i rgyal po mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med brjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ 
334b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po smon
334b7(mdo sde): lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nar bu rin po che'i rgyal po smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rjesu sgrog par
334b8(mdo sde): kha dog tu ston pa thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dag gis 'dul ba rnams la// de bzhin ga
335a1(mdo sde): pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrogs pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po
335a2(mdo sde): che'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin
335a3(mdo sde): ba rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rdza su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgya la byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog
335a4(mdo sde): pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog pa'i kha dog
335a5(mdo sde): tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya man/ grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams
335a6(mdo sde): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i
335a7(mdo sde): rgyal po sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i
335a8(mdo sde): rgyal po sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi
335b1(mdo sde): khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pargya mtsha
335b2(mdo sde): grangs med pa rjesu skrag pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes sgrog pa'i kha dog gos 'dul ba rnams/ 
335b3(mdo sde): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bskal pa la 'jug pa brgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrogs pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po
335b4(mdo sde): dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog pa 'i kha dog gos 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum la 'jug
335b5(mdo sde): ba rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i/ rgyal po dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su
335b6(mdo sde): sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa/ 
335b7(mdo sde): med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mi skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po
335b8(mdo sde): che'i rgyal po mi skye bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrogs pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho
336a1(mdo sde): grangs med pa rjesu sgrogs pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs
336a2(mdo sde): med pa rjesu sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che
336a3(mdo sde): DUR+Ya la dngos po'i dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa 'byung ste/ nor bu rin pa bai DUR+Ya ni mo rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyis 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan
336a4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta dbu 'di dag 'byung // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de babazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
336a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i dbang gis kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzad pa 'byung / ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod/ 
336a6(mdo sde): kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ston pa thogs pa med pa'o// 'jam
336a7(mdo sde): dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul
336a8(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'jug pa rnams la mkhyen pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re
336b1(mdo sde): ridang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re dang / skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi bsad nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye bra ldan gan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thog pa med do// 
336b2(mdo sde): bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing zad kyi rdul snyed kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig
336b3(mdo sde): la zhing thams cad kyi rdul rnyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi
336b4(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyis rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de ba zhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul rnyed kyi gzungs
336b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya
336b6(mdo sde): mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med
336b7(mdo sde): ba'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thog pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
336b8(mdo sde): bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan
337a1(mdo sde): pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan
337a2(mdo sde): pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa
337a3(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa
337a4(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyirdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs
337a5(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la/ thogs pa med de// de bzhin du skad cig skad ci/ ga la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
337a6(mdo sde): la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zhing thams cad
337a7(mdo sde): la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can gyi bsam
337a8(mdo sde): ba dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi
337b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed
337b2(mdo sde): bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 
337b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ brag phug gi nang nas/ brag ca sems can gyi sgra rnam pa mang po 'jug pas/ sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan mtha' yas pa 'byung ste/ drag
337b4(mdo sde): namo rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyis 'on kyang / ma 'dres dpa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub da bar bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung // 'jam dpal de bzhin
337b5(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa la yang sems can gyi bas ma bci lta ba dang // 'dul ba ci lta ba de dag gis de lta bu'i skad ston pa 'byung bar shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
337b6(mdo sde): ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs
337b7(mdo sde): ba'i mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlabs kyang / bstan par mi nuso// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin
337b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa/ khyu mchog du gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig
338a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa// sgrib pa med pa dbyer med pa/ na mkha' khyab par 'gengs te/ sems can yongasu smin
338a2(mdo sde): par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams
338a3(mdo sde): cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa dbyer med pa/ na mkha' khyab par 'gangs pa/ sems can yong su smin par mdzad pa
338a4(mdo sde): khyu mchog tu gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par dan gyis brlab pa'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan re re yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
338a5(mdo sde): khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med/ pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ 
338a6(mdo sde): sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlab pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po phyogs bcu'i
338a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems
338a8(mdo sde): can yongasu smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal bar byin gyis rlab pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re re yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib
338b1(mdo sde): ba med pa dbyer med pa/ na mkha' 'khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha' mu'i bskal par byin gyis slob pa'o// de bzhin du de
338b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib
338b3(mdo sde): pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pas/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o// de ci'i
338b4(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ ma hA dris pa'i tshe dang ldan pa ni smon lam gyi stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs/ 
338b5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyu ra ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha' mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlabs kyang bstan par ma
338b6(mdo sde): nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas mngon du gyur pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re
338b7(mdo sde): dang rdul phra rab re re la ste/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi phyogs re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'khod pa ni rab tu mang gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
338b8(mdo sde): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re rgya mtsho grangs med padag gi rdul phra rab ni ches nyung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / gling dang / 
339a1(mdo sde): ri rab dang / ri rab chen po che/ khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor
339a2(mdo sde): dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho bran dag gang la yang gnod pa dang / sgrib pa med de/ sngon ci lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin du bya ba dag 'jug ste/ 
339a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// bsam pa ci lta ba dang / 'bul ba ci lta ba'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
339a4(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byingan dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dam dang mi ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
339a5(mdo sde): kyang 'di ltar kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnya' shing ga nga tsam na bzhugs par mngon du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 
339a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo ches bco lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na/ 'dzam bu gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo thamacad kyis zla ba'i dkyil
339a7(mdo sde): 'khor mdun na 'dug par mthong yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog med rgya 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog cing // lhun gyis grub par bya ba
339a8(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag sa bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi sems can bsam pa ci lta ba dang / 'dul
339b1(mdo sde): btsa lta ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mi
339b2(mdo sde): rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas mngon tu gyur pa mdor bstan pa yin ste/ rgyas par na
339b3(mdo sde): ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nuso// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongasu sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa ni de bzhin gshegs
339b4(mdo sde): pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
339b5(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la 'jug na/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni bsod rnams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan
339b6(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 
339b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma tshe la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lo la ni sa rgya mtsho/ 
339b8(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par
340a1(mdo sde): sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi
340a2(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho la la ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya
340a3(mdo sde): mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye
340a4(mdo sde): shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya dmatshol la ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag ba stan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi
340a5(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho la la ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam parasbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dbugs
340a6(mdo sde): rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
340a7(mdo sde): bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes
340a8(mdo sde): kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam
340b1(mdo sde): par spyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten rgya
340b2(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum bstan
340b3(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
340b4(mdo sde): bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni skyo bar sems bskyed/ dpa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes
340b5(mdo sde): kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dbyer med pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye bragabastan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ste/ de bzhin
340b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni gnas gang nas kyang gra mi g.yo'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
340b7(mdo sde): yongasu sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs
340b8(mdo sde): pa'i sku mtha' yas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re la ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra/ 
341a1(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brgya stong grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub
341a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshan ches mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi
341a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon tu gyur pa thob
341a4(mdo sde): pa dag ni ches ma // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i
341a5(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya/ mtshe ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa ga/ zhan dang gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon tu gyur
341a6(mdo sde): pa thob pa dag ni ches mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'o rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems
341a7(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob
341a8(mdo sde): ba dag ni ches mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i
341b1(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtshos rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon tu gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig
341b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
341b3(mdo sde): re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon tu gyur pa thob pa dge ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams
341b4(mdo sde): lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshog dngas med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams na rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
341b5(mdo sde): 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge na rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon tu gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches
341b6(mdo sde): mang ngo po// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya
341b7(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon tu gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mngo
341b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
342a1(mdo sde): 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon/ 
342a2(mdo sde): tu gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub
342a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon tu gyur
342a4(mdo sde): pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga pa nu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grang das med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi
342a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i bya/ nga chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas
342a6(mdo sde): la lta ba mngon tu gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang
342a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang
342a8(mdo sde): gzhan thob pa'i stobs skyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'ja
342b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag
342b2(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 
342b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i
342b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag ga/ zhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs
342b5(mdo sde): kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong / ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga/ bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med
342b6(mdo sde): pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho sa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag sa'i bye
342b7(mdo sde): brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul
342b8(mdo sde): snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
343a1(mdo sde): gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin
343a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab
343a3(mdo sde): tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag/ ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan
343a4(mdo sde): dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mthong ba dag ni chos ma drango // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
343a5(mdo sde): gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rna mas ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'a// khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
343a6(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang
343a7(mdo sde): gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub
343a8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye
343b1(mdo sde): brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stabs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag na ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul spyad/ 
343b2(mdo sde): kye 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ma ngan par
343b3(mdo sde): shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan
343b4(mdo sde): mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga ba cu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs ma da pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub
343b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sam/ sa dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzha na thob pa de dag smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i
343b6(mdo sde): stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du sbyar te/ rten pa rnams dang / ngo mtshar gyi 'du
343b7(mdo sde): shes rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams dang / dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rnams dang / sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa rnams dang
343b8(mdo sde): tshul khrims rnams dang / lung bstan pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag la 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang
344a1(mdo sde): spyod pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rnams dang // bskal pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / dus gsum bstan pa rnams dang / dus
344a2(mdo sde): gsum la 'jug pa rnams dang / mi skye ba'i sems skyed pa rnams dang / ye shes dbyer med gas pa ma'ams/ sangs rgyas ston pa rnams dang / kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / kun tu
344a3(mdo sde): bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos rnams dang / snying rje chen po thob pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / yongasu
344a4(mdo sde): dag pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ye shes rje su rtog pa rnams dang / so sor rtogs pa rnams dang / stobs bskyed pa rnams dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyi
344a5(mdo sde): lam rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'chad pa rnams dang / kun tu bzang po rnams dang / spobs pa rnams dang / ye shes kyi dbang rnams dang / gnas med pa rnams dang / sen
344a6(mdo sde): pa nyid dang / ye shes mngon par sgrub pa rnams dang / sprul pa rnams dang / byin gyi rlabs pa rnams dang / dbugs 'byin pa chen po rnyed pa rnams dang / zab mo la 'jug pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
344a7(mdo sde): kyi chos la rten pa rnams dang / sems bsnyad partan pa rnams dang / the rtsom thams cad gcod pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rnams dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / ldem po ngag la
344a8(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mngon par shes
344b1(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / rnam par grol ba rnams dang / bskyed mos tshal rnams dang / rin po che bkod pa rnams dang mo spyod pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa mi
344b2(mdo sde): gtong ba la gnas pa rnams dang / rgya mtsho lta bu'i ye shes 'jug pa rnams dang / rin po che lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa rnams dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / theg pa
344b3(mdo sde): chen po'i go tsa rnams dang / rtsom pa chen po rnams dang / rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa rnams dang / mi phyed pa'i dad pa rnams dang / lung bstan pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo ba rnams
344b4(mdo sde): dang / ye shes khong du chud pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rgya che ba mtha' dang / dpung med pa rnams dang / gter rnams da dang / sdom pa rnams dang / dbang rnam par sprul pa rnams
344b5(mdo sde): dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / chos rnam par sprul pa/ rnams dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang // ye shes rnam par
344b6(mdo sde): sprul pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / stobs rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / rnam par rol pa rnams dang / yul
344b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / lus rnams dang lus kyi las rnams dang / gzugs rnams dang / ngag
344b8(mdo sde): gi las rnams dang / sems rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rnams dang / sems rgyas par byed pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / bsam pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams dang / 
345a1(mdo sde): sbyor ba rnams dang / mos pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khamasu mos pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / bag chags rnams dang / len pa rnams dang / nan tan rnams
345a2(mdo sde): dang / 'grub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges pa rnams dang / theg pa rnams dang / mi 'gyur ba rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i chos rnams dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam
345a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa'i ming thob pa rnams dang / lam rnams dang / lam gyi tshad rnams dang / lam gyi tshogs rnams dang / lam bsgom pa rnams dang / lam bkod pa thams cad la'ang
345a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhun gyi grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta
345a5(mdo sde): ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi/ snod chus gang zhing sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa tham/ sa cad du snang ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par
345a6(mdo sde): mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang / ldan pa'i phyir/ rnam par mi rtog cing lhan gyi grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa yang
345a7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling re re re sems can bsam pa ci lta ba dang 'dul ba tsa lta ba de dag gis// cig car mthong ste de
345a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyis/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan zhing / sku thogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu
345b1(mdo sde): 'didag kyang drudang/ 'angam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sumathar mas pa mdang bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par na bya ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal bar byin gyis rlabs kyang bstan par mi nus pa/ 
345b2(mdo sde): bam po lnga pa ste tha ma'o// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni dpes bstan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag dpe bshad pas don shes par 'gyur ba
345b3(mdo sde): yod pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na mcho dpag tshad 'bum phrag lnga pa bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang khad chad du gyur pa pad+ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs pa zhig yod la/ de la
345b4(mdo sde): skyes bu la la zhig gis lcags kyi shing rta phang lo rtsab ma stong yod pa/ na mkha' lding gi mgyogs pa bas kyang lta dag pa'i rta de lta bur mgyogs pas shing rta drangs te/ de ltar mgyog
345b5(mdo sde): pa'i shing rta drangs nas/ phang lo la yang chus mi reg/ rta'i rmig pas kyang pad+ma'i 'dab ma mi rdol ba de lta bu'i shing rta/ des drangs pa las// mtsho chen po de nas sbrul gdug pa steng
345b6(mdo sde): du byung ste/ skad cig gang la shing rta bsgyur ba'i skad cig de la/ sbrul gdug pa des/ shing rta de lan bcur bskor te/ 'jam dpal skad cig gang gis sbrul gdugs pas shing rta de lan cig
345b7(mdo sde): bskor ba'i skad cig de la dge slong kun dga' bos chos rnam pa cu bstan pa bshad de don yang rig par byed do// dge slong kun dga' bos skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de
345b8(mdo sde): la/ dge slong shA ri'i bus chos rnam pa stong bstan pa bshad nas don kyang rig par byed do// dge slong sha ri'i bus skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la/ gnas brtan
346a1(mdo sde): me'u dgal gyi 'u 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri'ada'o// gnas partan ma'u dgal gyi bus skad cig gang la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'das pa'i dang / 
346a2(mdo sde): cig de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi gling re reng / dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa las 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par
346a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang / sbyor ba dang byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mya ngan las 'da'
346a4(mdo sde): ba chen po dang / chos gnos pa dang / chos nub pa dus gci ngag tu ston to// mu stegs can gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs thams cad du yang dus gcig tu sna // de ci'i
346a5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa dang / gzigs pa tho gas pa med pa dbyar med pa dang / mi brten cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na rin po che ba
346a6(mdo sde): DUr+ya las dngos po'i dbang gis gzhal du med pa'i bya ba dag 'byung ste/ bai DUr+ya ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ma rtog cing lhun gyis grub
346a7(mdo sde): por bya ba gzhal du med pa dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las kyang / sems can yongasu smin par
346a8(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i dbang gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du dus cig tu skad cig skad cig la/ mdzad pa gzhal du med pa dag 'byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin
346b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa na mo rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper
346b2(mdo sde): na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling du snod chus bkang ba bsgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams cad du cig car du snang yang gnas nas mi g.yo'o// de bzhin du de
346b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du sems can sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa de dag
346b4(mdo sde): bsam pa ci lta ba dang ci ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin ga/ rags pa mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dga' ldan dganas nas g.yos pa yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang phyogs
346b5(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du mdzad brtsom pa thams cad kyang snang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes par phyir ro// 'jam dpal
346b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rab 'bring dang ba ma'i dbang gis/ sems can rnams kyi 'du byed rab 'bring dang tha ma dag 'byung ste/ 'du byed ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod
346b7(mdo sde): na kyang 'du byed de dag ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo // de bzhin du rnam par smin pa tha ma dang 'bring dang rab kyi dbang gi
346b8(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang 'bring dang rab tu mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nim rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i
347a1(mdo sde): phyir mo rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na sprin las cig par char 'bab ste/ bab nas snod kyi bye drag gis kha dog/ 
347a2(mdo sde): sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogasu gyur te/ sprin nam rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag
347a3(mdo sde): kyang 'byung // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ro gcig ste/ de sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i dbang gis chos kyi dbyings tha dad par snang yang / 
347a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi / 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang
347a5(mdo sde): 'byung // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin pa cha dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der/ lcags dang lcags kyi yo byed rnams mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma
347a6(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang du 'byung ba der me'i 'od rnams dang glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo // der nyi ma'i 'od rnams
347a7(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo // der nor bu'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo // der lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya
347a8(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo // deng rgyal po rnams kyi bka' mi 'byung ngo // dang rigs bzhi rnams mi 'byung ngo // der mi khom par skye ba rnams ma
347b1(mdo sde): 'byung // der sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnams mi 'byung // der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung // der nyon mongs pa
347b2(mdo sde): thams cad mi 'byung ngo // der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung // der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tsho ba pa rnams mi 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa ni
347b3(mdo sde): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan zhing / yul chags pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 
347b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la dor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus// 'jam dpal de la de
347b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes ni/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul ste// da kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
347b6(mdo sde): rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang re rer skad cig skad cig la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang rnam par gnas pa dang / 'jug pa dus
347b7(mdo sde): gcig du 'byung ba dag ni ches mang ste/ de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
347b8(mdo sde): mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig brten gyi khams ra ra dang gling re rer/ sems can
348a1(mdo sde): rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rtsom par sbyor ba dang / las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad la sbyor ba dag 'byung ba ni ches mang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
348a2(mdo sde): nim rtog rnam par ma rtog mad kya/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i
348a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bya ba thams cad gang ci 'byung ba de dag thams
348a4(mdo sde): cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i tshengs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper
348a5(mdo sde): nas la brtan sa la gnas nas/ sa bon thams cad dang rtsa dang shing gal ba dang rtsi dang nags tshal 'phel zhirgyas la yangs par 'gyur te/ sa ni mo rtog rnam par mi
348a6(mdo sde): rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
348a7(mdo sde): pa la brten de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa
348a8(mdo sde): stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
348b1(mdo sde): nimi rtog rnam par ma rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par ma rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na
348b2(mdo sde): gang dag zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman la reg gi zug rngu thams cad 'byin te/ zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog/ 
348b3(mdo sde): cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag za na de bzhin gshegs pa ri mor bris pa 'am glegs bam la bris pa la reg kyang rung ste/ rgyu des de dag
348b4(mdo sde): ga 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gzugs rngu 'byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa na mo rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang
348b5(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che'i rgyal po yid
348b6(mdo sde): bzhin gyi nor bu ni sems can thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i
348b7(mdo sde): phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa gang 'dod
348b8(mdo sde): pade dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro zhing chos bstan pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa las nyan kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres
349a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub par
349a2(mdo sde): ye shes mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni bye ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nuso// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyos mi khyab pa ni/ 
349a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul phra rab re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
349a4(mdo sde): rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag la 'jug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang gling re rer yang 'jig rte/ don gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong // 
349a5(mdo sde): phrag lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad ba rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag
349a6(mdo sde): pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la/ 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob
349a7(mdo sde): pa dag ni ches mang ngo // de bzhin du ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa
349a8(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi mi mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
349b1(mdo sde): bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la/ 'byung ba thog pa med pa sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' mu'i
349b2(mdo sde): bskal par byin gyis rlobs pa dag go// de bzhin dus rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med
349b3(mdo sde): pa dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par
349b4(mdo sde): gzhag pa las 'das pa/ skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i
349b5(mdo sde): bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzi na tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa na ma par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung
349b6(mdo sde): ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi mo'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du rnam par thar pa tha dad pa
349b7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa/ skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa na mkha'i khams rgyas par
349b8(mdo sde): 'gangs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las
350a1(mdo sde): 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrub pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal
350a2(mdo sde): bar byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rgya mche grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa/ skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med/ 
350a3(mdo sde): pa dbyer med gnamakha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag
350a4(mdo sde): ba las 'das pa/ skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ slob pa med pa/ dbyer med ba/ na mkha khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal pa/ 
350a5(mdo sde): byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ de bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhanab las 'das pa/ skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa
350a6(mdo sde): med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs/ 
350a7(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa/ skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 
350a8(mdo sde): phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa/ skad cig/ 
350b1(mdo sde): skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob dag go// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
350b2(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa/ skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i
350b3(mdo sde): khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ de bzhin du sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa
350b4(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa/ skad cig skad cig la 'a byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa// na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'
350b5(mdo sde): mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du 'dzi/ gi rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa
350b6(mdo sde): skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// 
350b7(mdo sde): de bzhin du bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa/ skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa
350b8(mdo sde): na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gangs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'das pa
351a1(mdo sde): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag yod pa dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re rer 'jig cing chag so// de ci'i phyir
351a2(mdo sde): na/ mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos nyid bsnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin
351a3(mdo sde): gyis rlabs kyang bstan par mi nuso// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi/ sems can 'chi 'phob
351a4(mdo sde): dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ de bzhin du gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigaso// de bzhin du mdzod spras
351a5(mdo sde): kyang gzig so// de bzhin du mtshan re res kyang gzigaso// de bzhin du dab byad bzang po re res kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re res kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du
351a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na/ sems can 'tsho 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba dag dus gcig tu gzig so// 'jam
351a7(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa mdor bshad pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par ma nuso// 'jam dpal de la de
351a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa ni/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling ra re dang / 
351b1(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag 'jug cing / sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams
351b2(mdo sde): re re dang / gling re rer/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa
351b3(mdo sde): thams cad 'byung ste/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha' mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du zhing rnam par
351b4(mdo sde): 'phrul pa dang / chos rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku rnam pa/ ra 'phrul pa dang / smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes rnam par 'phrul
351b5(mdo sde): ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang // rdzu 'phru la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / stobs rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu la sogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
351b6(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phral ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa dag skad cig skad cig la 'byung ste/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i
351b7(mdo sde): mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par
351b8(mdo sde): ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlabs kyang bstan par mi nuso// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyer med cing mi gnas pa ni/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'ji/ 
352a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di na tha dad la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gling 'di na tha dad la/ gling gzhan du gnas pa
352a2(mdo sde): ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa khyim 'di na tha dad la/ khyim gzhan du gnas pa gzhan yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i ros 'di na tha dad la/ lha'i ris gzhan du gnas pa ma yin/ 
352a3(mdo sde): no// de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba 'don tha dad la/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa yi dgas kyi 'gro ba 'di na
