352a4(mdo sde): dad la/ yi dgas kyi 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba gzhan du gnas
352a5(mdo sde): ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i khams na tha dad la/ gzugs kyi khamasu gnas pa ma yin/ no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dbyer med cing ma
352a6(mdo sde): gnas pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo'i thogs pa
352a7(mdo sde): med pa ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dag na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag yod pa de dag gi ni mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/ dus gsum gyi phyogs
352a8(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa dag na rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'byung ba dang / 'dzag par snang ba rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtha' ni phyogs rnams na mi rnyed do// de dag gi na mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha'
352b1(mdo sde): ni yod srid kyi/ de bzhin du rgyal ba'i mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe bzang po re re dang / de bzhin du sA'i khung bu re re'i mthar ni phyogs rnams na mi rnyed do// 
352b2(mdo sde): dang mi dang byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi tshul bstan pa ci lta bus 'dul ba de dag gis chos kyi tshul bstan pa de 'dra ba dag 'byung bar shes te/ de la lha dang mi dang byang chub sems dpa'
352b3(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni gtsug tor la bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa
352b4(mdo sde): dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
352b5(mdo sde): bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni gzung sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung ba sheso// kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med
352b6(mdo sde): pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho
352b7(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni smon lam rgya mtsho
352b8(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gos ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni dbugs 'byin pa
353a1(mdo sde): / rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa
353a2(mdo sde): dag 'byung bar sheso// kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes// kha cig gis ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug
353a3(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha
353a4(mdo sde): cig gis ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa/ de'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig/ dgis ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
353a5(mdo sde): bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni dus ga sum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan ba dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni mi skyo ba'i sems
353a6(mdo sde): bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dga' byung bar shes so// lha dang mid byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor nas dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
353a7(mdo sde): bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes// de bzhin du lha dang mi dang byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa ci lta ba dang / 'dul ba ci lta ba zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyad dag gis/ sems kyi skad cig sems
353a8(mdo sde): kyi skad cig la/ de bzhin du mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas chos tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar
353b1(mdo sde): shes so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal
353b2(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ni 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na rdul phra rab kyi rdul yod pa dag na
353b3(mdo sde): rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag ni ches mang ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo// byang
353b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bcu dang / nyi shu dang sum nu dang / bzhi bcu'o// byang chub sems dpe'i kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya'o// byang chub sems
353b5(mdo sde): dpa' khe cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu'o// 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong ngo // 
353b6(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni
353b7(mdo sde): dpag tshad bye ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi
353b8(mdo sde): khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag stong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu
354a1(mdo sde): dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu yod de/ de dag thams cad kyis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gling thams cad
354a2(mdo sde): na dus gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyis gyur du mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa gang la la zhig/ sems kyi
354a3(mdo sde): skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi gom pa 'dor bas/ steng gi phyogs logs su song ste/ gom pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams lnga
354a4(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor song la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug tshol zhing ngani na du 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi bskul
354a5(mdo sde): pa rgya mtshor song yang / der yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyi sa gyur du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs
354a6(mdo sde): pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'a'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par ma nuso// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs
354a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni/ 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu
354a8(mdo sde): nyung gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni ches mang
354b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas ci snyed bde bas na/ de
354b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjesu sgrogs pa dag ches mang ngo // sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ de bzhin du gtsug
354b3(mdo sde): tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan re re dang / dpe byad bzang po rer dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho dag 'byung ste/ de la 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig
354b4(mdo sde): ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgyam tshe grangs med pa rje su skrag go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha
354b5(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho
354b6(mdo sde): grangs med pa rjesu sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes
354b7(mdo sde): sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni mngon par shes brgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho
354b8(mdo sde): kha cig ni brtson 'grus rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang
355a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa
355a2(mdo sde): rje su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjesu sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa
355a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho
355a4(mdo sde): grangs med pa rjesu sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni mi skye ba'i sems
355a5(mdo sde): bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rje su sgrog ste/ thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med
355a6(mdo sde): pa/ dbyer med pa/ na mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gangs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob bo// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongasu smin par mdzad
355a7(mdo sde): pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs
355a8(mdo sde): pa'o sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jigs pa ni/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig skad cig la// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
355b1(mdo sde): thams cad na/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rgya mtsho dag dus gcig tu rdul gcig la yong su smin par mdzad do// de la sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs
355b2(mdo sde): tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
355b3(mdo sde): bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par
355b4(mdo sde): mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig na sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho dgrangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yong su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtshol
355b5(mdo sde): cig ni gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan kha'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sem sa can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgya mtsho grang
355b6(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis
355b7(mdo sde): yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sam
355b8(mdo sde): can rgya mtsho kha cig ni mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyi yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam tha dad
356a1(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya kha cig ni 'artson 'grus rtsom pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
356a2(mdo sde): bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smon par
356a3(mdo sde): mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho
356a4(mdo sde): kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtshe grangs med pa'i bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu da smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni sems
356a5(mdo sde): can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni/ 
356a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams lo 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa la 'jug pa tha dad
356a7(mdo sde): ba grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// de bzhin du dus gsum la 'jug pa dang / dus gsum bstan pa dang mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dbyer/ 
356a8(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par mdzad do// de bzhin du sems can rnam par sprul pa dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa dang / chos rnam par sprul pa dang / lus rnam par sprul pa/ 
356b1(mdo sde): dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dang / 
356b2(mdo sde): stobs rnam par sprul pas/ rnam par rol pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la sems can rgya mtsho zhing thams
356b3(mdo sde): cad kyi rdul snyed dge rdul gcig la yongasu smin par mdzad do// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jig pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas
356b4(mdo sde): par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyi dang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu da'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa rgya
356b5(mdo sde): mtsho gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ 'jig rten gyi kham sa zad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can dag nyin cig bzhin lha ri zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gis
356b6(mdo sde): rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa gcig la/ 
356b7(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa la bslabs pa'o snyam du bsams nas/ nyin cig zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal/ 
356b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten
357a1(mdo sde): gyi khams thamad kyi rdul snyed dag la/ nyan cig bzhin lda pas rab rgyadang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du m+b+ha'i gos rnams sbyin pa dran pa pas/ 
357a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma gzhan gang zhig gis dge slong gcig la nyin cig zhan cig byin na// 'don de ngas chos bsod nams gras med bskyed do// 'ja ma dpa la rigs kyis
357a3(mdo sde): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi bskal pa rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge slong dag la/ nyon cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro
357a4(mdo sde): brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mar gzhan gang zhig gis dad pas rje su 'brang ba cig la nyin cig/ 
357a5(mdo sde): zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs ma por skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang ba la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
357a6(mdo sde): du 'jig rten khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dad pas rje su 'brang ba dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas// rigs
357a7(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rje su 'brang ba gcig la nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de ngas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am ra/ 
357a8(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhog gis/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rjesu 'brang ba dag la nyin cig bzhin du lho'o zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / 
357b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gos brgyad pa cig la nyin cig phan cig byin na// 'doni debs ches bsod nams grangs med
357b2(mdo sde): par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi brgyad pa dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas
357b3(mdo sde): ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gi/ rgyun tu zhugs pa gcig la nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 
357b4(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jom/ dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams tham
357b5(mdo sde): cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun tu zhugs pa dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu
357b6(mdo sde): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin cig zan cig byin na// 'di ni debs ches bsod nams grangs med par spyod do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
357b7(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa
357b8(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches
358a1(mdo sde): bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams
358a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am
358a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
358a4(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bco dam pa dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan
358a5(mdo sde): ba byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan ga nga zhig gis/ rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin cig zan
358a6(mdo sde): cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas chos bsod nams grongs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis// bskal pa gang+gA ri klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi
358a7(mdo sde): khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
358a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa 'am gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed na// thal mo sbyor ba 'am/ me tog gam
358b1(mdo sde): bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang / 
358b2(mdo sde): ga'i klu'i go bye ma snyed du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul ba dang / de
358b3(mdo sde): bzhin du lha'i nam bza' rnams phul ba bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ tha na phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs
358b4(mdo sde): ba cig la/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung de bas yong su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin cig zan cig byin ngan yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed
358b5(mdo sde): do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/ zhig gis/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du// phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa'

358b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge bo'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongasu 'dzin te/ 
358b8(mdo sde): za na nyin cig zan cig byin na yang / 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang ga'i
359a1(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed du/ glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin du ltani/ 
359a2(mdo sde): zas ro brgya ba byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta
359a3(mdo sde): bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongasu 'dzin te/ tha na nyin cig zan cig byin na yang / 'di ni de bas ches
359a4(mdo sde): bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis// bskal ra ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta
359a5(mdo sde): bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du/ lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i

359a7(mdo sde): cig 'byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ nyan
359a8(mdo sde): thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'o gos

359b2(mdo sde): zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang le la zhog gis// bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ de

359b4(mdo sde): bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig cho sa kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi gar 'drir 'jug
359b5(mdo sde): ba dang / klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs ma da par skyed do// bzlog ste sti stang ma byas pa'i dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// phyugs kyi shing rta lta
359b6(mdo sde): bus 'gro ba dang / ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / zla ba nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang / de bzhin
359b7(mdo sde): te/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
359b8(mdo sde): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bar chad byas pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba'i byang
360a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gcig la/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang brnyas pa'i sems skyed na/ 'di ni na
360a2(mdo sde): bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gos// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed
360a3(mdo sde): kyi sems can rnams kyi mig phyung nas bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems skyed de/ gshe ba dang mi/ 
360a4(mdo sde): snyan par smra ba dang rnyogs par byed na/ de bas ches sdig pa ma rang du skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lo rkyen ci yang rung bas
360a5(mdo sde): brnyas pa bskyed de spros na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems cad na dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par/ skye bar 'gyur te/ de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro// de'i

360a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyug pa dang mtshon gyis bsnun te bdog pa thams cad phrog pa

360b2(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang gling re re na/ dgra bcom pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog bcad pa dang / rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i stegs bus yongasu

360b4(mdo sde): la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid la sgro btags te brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas// rkyen cig/ kyang rung / kho ba dang gshe ba dang / ma snyan pa zer ba dang /

360b6(mdo sde): de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa des chos spangs pa yin no// chos kyang gzhan la chos yong su 'dzin pa'i byang chub
360b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams

361a2(mdo sde): la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' ci lta bu yang rung ba la smad na/ 'di ni/

361b1(mdo sde): ba'i gzhi la mos par gyur pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug

361b6(mdo sde): rtsa ba rnams chud gzan pa bas gzhan gang zhig gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig chus zos par byas na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par

361b8(mdo sde): kho shig pa dang bsregs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang tha ba dang
362a1(mdo sde): khro ba'i sems bskyed de gsheb ma snyan par smras na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do// de ci'i phyi she na/ 
362a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges par byung la/ sangs rgyas las mchod rten rnams byung zhing sangs rgyas las 'jig rten thams cad
362a3(mdo sde): dang lha'i ris thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byung la sangs rgyas kyang byang chub sems dpa' las byung bas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la sti stang ma byas
362a4(mdo sde): ba ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang ma byas pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la sti stang byas pa ni sang das rgyas thams cad la sti steng byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas/ 
362a5(mdo sde): thams cad la mchod pa bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal gal te grong khyer la la zhig na/ byang chub
362a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' bye ba brgya'am bye ba stong ngam bye ba brgya stong ngam/ gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag yod la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos na/ de dag gi
362a7(mdo sde): las ni rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur ba 'am/ chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur
362a8(mdo sde): ba'i las sam/ mas 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ gla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro// grong khyer chen po dan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub
362b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' yad na de las na bskal ba grangs med par mtshams med pa'i gnas su skye bar mi 'gyuragrong khyer der 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te
362b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag gi las rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi 'byung chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba ri las ma 'byung chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur
362b3(mdo sde): ba'i las ma 'byung mugs 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / kla klos 'khrug pa'i las mi 'byung la/ chos
362b4(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di la mos byang chub sems dpa'i las bsadal pa rgya mtsho grangs med par sems can dmyal bang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur
362b5(mdo sde): yod na der 'khrug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i las bskal pa grangs med brjod du me da par mtshams med par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i las
362b6(mdo sde): bsgral ba bcu dang nyi shu dang / sum nur ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba yang tshe 'di la myong ste 'khrug pas byang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams chen
362b7(mdo sde): ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na rgyar dpag tshad brgya pa'i rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba la dug srang stong yang
362b8(mdo sde): me gdug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i phung po chen pos rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med
